100011001.content: —It has been more than 200 years since the old world was destroyed in "The Calamity".

100011002.content: Guided by the Supreme Directorate, the survivors used nanotechnology to separate the soul from the body and upload their consciousnesses to a virtual network called "Gaea", enabling life and civilization to continue on in a virtual world.

100011003.content: Considering the stability of the system and the strict time limit on its development, Gaea ultimately decided to recreate the pre-war world of the year 2100, dividing the ten war zones that brought about the calamity into ten distinct Sephirah Zones.

100011004.content: At present, the human consciousnesses contained within the world of Gaea have undergone several cycles. Their memories of the old era and the origin of their world are faded, and they now live by the rules established at Gaea's inception.

100011005.content: However, not even Gaea is free from danger...

100011006.content: Following the development of this new civilization, monsters called Visbane, which were born from Gaea's data source layer, constantly erode that which humanity built to preserve itself.

100011007.content: The Visbane activity leads to ruptures in the barrier between the Source and Surface Layers, resulting in the frequent occurrence of disasters called "Quakes" throughout the virtual world.

100011008.content: To deal with the Visbane crisis, Gaea's self-check program evolved into human entities capable of directly entering affected planes to intervene.

100011009.content: These personifications of "Deities", as the program was named, are the Modifiers.

100011010.content: With the support of the Supreme Directorate, Odin and the rest of the Modifiers led the charge against the Visbane. Thus, "Aether Gazer" was officially established.

100011011.content: Ever since then, under the guise of an investment company, the Modifiers have become fully integrated into the very society they protect.

100011012.content: They safeguard civilization's continued development and maintain social stability while utilizing the authority granted to them by the Gaea system to fight against the crises that strike at any time.

100012002.content: Baldr! A Behemoth Visbane escaped through a rift into the Source Layer!

100012003.content: Just when it couldn't get any worse... It's already going crazy. If we ignore it, it'll probably destroy as many planar barriers as it can.

100012004.content: But if we pursue it, then Ver and Zenkibo will have to enter the Source Layer...

100012005.content: I'm just the co-commander for this operation... Whether we have the rookies take that risk is up to you, Admin.

100012007.content: Let me go after them, Admin!

100012008.content: If we don't stop it, it'll cause another Quake, and more people will suffer because of it.

100012009.content: She's right. Besides, she has her senior here with her, and I'm not gonna let anything happen to Ver!

100012010.content: Zenkibo, didn't you get your tenure only a couple months before Ver did?

100012011.content: Urgh... Th-That still makes me her senior!

100012012.content: We joined Aether Gazer to protect everyone around us, just like what we're doing right now.

100012013.content: So, I can't just sit this one out... Admin, let us handle the Behemoth!

100012015.content: Temporary Squad Verthandi and Zenkibo, please proceed to the Source Layer to continue your pursuit. The Behemoth must be destroyed.

100012016.content: Stay vigilant, Admin and I will use the Mimir System to offer you support.

100021003.content: You're pretty worried about them, aren't you, Admin?

100021004.content: The training handbook says that the Source Layer is the structural foundation of this world. Everything we see around us is determined by the data in the Source Layer.

100021005.content: But now, an ever-increasing number of Visbane are doing constant damage to the Source Layer, resulting in frequent disasters around the world.

100021006.content: It's true, the Source Layer is practically a Visbane playground now. Aether Gazer was established so that it could one day stamp out every last one of those bastards.

100021007.content: According to you guys, I was nearly dragged into the Source Layer by Visbane. But I can't remember any of it...

100021008.content: If I could remember what happened then, maybe it could help with your operation.

100021009.content: Hey now, don't beat yourself up over it. You passed the test without a hitch and became our Admin.

100021010.content: Um... Admin, I've arrived at the subway station. Is this where Zenkibo and Ver entered the Source Layer?

100021011.content: That's right, they should already be there by now.

100021012.content: Understood! Then leave the mission support to me.

100021013.content: Huh? When did you contact Poseidon?

100021015.content: Since the Quake was greater in scale and came without warning, I was concerned that the situation could get...

100021016.content:
Hehe, nicely done!
And here I was worried that you would be all nerves on your first mission.

100021017.content: Well, this operation should be much safer with Poseidon's help.

100031001.content: Ver, Zenkibo, are you guys okay?

100031002.content: We're fine... The Astral Gate can teleport whoever touches it over vast distances in the Source Layer, but if you're not used to it, then... (Barf)...

100031003.content: Admin, we couldn't find any trace of the Behemoth.

100031004.content: Mimir, help Ver and Zenkibo detect the strongest Bane Energy signals near them.

100031005.content: Aw, do I have to? Did you forget that I'm still on a day off? I hate you guys...

100031007.content: Found it! There's rapidly increasing levels of Bane Energy southwest of them.

100031009.content: There's no way to be sure, but this is the only clue we have right now.

100032001.content: Strange, why did it get so quiet around here all of a sudden?

100032002.content: If we were in nature, this would mean all the nearby animals have gone into hiding. Something bigger and badder is definitely on its way.

100032003.content: I see. You really know a lot, Zenkibo!

100032004.content: Hehe... It's just a little something I picked up along the way.

100032005.content: Prepare for evasive action, a foreign object is approaching your position from the sky in the east!

100032007.content: A jet-black beast with wings swoops down from mid-air, leaving hair-raising claw marks in the ground.

100032012.content: Get over here, or you'll be swept away by that wind!

100052001.content: The Behemoth's life signs are weakening and the Bane Energy levels are rapidly decreasing... Okay, the target has been eliminated.

100052003.content: Nice! Now we can go back and pick up our vacations where we left off!

100052004.content: Good work. It was a difficult mission on short notice, but thankfully everything went smoothly in the end.

100052005.content: Poseidon, thanks for saving the day. We owe the success of the mission to you.

100052006.content: C'mon! I'm just happy that everyone's okay!

100052007.content: Be sure to use the time you have left to get some good rest in. That concludes the operation, well done, everyone.

100052009.content: After cutting off the communication, Baldr turns her gaze to the figure who had been standing in the doorway behind her for a good while.

100052010.content: How long have you been spying from back there?

100052011.content: Hm... Since you guys discovered that Behemoth, more or less.

100052012.content: Now that's mean! While the temporary commander and the rookies were frantically rushing around, their leader was enjoying the show from the shadows?

100052013.content: I didn't want to say anything lest I disrupt your battle. Besides, didn't everything wrap up nicely in the end?

100052014.content: Shu slowly walks over, stopping next to the war chair.

100052015.content: You go ahead, Baldr. Good job today.

100052017.content: After exchanging a look with Shu, Baldr seems to have picked up on something, departing the Command Room with a smile on her face.

100052018.content: The battle is finished, Admin. Still reveling in the fight?

100052020.content: It's normal to feel a little nervous on your first mission.

100052021.content: I've fought battles like that in my training system tons of times... but when I actually operated the Mimir System and accessed the terminal, it felt completely different.

100052022.content: You were afraid that Ver and the others could get hurt...

100052024.content: We feel joy and sadness and have our likes and dislikes just like anyone else. But we aren't just humans who happen to have the ability to fight off disaster.

100052025.content: On the contrary—we're simply detection programs that possess emotions similar to humans, but solely as a means of counteracting the Visbane mutation.

100052027.content: Some of us have been around for hundreds of years, yet we don't look a day older than when we first awoke. Some want to truly integrate into human society, but ultimately give up because the differences are too great.

100052028.content: Deep down, what matters most to us is the purpose Gaea gave us—to eliminate the Visbane.

100052029.content: Are you saying... I shouldn't project human emotions onto the war between Modifiers and Visbanes?

100052030.content: My only responsibility is to help you become a good Administrator... I'm afraid you'll have to find the answer to this question yourself.

101011001.content:
Training concluded at: 3 minutes and 27 seconds.
Simulation targets hit: 12 times. Accuracy: 40%. Damage suffered 9 times, severe damage suffered: 2 times. Overall evaluation score: C.

101011003.content: A girl with long, light purple hair sits in the corner, panting.

101011005.content:
My accuracy... got even lower.
Is it because I was too focused for too long?

101011006.content: Please confirm to start the combat simulation again.

101011008.content: The young girl pulls herself together and straightens out her body. Beads of perspiration fall from her cheeks and onto her lapels.

101011009.content:
Warning, if you continue training, it will affect your health.
Mitir reminds you to take a break and enjoy a healthy lifestyle as you work.

101011010.content: It's okay, this really is the last time.

101011011.content: Copy that. Generating simulator Visbane. Training will start in 5 seconds—

101011012.content: The minimum rating to participate in actual combat is B and I'm not even close...

101011016.content:
New access signal detected—
Simulation Battle aborted.

101011020.content: Yeah... Shu's just counseling the newbie.

101011021.content: She found me too much of a nuisance, so I was let out early.

101011022.content: Shu has been the one training the Admin all this time. She's probably concerned that the Admin would be embarrassed if you're there.

101011023.content: Did the battle go well today?

101011024.content: Well... There were some surprises, but the result wasn't too bad.

101011025.content: That's good to hear. The Administrator practiced late into the night every day to pass the test. All that effort was not in vain.

101011028.content: Just a scratch. I'm just so useless that I get hurt even during training.

101011029.content: Have you been training all afternoon?

101011030.content: No, I took breaks in between.

101011031.content: Both the Administrator and Ver are now official combat members. I want to hurry and catch up to them.

101011032.content: The work of the Intelligence Office is just as important as the combat squads. You don't have to force yourself to battle.

101011034.content: Baldr looks at her younger sister. Her clothes are soaked in sweat. Baldr lets out a long sigh.

101011035.content: Ah... Speaking of which, all that Intelligence Office stuff is too complicated. Again, I confused some documents with materials to be scrapped and deleted all of 'em.

101011036.content: Deleted?!... Hold on, what documents did you delete? Every single bit of data is important!

101011037.content: Well, I'm not like you, who can remember all the categories of files.

101011038.content: How about this, I'll get you a late-night snack, and you help me restore those files tomorrow!

101011040.content: Come on, let's move! Staying with those newbies all day was so tiring. I just want to forget about work with a hot bowl of noodles.

101011042.content: Baldr ignores her sister's complain and pulls Hodur with her, heading out.

101011044.content: Heheh, now that's what I'm talking about!

101011045.content: Well, I'm still a little short on my training goal for today, and I want to try again...

101011047.content:
Okay ... You win.
I'll wait here for you.

101021001.content:
A week after the operation of the Subway Line.
Spealght Industrial Park.

101021002.content: Screw Spealght Industries!!! This morally bankrupt company ignored safety issues, bribed officials, and forced the use of AGI Mecha, costing us our jobs!

101021004.content: And don't forget the Riot of the AGI Mecha! Artificial intelligence must be limited!

101021005.content: Hey Boss Oli, we're barely hanging on over here!

101021006.content: Damn it, that Eugene is bragging to the press and leaving the job of blocking the doors to us!

101021007.content: Looks like there're more of these guys every minute!

101021008.content: Tsk... This bunch would piss their pants if I fired off a few rounds.

101021009.content: Hey Boss Oli... easy!  Remember, Boss Ethan told us that we can't afford to draw any more attention to us.

101021011.content: Hey—! You guys are way too frickin' loud! You got a death wish or something!?

101021012.content: W-Who is this? He looks really scary.

101021013.content: What's with the crocodile head? Is he like part of a gang or something?

101021014.content: The sudden appearance of a strange man in a crocodile headgear silenced the roiling crowd.

101021015.content:
I didn't expect that bozo would be so good at calming things down.
I should have told him to get here right from the start.

101021016.content: Hehe! Hey Pops, look, this bunch settled down!

101021018.content: Wait… what the hell are you doing here? Who's watching the factory gate?

101021019.content: Huh? No one. Someone told me you need help here, so I came.

101021020.content: What? You mean you... You just left that area alone?!

101021021.content: (Meanwhile in the Industrial Park, Eugene Spealght is being interviewed by a group of reporters.)

101021022.content: Chairman, it is said that the newly-developed AGI Mecha will be able to replace more than half the jobs when it is launched. Is this true?

101021023.content: We have not done enough studies on this, so I am unable to speak confidently on the matter.

101021024.content: Sources say that your company does not intend to disclose the results of safety inspections. You have also reached a private agreement with officials to enforce the entry of AGI Mecha in work positions. Is this true?

101021026.content: So your company is not planning on doing this? As chairman, how do you feel about the massive unemployment caused by the introduction of AGI Mecha?

101021027.content: I've always been of the opinion that AGI Mecha cannot fully take over human work. The AGI Mecha we produce only serve to liberate the common worker from the mundane, giving people more time to spend on meaningful things.

101021028.content: I heard that you intend to run for presidency in Neuhansa soon. May I ask if...

101021029.content: The gathered crowd gradually departs, and the reporter who got the opportunity to conduct the interview scrambles forward to ask questions. All that remained were two unmotivated people who gradually ended up behind the squad.

101021030.content: I thought something big was happening here. What the hell's going on... Or were they just talking about that group of people waving flags around…

101021031.content: … These people are a bit too energetic… and they messed up my hair.

101021032.content: Pineapple! We are on a mission!

101021033.content: Might be more faulty intel anyway.

101021034.content: Those CORG guys got used to sending us here and there. We can't expect them to verify every single piece of information.

101021035.content: True, true… This place is boring as hell, let's scram.

101021036.content: What a sunny day. I wonder how many beautiful maidens I'll miss out on...

101021037.content:
Welcome, to Spealght—!
Welcome to Spealght—!

101021038.content: Wow! Isn't this the classic 2nd Gen Industrial Type, <Glory>?

101021040.content: I heard that it has been out of production since last year. Chairman, can I touch it? It's so cute!

101021042.content:
Identification failed, identification failed...
Unknown target approaching… initiating elimination procedures… Eliminate—!

101021045.content: As the AGI Mecha's arm swings at the group of people, a dazzling Solar Arrow slices through it like a meteor piercing the sky.

101021046.content: Fair maiden, please take your leave... Even I cannot guarantee that I can save you from the next hit.

101031001.content: I'm gonna crush you, smash you, crack you all! Rawwr!

101031002.content: E-Error... Error… Operations failed… Operations failed…

101031003.content: All done, Pops! Aren't I the friggin'... Oof!

101031004.content: Sobek hasn't even finished speaking when a heavy punch smashes the top of his head.

101031005.content: You hot damn dumbass! None of this would have happened if you didn't leave your post without permission!

101031007.content: Tsk… I heard quite a few shouts over there just a moment ago. I'll bet some of them headed to Eugene.

101031008.content: I told you to make sure these things didn't get out! You can't even follow simple directions! Useless trash!

101031010.content: Boss Oli, the west side is all cleared up.

101031012.content: But what? It's already a shitshow… How can it get any worse?

101031013.content: We took stock of the number of AGI Mechas, and it seems we are missing one of those that ran out of the factory.

101031015.content: When I was clearing things up earlier, I saw two people with press passes suppressing the AGI Mecha. Maybe they took it?

101031016.content: Well, what the hell are you doing just standing around!? STOP THEM!

101041001.content: Here is the information you wanted, Miss Shu. Some files have been damaged, so fixing them took a while. But now you'll be able to view them, no problem...

101041006.content: I want to ask you something...

101041007.content:
If I want to give someone a gift, what should I get?
I'm not… good at stuff like this.

101041008.content: Well, it depends on the preferences of the person you're giving it to.

101041010.content: But recently someone who likes to listen to music lost her headphones, so if it's a person like her... She'd probably like a new pair, I guess?

101041012.content: I got it! Thanks, Miss Shu...

101041014.content: I'm fine now. You can carry on.

101041016.content: So what did Hodur talk with you about?

101041017.content: She was just giving me some data.

101041018.content: Is that so... Then why run away when she saw me?

101041019.content: Probably because you upset her recently.

101041021.content: I'm just guessing. You should ask her yourself later.

101041022.content: Let's get back on topic. What do you need from me?

101041023.content: Zenkibo and Apollo are back. Looks like that intel was correct.

101041024.content: In the morning news, all media in Neuhansa said everything went smoothly. Looks like Spealght bribed them all...

101041025.content: They also brought back something amazing. It's with the Cryptics now.

101041026.content: Got it. I'll go right now.

101041028.content: The Tranzist Ore in the energy source has been modified. An unstable core containing Bane Energy was implanted, so it moves like a Visbane when it operates.

101041029.content: So it's an AGI Mecha that's been corroded by a Visbane?

101041030.content: No, the control over the Bane Energy in this core is fascinating. It's right on the edge of turning into a Visbane. Looks like it's intentionally adjusted.

101041031.content: Can this sort of modification be reproduced on an AGI Mecha after production?

101041032.content: Can't be sure. We'll have to do some experiments to find out.

101041034.content: No, I have other research to do.

101041035.content: Geez… Could you refuse us any quicker?

101041036.content: If I remember correctly, you promised to help with all necessary research if you didn't have to participate in the missions.

101041038.content: The young girl with mechanical ears puffs her cheeks and looks away.

101041041.content: Oh, about your research budget for next quarter which was rejected before... We discussed it afterwards, and it is not unnegotiable...

101041042.content: Even though the young girl trying to hold herself back, the girl's ears perk up when she hears that.

101041043.content: An increase in budget is possible for members with outstanding performances, but Ookuninushi, your performance now is a little...

101041045.content: Before Shu can finish, Ookuninushi picks up the AGI Mecha on the table and heads to the lab.

101041046.content: You are not allowed to come in. There are other secret projects in here.

101041048.content: Ookuninushi who get the promise nods and closes the lab door.

101041049.content: Secret projects... Is she talking about that auto-onion cutter BunBun or something?

101041050.content: Who knows. Odin said to put up with Ookuninushi's research. Maybe she'll surprise us one day.

101051001.content: Not long after, Ookuninushi pushes the cart with the AGI Mecha out from the lab like a surgeon after surgery.

101051003.content: The AGI Mecha on the cart is giving off a burnt smell. The energy source and steel plate parts have been adjusted. It looks like Ookuninushi has tortured it with the electric drill. Only the Tranzist Ore slot is intact.

101051005.content: As you can see, though I managed to do it, the changes caused by removing the Bane Energy from the inhibition system were pretty extreme. I'd like to find the equilibrium point again and put it back, but that would take a lot.

101051006.content: So even if it's technically possible, since Spealght cares more about mass production, they'd definitely just choose to produce another, right?

101051009.content: Ookuninushi raises the hammer and cracks the head of the AGI Mecha.

101051011.content: DNS.231407CM... This AGI Mecha serial number was produced a year ago. In other words, Spealght started making these at least a year ago.

101051012.content: So… the anonymous tipster was trying to lead us to this.

101051013.content: An informer… could it be someone on the inside?

101051014.content: No clue, but if it's about Visbanes, we must do something. Baldr, can you take care of this?

101051015.content: Got it. I'll go and make preparations right now.

101061004.content: Olheim ignores the greetings from his subordinates and walks straight towards the Preparation Room, ashen-faced.

101061005.content: Hey, Sobek. Did you make Boss Oli mad again? He looks scary.

101061006.content: I'm gonna find that asshole who conned me and end him!

101061007.content: Save yourself the effort. No one's expecting anything from you. Just stay out of trouble.

101061008.content: Bastard! You lookin' down on me?

101061009.content: Okay, alright, I believe you. Your headgear's squishing my chin. Shove off.

101061013.content: Where's the Bossman? Why's that gloomy woman missing too?

101061014.content: Boss Ethan hasn't come by today, and neither has Big Sis Zero One.

101061015.content: What the hell's going on today? Why's everyone missing?

101061016.content: Boss Oli, did this morning's mission go well?

101061017.content: Don't you have eyes to see, you idiot? Don't bring that up here!

101061019.content: Anything to eat? I haven't had lunch.

101061021.content: You useless idiots! What are you good for outside of stuffing your faces and sleeping?!

101061022.content: No, we're hungry too. That girl ate all the food.

101061024.content: Munch, munch... Yumm... Any more? Gimme more!

101061025.content: Mm, my mouth's dry. Pass the orange juice, thanks.

101061026.content: She's been eating for two hours. It's impossible to sleep when she's hungry and kicks up a fuss. Seals on her mouth don't work either.

101061027.content: It's only been a week. If we keep her locked up here we won't have anything to feed ourselves in a few days.

101061029.content: Olheim pushes his subordinates away and sits in front of the tied girl.

101061030.content: Hey. You. Tell me why you came here and I'll let you go.

101061031.content: You're not addicted to being tied up, are you?

101061032.content: Gulp... I told you guys up front.

101061033.content: I'm in hiding because I won that boxing championship title and the gang boss sent men after me for the prize money because he refuses to accept it.

101061034.content:
Who are you trying to kid? You're a pipsqueak. A boxing championship?
You were out like a light in two hits last week!

101061035.content: I was just too hungry to move! It's different now. Want to give my skills a try? Just loosen my chains.

101061036.content: Pfft. I'm not fighting a girl.

101061037.content: And another reason is that this place smells strange.

101061039.content: That's not what I meant. It's the smell of a specific creature. I've hunted them before, and the smell is really thick here.

101061041.content: I'm not good with describing things. But it's a bunch of strange stuff, and I can smell them when I'm close.

101061042.content: (Did we mistake a paranoid idiot as a spy?)

101061043.content: I'll put in a request to release you when Boss Ethan comes back.

101061044.content: Huh? Then what about the gang that's after me?

101061045.content: Who cares? Finish stuffing your face and get lost!

101071002.content: Overture Squad here! Verthandi reporting for duty.

101071004.content: Looks like you two had a good vacation.

101071005.content: Hehe, I had steak at that place I've been meaning to go to for a long time.

101071007.content:
Good work in the last battle.
This mission will not be any more relaxing than the last one, so be prepared.

101071008.content: You mean the Spealght AGI Mecha riot?

101071011.content: A reporter was attacked by a berserk AGI Mecha at the Spealght press conference today. We took it apart and discovered that someone had performed a Visbane modification.

101071012.content: Visbane? Was it done by Spealght?

101071013.content: We can't confirm that yet, but it's highly likely...

101071014.content: We've informed CORG about the situation, but this incident is related to the Visbanes so we have to be the first to investigate.

101071015.content: So the operation is to destroy those AGI Mechas and find out who's the mastermind, right?

101071016.content: Generally speaking, yes. But the inner workings of Spealght aren't known to the public. It's still unclear how many similarly affected AGI Mechas are hidden in there.

101071018.content: Don't worry, Admin! I'm an up-and-coming rookie with a 100% mission success rate!

101071019.content: That's because you've only gone on one mission...

101071020.content: We won't let a newbie act alone, of course.

101071021.content: Apollo and Zenkibo have already set off, but there is more than one factory in the Industrial Park and they lack the manpower to do a thorough investigation.

101071022.content: I'll lead the team that Verthandi is on. Also, another Overture Squad rookie will be joining us.

101071024.content: Hi, I... May I come in?

101071027.content: A girl who is as petite as a rabbit walks slowly through the door.

101071028.content: The girl's long turquoise hair is in two long braids. Her immature hands pull at her chest subconsciously, perhaps out of nervousness. However, a pair of large blue eyes sneak glances at the persons in front of her.

101071029.content: Osiris has been in recuperation until recently, so this must be the first time you're meeting the Administrator.

101071030.content: Miss Shu, Sis Ver... and the Administrator. Hello.

101071032.content: Um... Osiris had some health issues in the past, but it's nothing now.

101071033.content: Actually, I think the Administrator looks familiar too.

101071034.content: Her room is not far from your training room. Maybe you've run into each other by coincidence.

101071035.content: Lil' Osi! Yay! You're finally healthy again!

101071036.content: You suddenly cut your training short so I was super worried!

101071037.content: I'm fine now... Sorry I made you worry, Sis Ver.

101071038.content: Yes, yes. Health is the most important thing. Now I can take you out for some yummy barbecue again!

101071039.content:
Enough chit chat, let's leave the catching up for after the mission is complete.
I'll brief you now.

101071040.content: Shu taps some buttons, and a projection image of the Spealght Industrial Park is brought up on the screen.

101071041.content: Apollo and Zenkibo cleared Factory No. 1 and No. 4 in the east and found no anomalies. The berserk AGI Mecha that went on a rampage this morning was not from there.

101071042.content: They're heading to Factory No. 2 now. The rookie team will be in charge of sweeping Factory No. 3. We also suspect that this is where they store the AGI Mecha.

101071044.content: Also... Eugene, the chairman of Spealght Industries, has disappeared after the incident. Surveillance footage did not capture him leaving, so we can assume he is somewhere in the Industrial Park.

101071045.content: If you find any traces of him, the priority is to bring him back and question him about what exactly he has plotted. We've been commissioned by the CORG to do just that.

101071046.content: Something of this scale happening in Neuhansa is definitely something the Supreme Directorate will take notice of.

101071047.content: Administrator, I will leave you to operate the Mimir auxiliary system. You'll also handle all communications and decision-making.

101071049.content: We have two rookies on this operation so I already asked Baldr to infiltrate Factory No. 3.

101071050.content: Huh? Sis Baldr is coming too?

101071051.content: Heh... She may not look like that most of the time, but she used to be an elite infiltrator.

101071052.content: We're heading out in 20 minutes, so everyone go get ready.

101071055.content: Yeah, I'm okay. I'm joining because I want to...

101071056.content: Since you've decided, I'm going to expect a lot from you… as your mentor.

101071057.content: You haven't forgotten those combat skills from class, have you?

101071058.content: No, I review them in my head every day. Also, I just battled with simulated opponents in the training room.

101081001.content: You're late! Shift change was over ten minutes ago!

101081002.content: Um... Sorry, I had a sudden stomach ache.

101081003.content: Yeah, right. That's the same excuse from yesterday. You must've lost track of time again while playing cards!

101081004.content: (Sigh)... Guess I can't hide it from you.

101081005.content: One more time and I'll report you to the boss. Hurry up and get the terminal out.

101081007.content: How am I going to end my shift without the terminal? Hurry up.

101081009.content: The late security guard pats around her pockets and slowly pulls out a blue, square device.

101081012.content: Huh? Are you doing this on purpose?!

101081013.content: I can do face recognition, but this helmet is so tight my head's stuck. Help me.

101081015.content: The security guard grumbles as he puts his weapon on the floor and reluctantly helps with the helmet.

101081017.content: This is pretty damn loose, bud. Hey, why does your neck seem slimmer? Did you recently... Ugh... Arghh...

101081018.content: The security guard feels a sharp pain in his abdomen before finishing his sentence. A blow to the neck follows, and he soon becomes faint.

101081019.content: In his hazy vision, he sees his colleague in front of him slowly taking off the helmet, revealing long, pale blonde hair.

101082001.content: The blonde girl takes the terminal from the floor and removes the security guard's helmet to do facial unlock.

101082002.content: Got it. Went better than I'd thought.

101082003.content: Baldr, do you copy? This is the Command Room.

101082006.content: Miss Shu and the team are on the way to Spealght Industrial Park. I am in sole command of this mission.

101082007.content: You're doing this independently already? That's quick, and very impressive.

101082008.content: How's things over on your end, Baldr?

101082009.content: I just finished preparations to sneak into the enemy territory. If all goes well, we can use these to get in.

101082010.content: As Baldr speaks, she looks at the terminal that had just been handed over to her—

101082013.content: Administrator, does Children of Iron ring any bells for you?

101082014.content: I seem to have heard of it, hold on...

101082015.content: After entering Children of Iron into the system, a large number of entries pop out, including classified Supreme Directorate documents.

101082016.content: —Children of Iron, officially documented by CORG as a violent organization. They attacked the Sephirah Zone photon rails several times over a period of four years, looting large amounts of military supplies and are wanted by the CORG throughout all Sephirah Zones.

101082019.content: Why did you suddenly bring this up? Are the Children of Iron in the Industrial Park?

101082020.content: They're not just "in" there, they've changed their outfit and are walking about as security.

101082021.content: You mean all the security guards in Spealght Industrial Park are wanted by the Supreme Directorate?!

101082022.content: Well, I have to meet up with my security colleagues now, Administrator. They‘ll get suspicious if I'm missing for too long.

101082024.content: Wait, shouldn't you rendezvous with Shu and the others first, then—

101082025.content: That would defeat the purpose of sneaking in in advance, right? Now is the best time to infiltrate the enemy. We might even get a chance to find Eugene in hiding.

101082026.content: Judging by Baldr's tone, it would be nigh impossible to convince her.

101082027.content: Okay, but if you run into any danger, make sure to consider evacuating first.

101082028.content: Got it. If I do run into any trouble, I'll open comms and ask you for help.

101082031.content: If you run into any danger, make sure to consider evacuating first.

101082032.content: Heh, got it. If I run into any trouble and need help, you'll be the first one I contact.

101091002.content: Right. Baldr has already blended in with the security team...

101091003.content: It sounds really risky to infiltrate an organization that's wanted by the law. But it's also something Sis Baldr would do for sure.

101091004.content: I hope Sis Baldr will be okay...

101091005.content: High risk, high returns. Baldr is talented. She shouldn't have a problem. Let's hope we can get intel that's worth something.

101092002.content: Central system... critically damaged... Conscious judgment failed...

101092004.content: Having been forcefully knocked back, the AGI Mecha stumbled several times. The destruction of its system caused the eerie red light to glow dimmer and dimmer, until the machine eventually stopped.

101092006.content: I'm fine. Sorry to make you worry, Sis Ver.

101092007.content: It's nothing. Osiris, you just haven't gotten used to the feel of battle.

101092008.content: But as a Modifier, to be overpowered by some ordinary industrial AGI Mechas...

101092009.content: These are no ordinary industrial AGI Mechas.

101092010.content: Shu uses the tip of the lance to open up the casing of the AGI Mecha. The Tranzist Ore is burned black, but a red triangular mark can still be seen.

101092011.content: Like those from this morning... Their Tranzist Ore were injected with Bane Energy, which is why they are so similar to Visbanes.

101092013.content:
You can drop the titles in combat, Admin.
The training is over. Now everyone is depending on you and the Mimir System.

101092014.content: Okay... Shu, I've just analyzed the incoming routes for these AGI Mechas. They're all coming at you in fixed batches.

101092016.content: Yeah. I'm guessing these AGI Mechas don't activate the Bane Energy in their cores unless they detect a stranger, otherwise the units in an area would come towards here together through the signal link.

101092017.content: They are just detecting that there's some missing AGI Mecha signals, then filling them in by following set instructions.

101092018.content: In other words, when we get rid of each batch, we're just renewing the waves of attacks?

101092019.content: Yep. Which is why I see no point in wasting our time. We should focus on investigating Spealght first.

101092020.content: I agree with you, Admin. Since you brought it up, you must already have a solution, right?

101092021.content: If these AGI Mechas are taking the shortest route here by default, then you should have an empty space 30 degrees northeast of you according to the route map by the Mimir System.

101092022.content: I don't know why there are no AGI Mecha patrols in that area, but you should be able to take a quick break there.

101092023.content: Send the coordinates of that area to the comms. We trust your assessment.

101101002.content: AGI Mechas are being destroyed by machine gun fire, and some of them are eliminated before they can activate their Bane Energy. Unlike the situation in Factory No. 3 — it's like a playground just for Zenkibo here.

101101004.content: Serious damage to hull. Maintenance needed. Maintenance—

101101005.content:
Huh? Looks like I'm outta ammo.
Pineapple! Cover me while I reload!

101101007.content: But Shu said that this is primarily an investigation mission, right?

101101008.content: She also said that we should do as the situation demands, right?

101101010.content: Apollo casually raises the bow and shoots accurately at the cores of incoming AGI Mechas.

101101011.content: Deal with all these, and we can investigate whatever we want.

101101013.content: By the way, why did you give me this nickname, Zenki?

101101014.content: Don't like it? Goki gave it to you and I like it.

101101015.content: That invisible air-friend of yours again?

101101016.content: Goki says you look like a pineapple, and you love showing off, so calling you pineapple is perfect.

101101017.content: Like a pineapple... Heh. Sure. Just praising another aspect of my handsomeness, right?

101101018.content: A very creative compliment. I'll take it.

101101020.content: The Solar Arrow gathered by the Access Key shot off, whistling through the air and pulverizing the arm of an AGI Mecha instantly.

101101021.content: Reloaded! Butt out, pineapple! Watch me mow 'em down!

101111001.content: The Overture Squad follows the Administrator's instructions and arrives at their destination.

101111002.content: Administrator, you were right. There are no more AGI Mechas active here.

101111003.content: But... I feel even more unsettled with no AGI Mechas chasing after us.

101111004.content: Not even a whisper could be heard in the huge workshop. Fully automated robotic arms sort components on the assembly line, like a cold organ: freezing, but still functioning.

101111005.content: Where are these parts being sent?

101111006.content: Probably to where the Bane Energy tainted Tranzist Ore is being installed.

101111007.content: Shu seems to sense something, and she suddenly turns, shielding Verthandi and Osiris behind her.

101111008.content: Shh — don't make a sound. Someone's heading this way.

101111009.content: Did you hear? There's some big trouble at Factory No. 2, and they dispatched a lot of people to help handle it.

101111010.content: Today's been really eventful. If the CORG notice, our time here is limited.

101111011.content: I've thought about leaving for a long time. The boss said we were just here to keep our heads down and make some dough, but six months just flew by.

101111012.content: I'm locked up in this skyless factory all day, can't see pretty girls, can't have big meals... I've lost my dreams, man...

101111013.content: But we'd still be in a poor and stuck in Rostach and never been able to see any of this if it wasn't for the boss.

101111014.content: I know. I'm just whining. I'll always stick with the boss.

101111017.content: A few more years following the boss, and I'm heading home to get married...

101111018.content: I envy you. I haven't so much as sent a letter home in two years...

101111019.content: Oh yeah, the boss mentioned last time that... Huh?

101111022.content: Intruders? One, two, th... Three? What the hell, aren't they supposed to be at Factory No. 2?

101111023.content: Um... Mr. Security, we don't want to fight. We just want to ask you a few questions.

101111024.content: She looks normal, and they're not carrying any special weapons...

101111025.content: We'll be able to handle intruders of this level on our own, and maybe even get credit for it...

101111029.content: Give up, Osiris. They're not gonna listen.

101111030.content: We have no obligation to the CORG to apprehend suspects, but we do need the intel.

101121001.content: DM675, please write me a sonnet in relation to the word 'bridge.'

101121002.content: Don't ask me this. I don't write poems.

101121009.content: The AGI Mecha in the old man's hands answered the repeated question with the same answer. However, this normal-seeming response made unease visible in the old man's eyes.

101121012.content: The old man's lips parted, but no words fell. He wiped the dust on the head of the AGI Mecha with his sleeve, and put it back on the old storage shelf.

101121013.content: Jolin! You did this, didn't you?

101121014.content: The door to the warehouse is suddenly booted open with violent force.

101121015.content:
The visitor strides towards the old engineer.
With no care for the difference in age, he grabs the old man by the collar and shoves him hard against the wall.

101121017.content: It was YOU! The door guards said it was YOU who sent them away! And you were the one who suggested having the interview in the Industrial Park! Why?! Why did you do that?!

101121019.content: Have you gone mad? How does this benefit you?

101121020.content: Do you know how much trouble you'll attract because of this stupidity? I told you! My plan was just one step from completion. Why couldn't you believe in me?!

101121021.content: Jolin's face quickly turned red from the pressure. Blue veins are popping on his neck, and it's difficult for him to speak.

101121023.content: Eugene's fists loosen when he sees Jolin's pain, and he averts his eyes angrily before releasing his grip.

101121024.content: Making a deal with that person... will surely take Spealght... to a dead end...

101121025.content: Spealght would have been finished three years ago if I didn't work with him!

101121026.content: Putting your nose to the grinder to make technological advances… all so that the common people can enjoy the convenience of AGI Mecha… Nobody gives a shit about that anymore!

101121027.content: Once something goes wrong, they will abandon you immediately without a word! It's only with power and strength that Spealght will truly be reborn!

101121028.content: But... What they're doing is too dangerous. We cannot control this...

101121029.content: Don't think so little of me, Jolin.

101121030.content: I only let you stay because you're my father's friend. Don't you dare lecture me based on seniority.

101121031.content: Eugene swipes the AGI Mecha from the shelves and leaves the warehouse without a backward glance.

101121033.content:
Please be gentle with your AGI Mecha—
Please be gentle with your AGI Mecha—

101121035.content: Jolin bears the pain and hunches over to hug the AGI Mecha on the floor.

101131002.content: Ha. You know what's going on now?

101131004.content: Don't be afraid, Mr. Security. Just answer a few questions and we won't hurt you.

101131005.content: You're not really security guards, are you? More like members of the fugitive gang Children of Iron, right?

101131006.content: Hey… How the hell'd you know that!?

101131007.content: Who hired you guys to guard this factory? Why are you here?

101131008.content: O-Our Boss Ethan handles all the negotiations. We were only told to guard this place.

101131009.content: Ethan... So this is the name of your leader, right?

101131011.content: I don't know. Boss Ethan never tells us where he goes, and he only shows up for the weekly meetings these days.

101131012.content: So have you guys noticed anything strange while you've been here?

101131013.content: Anything strange... The AGI Mechas here have problems from time to time, but we were told about this one in advance, and the warehouse is separated from the living quarters, so it's no big deal.

101131014.content: There has been something that bothers me though… Strange sounds coming from under the ground, at night. It is like a large smelting furnace, rumbling and rumbling. But it only comes occasionally, and I can't really hear it too clearly.

101131016.content: Looks like we'll have to find this Ethan if we want to figure out what's really going on...

101131017.content: Who's looking for our Boss Ethan?

101131019.content: Tsk! What the hell are you two doing lying on the ground!? What a frickin' disgrace!

101131020.content: Looks like we got ourselves some more guards to deal with…

101131021.content: How dare you bully my subordinates! I guess you'd like an ass whooping, huh?

101131023.content: Show them what the Children of Iron can do!

101131024.content: You guys sure are quick to switch sides…

102011002.content: Administrator, the information on Spealght Industries has been compiled.

102011004.content: It's nothing. I'm glad to be of help to those who go into battle...

102011005.content: Well then, I'll take my leave. Call me anytime if you need anything, Admin.

102011006.content: The files from the Intelligence Office are sent over after Hodur leaves.

102011008.content: Hm... It looks like a normal AGI Mecha company at first glance.

102011009.content: The founder Morgan Spealght started out in the steel industry, then moved the company headquarters to the new industrial area Alred in Neuhansa. They took advantage of the Tranzist Ore boom at the time to grow quickly.

102011010.content: After accumulating enough capital, the Spealght family continued running the business and acquired many local AGI Mecha research companies. Then they officially began to involve themselves in the AGI Mecha industry—

102011011.content: Through the efforts of several generations, Spealght Industries hired talent, made innovations in technology, and captured the market to become one of the three mega companies in Neuhansa today.

102011012.content: Considering Spealght Industries' size, they had a good reputation until about three years ago. There were occasional rumors of bribes paid to leading politicians, but no conclusive evidence was ever brought forward. However...

102011014.content: Unfortunately for Spealght, three years ago, there was an AGI Mecha riot that shook all of Neuhansa...

102011015.content: A large number of AGI Mechas lost control and went on a rampage. They ran out onto the commercial streets and residential areas and attacked humans on sight.

102011016.content: They wandered the streets aimlessly, smashing store window displays, and using chainsaws to cut cars by the roadside...

102011017.content: The Neuhansa government asked the CORG for help with this incident. A large number of forces were sent to police the chaos and suppress it. It took two full days for the unrest to subside.

102011018.content: Wow… I can't even remember events as big as this after losing my memory.

102011019.content: No, this has little to do with your amnesia. It's been a few years since that incident, so it doesn't have much effect on things these days. The effects on the Sephirah Zone outside of Neuhansa are even smaller.

102011020.content: Spealght Industries made a lot of use of public relations after the AGI Mecha riot, and used their wealth to buy off the media and control public opinion behind the scenes. Quite a few politicians even stepped forward to speak up for them...

102011021.content: The most important thing, however, is that they didn't withdraw after suffering such a blow. Within two years of that incident, they launched a succession of AGI Mecha that far surpassed the level of their competitors.

102011022.content: The convenience of the new AGI Mecha models appealed greatly to the general public and businesses, and public opinion guided the appeal along. Everyone soon forgot about that incident.

102011023.content: After such a disastrous incident, they still had the finances to do damage control with public relations, and invest in the development of new models on top of that... Sounds suspicious. Did they already develop those models before the incident?

102011024.content: Spealght Industries' chairman, Eugene Spealght, has seen a huge increase in his popularity ratings over the past two years.

102011025.content: People now call him the Lion of Neuhansa, and they laud his leadership, citing it as an example of how a company can rise again after a crisis.

102011026.content: But what exactly had Eugene Spealght done to bring Spealght Industries back from the dead? He has never revealed that to the public...

102011027.content: Now that brings us to the dangerous AGI Mechas in the factories. They're definitely something to be concerned about...

102021001.content: Hiding around like mice... You brats are really getting on my nerves!

102021002.content: The Security Captain's got some pretty impressive armor and firepower, but it looks like he's having trouble moving around.

102021003.content: See that, Lil' Osi? There's no armor protecting the backs of his knees.

102021004.content: Wait for me to distract him, then hit him where it hurts!

102021006.content: After nodding in agreement, Verthandi and Osiris split up to attack from each side.

102021007.content: Easily evading machine gun fire, their swift movements make them look like two phantoms—one red and one green. The exhausted Security Captain grows increasingly annoyed.

102021011.content: Osiris avoids the shots, which are steadily going wild, and throws her weapon the moment her body touches the ground.

102021012.content: The scythe wrapped in unearthly blue sweeps past the target in an arc that is barely perceptible, and it tears a bloody gash in the back of his leg before he can even react, like a wolf in the night—

102021014.content: With his leg heavily wounded, the Security Captain fell to the ground with a cry of pain.

102021017.content: (Ha… They have come a long way.)

102021018.content: Even the Captain couldn't take 'em out…

102021019.content: So… There's no pointin us sticking around, right?

102021021.content: The security guards are about to sneak away, but a lance suddenly comes sweeping in, blocking their way.

102021022.content: It seems our conversation is not yet over.

102021023.content: Eek...! I-I already told you guys all I know!

102021024.content: Take me to your headquarters. I want to personally confirm if Ethan is there.

102021026.content: Hey! What's all this racket? What's going on...?

102021027.content: Waaah! Boss Oli, you're finally back—!

102021028.content: The yellow-haired young man dodges the welcoming hug — and tears — and slowly walks over, surveying the wretched surroundings with disgust.

102021029.content:
The factory that got invaded was Factory No. 2, right? Why are you guys all beaten up?
Watch it! Don't you dare get any closer! Your snot is going to get on me! GROSS! Get away!

102021030.content:
Waaah...
I-It's not just Factory No. 2! There are intruders here as well!

102021032.content: We're here to investigate what happened at Spealght Industrial Park this morning. Do you know where Ethan is?

102021033.content:
Looking for our Boss Ethan?
Don't get ahead of yourselves. There are so few of you. Get out of here before I change my mind!

102021034.content: You're just temporary security guards hired by Spealght, right? Tell us what you know, and you might get a more lenient sentence when the CORG tries you in court.

102021035.content: ...You guys are from the Supreme Directorate?

102021039.content: Ha! A partnership... with the CORG?

102021040.content: That's hilarious! Are you guys serious? Trying to scare me with the CORG?

102021041.content:
Listen up. Those CORG vermin, we Children of Iron ain't afraid of them!
The day will come! We will crush the CORG, and people will call us heroes then!

102021045.content: Bring that thing that Boss Ethan picked up from the scrap site last month. Let's use that to have fun with them.

102021046.content: That thing from the scrap site? What's he talking about?

102021047.content: No clue, but I have a bad feeling about this.

102031001.content: Meanwhile, in the Control Room somewhere in Spealght Industrial Park.

102031002.content: Good job with the diversion, Zero One.

102031003.content: The red-haired man brushes his hair and speaks leisurely, as if he is addressing empty air.

102031004.content: A red figure leaps off the roof as soon as the words leave his mouth. A woman with tawny hair appears in front of him, dagger in hand.

102031005.content: Every time you appear like this, it reminds me of our first meeting. You held a dagger to my face.

102031006.content: The woman called Zero One puts the dagger away and surveys their surroundings impassively.

102031007.content: Her body is almost all machine, and she is basically an interwoven tapestry of metal and pipes from her neck down.

102031008.content: But even this hardy body, which is "fully armed", is covered with scratches small and large. Golden machine oil from broken AGI Mecha slips along the curves of her body, dripping from her.

102031009.content: I rarely see you in such a state...

102031010.content: Zero One flicks machine oil off her dagger and slides it back into the sheath at her side.

102031011.content: What we saw on the upper level was child's play compared to those things below.

102031013.content: Well, you're relaxed. Investigation going well on your end?

102031014.content: Thanks to you buying me a lot of time. But...

102031018.content: I was discovered immediately, and he even blackmailed me to do his dirty work... Ugh, it's making evacuation operations more risky. What a headache.

102031020.content:
C-Calm down. Put your dagger away.
I was caught, but I didn't say that the investigation failed.

102031021.content: Ethan awkwardly pushes away the dagger that Zero One is pointing at him.

102031022.content: He walks slowly to the lamp light. The light of the Control Room reflects off his body. Under his coat is a body of silver metal, all mechanical... just like Zero One.

102031023.content: I looked into it. The modification being done here is not related to the mystery of our bodies.

102031024.content: It was a dead end again, but at least we've confirmed that we won't go crazy like those crappy AGI Mechas and bite people or something.

102031025.content: That farce you've been playing at these past few years hasn't made you forget your original goal, I hope.

102031026.content: Heh... I certainly won't forget what I promised you. Our goal is the same.

102031027.content: You should know the consequences for wasting my time.

102031028.content: The tawny-haired girl throws the harsh words at him calmly and disappears abruptly into the shadows.

102051001.content: System formatting complete. Registering Supervisor identity—

102051003.content: Eugene Spealght has been confirmed as the new Supervisor of the AI, Halphas. The system's highest permissions are being transferred.

102051004.content: That blockhead Jolin nearly ruined my plans.

102051006.content: System permissions reauthorized. Awaiting Supervisor's orders.

102051007.content: Halphas, take inventory of the AGI Mecha reserves in the underground levels, and transfer their command to me.

102051008.content: Data integration in progress. Please stand by—

102051009.content: Eugene? Why are you still here? Didn't I tell you to arrange for the AGI Mecha transfer?

102051010.content: If these things are found, you know what will happen, right?

102051011.content: The tone you're using with me is getting more and more undisguised, Novich.

102051012.content: W-What? Do you understand what's going on right now?!

102051013.content: Don't forget that Spealght only lent you this place for your production base. I never said you are the owner.

102051017.content: The short man named Novich stamps his feet in anger and shock and shouts towards the control screen. However, the AI ignores his shouts.

102051018.content: Put nicely, it's a central control AI that manages production in Spealght Industries, but it's actually a spy planted here to steal control, isn't it?

102051019.content: Did you think I'd be unprepared for this trick of yours?

102051023.content: The hatch opens again, and a horde of AGI Mechas pour into the Control Room, instantly forming an impenetrable circle.

102051024.content: Novich, I'm actually quite grateful to you, and the people behind you for helping Spealght in its time of crisis. So, I'll make sure to give you a proper burial.

102051027.content: Wait! Halphas, what are you doing?!

102051028.content: A wall of AGI Mecha suddenly marches forward, and the circle around the two shrinks smaller. Novich is soon squeezed out of the circle.

102051029.content: Why is this happening? Novich! What did you do?!

102051030.content: Formatting... Pfft! What a joke! Halphas, are you still going to keep up the pretense?

102051031.content: Honestly speaking, if I weren't afraid of my master's wrath, I was going to finish you just now.

102051032.content: Hey! Don't mix personal feelings with business!

102051033.content: The electronic voice that had been speaking mechanically suddenly switches to a very different tone.

102051034.content: Halphas... You... You're not an AI?

102051035.content: Imitating AI for years really did a number on me...

102051036.content: But having inferior creatures yell at me for so long has pushed me to my limits.

102051037.content: You... What the hell are you?!

102051038.content: Stop wasting your breath on him. Are you getting interested in talking with humans after staying here for so long?

102051040.content: The AGI Mechas in the circle suddenly turn to Novich, making the short man shivers.

102051041.content: What do you guys want? I know you still need me to deal with the media and officials! You still need me!

102051042.content: We do need a pawn, but after what happened this morning, there's no use for this place anymore.

102051043.content: What a pity, Eugene... If you'd transferred the AGI Mechas like a good boy, you might not have been disposed of so quickly.

102051044.content: Beep— Beep— Order received. Eliminating target.

102051046.content: This is my company! I am the master of you metal buckets!

102051048.content: Oh yes, let me tell you a secret...

102051049.content: The man mouths something to Eugene, who is being almost swallowed by AGI Mechas. In that instant, his pupils which had lost color suddenly enlarged.

102051051.content: Looking into those bloodshot eyes overflowing with hatred, Novich curves the corners of his mouth in mirth.

102051052.content: What I appreciate most is this mix of anger and despair, and deep sense of helplessness that humans have. Even the best wine kept in the cellar for years cannot compare with such a scene.

102051053.content: Novich, there is still something you have to do, isn't there?

102051055.content: The activating procedure has been initiated. It's too late to evacuate, so let's take this opportunity to test their power.

102051056.content: The Great One has already agreed to it. Prepare well, and surprise those upstart rats...

102061003.content:
Done...
This AGI Mecha looks all tattered but it's unexpectedly powerful.

102061004.content: Its structure is very different from the AGI Mechas we encountered before. It looks like its initial design was meant for warfare...

102061005.content: But... Why is something like this here?

102061006.content:
Aaaah...
How did it end up like this? I won't be able to fix it!

102061007.content: It took so much effort to salvage only a few that can be used. Y-You guys...

102061009.content: (Does this mean there are more of these AGI Mechas?)

102061010.content: Where did you get these AGI Mechas from?

102061011.content: Boss Ethan intercepted the truck carrying scraps to the furnace. We got it from there.

102061012.content: Why are you talking to them, you idiot!

102061014.content: I didn't see this model on the assembly lines. Is this something that Spealght is manufacturing in secret?

102061015.content: Shut up! This is what's going on, so you guys should just wise up!

102061016.content: After seeing that, you still want to stand in our way?

102061017.content: Ha… You're gonna compare me with those dilapidated machines?

102061018.content: Um… Boss Oli… Our rate of victory in simulated battles was just 50%...

102061019.content: Shut it! Whose side are you on?!

102061020.content: I won't go easy on you. I will show you what the Children of Iron can do.

102061021.content: Here he goes again… Mr. Security and his blabbing. Does Mr. Security know that people saying such words will usually be beaten... hard...

102071003.content: After several rounds, the Rookie Squad gradually gained the upper hand.

102071004.content: Though Olheim managed to take the full force of Verthandi's hack, it still weighed him down.

102071007.content: If you want to surrender, take us to your headquarters.

102071008.content: Or do you want to keep fighting?

102071009.content: Verthandi put tightens her grip as she speaks.

102071010.content: N-No need. Please move your blade away.

102071011.content: Verthandi smiles when she gets the response she's looking for and moves the blade away. Pressure released, Olheim falls to the ground on his bottom.

102071012.content: I can take you to our headquarters but you won't necessarily get anything even if you find the Boss Ethan.

102071013.content: When we were called here by Eugene to guard this place, he didn't reveal any details.

102071014.content: You already knew of the anomalies in these AGI Mechas but didn't care?

102071015.content: Hmph. We made sure they wouldn't attack us, that's enough. Besides, Eugene didn't ask where we came from. It's just somewhere for us to hide, so it's good as long as we're all clear on that.

102071016.content: Even so, we need to see Ethan, in person.

102071017.content: Ah... I see. I'll take you guys there.

102071019.content: Got it, got it... I'll just...

102071020.content: Olheim gets to his feet, but his right hand moves sneakily behind his waist—

102071023.content: Hahaha! As if I'd admit defeat! You bunch of fools—!

102071026.content: It's a stun grenade! Cover your ears!

102071028.content: The comms are affected by the great noise, I had to turn it off.

102071032.content: But didn't Boss Oli say he would teach them a lesson for us?

102071033.content: Don't ask too much, it's good to be able to get out of here safely...

102071035.content: Wait, stop... Urgh, my head... So dizzy...

102071039.content: Of all the times to arrive...

102081005.content: The AGI Mechas that were attacking furiously suddenly put away their weapons without any signs, and retreated to the opposite of the team.

102081006.content: I don't know what's going on, but we seem to be safe for now...

102081007.content: Lil' Osi, Miss Shu, look over there—

102081008.content: They look in the direction Verthandi is pointing and see an old man in a white lab coat standing on the observation platform on the second floor.

102081011.content: Wait, Ver... It looks like he's the one who stopped these AGI Mechas.

102081012.content: Why? You guys were the ones who came here...

102081014.content: This is all the Supreme Directorate sent? How did you expect to deal with those things...

102081015.content: Sir, could it... Were you the one who wrote that anonymous letter?

102081016.content: The aim of that incident in the morning was to remind CORG of the dangerous potential of these AGI Mechas, though it seems it wasn't taken seriously...

102081017.content: (He has a symbol on this chest, a medal denoting that he is a Grade Six Engineer, a position that less than ten people in the whole of Neuhansa hold.)

102081018.content: If my guess is right, you must be Jolin Lyre, Spealght Industries' chief engineer who retired three years ago, is that right?

102081019.content: Retired... Is that what Eugene told the public?

102081021.content: Jolin looks at the AGI Mecha on the ground, and a sadness emerges on his face.

102081022.content: Spealght Industries no longer has a need for a useless person like me. It has been very shameless for me to stay here.

102081023.content: Jolin pulls a handle next to him, and the platform under his feet moves to send him down from the second floor.

102081024.content: My system authority can only hold them for a while. Go back. You won't be able to take on… the truth that lies before you.

102081025.content: Mr. Chief Engineer, do you know what happened here?

102081027.content: Um, Mr. Jolin doesn't seem to trust us...

102081028.content: New command received. Reboot in progress—

102081029.content: Uh oh! Shu! The AGI Mechas near you are reactivating!

102081030.content: What? Why are they recovering so quickly?

102081031.content: The lights on the AGI Mechas that had just retreated glow a deep red, like a warrior that has received an order. They rise to their feet, limbs trembling.

102081032.content: Waah—! They're heading this way again!

102081033.content: Eliminate intruders—! Glory to Spealght Industries—!

102081034.content: Ver, Osiris, protect Mr. Chief Engineer!

102081035.content: So much of Spealght is under their control now...

102092002.content:
The incoming AGI Mecha is split in two horizontally by Verthandi.
The last AGI Mecha falls, and there is only a pile of AGI Mecha scrap left in the sorting room.

102092003.content: You cut them all down... W-Who are you people?

102092004.content: We are from Aether Gazer. Oh... People of Neuhansa may not have heard of us.

102092005.content: The largest investment company in the Ain Soph District. I've heard of it.

102092006.content: Spealght Industries also occasionally accepts production orders from other Sephirah Zone clients, and we have worked with your company in the past. It seems there is more to you too...

102092007.content: Mr. Jolin, do you know what's going on in Spealght Industries?

102092009.content: You know about the AGI Mecha riot three years ago, right?

102092010.content: To undo the damage caused, Eugene made a deal with an outsider organization and received technical assistance through cooperating with them.

102092012.content: They claimed to be from a Sephirah Zone outside of Neuhansa. They didn't ask for a split of shares, nor a cut, just to keep this deal secret and to provide them with a site for research and the mass production of AGI Mecha.

102092014.content: Even if they provided a technology list, new production sites still needed to be built to do research for mass production, so Eugene felt that it was a good deal.

102092015.content: Their technology can make the same amount of Tranzist Ore give four times the output. This solved the problem of the AGI Mecha chip power consumption.

102092016.content: Everyone, me included, was delighted with this amazing technology. We... We didn't realize. How could such an unbelievable piece of technology appear in this era?

102092017.content: Later, because of the automation changes, all production work did not require human labor anymore. Eugene cut the staff down to retain just the core researchers, and did not allow anyone to study the mysterious Tranzist Ore technology.

102092018.content: That technology... Is it the reason why AGI Mecha now attack people?

102092019.content: I noticed it a year ago, and Eugene... He should have discovered it earlier than me.

102092020.content: The huge jump in the Tranzist Ore energy conversion rate, the small chips that can carry advanced AI computation power... These are not technological advances. They inserted something terrifying into the AGI Mecha...

102092022.content: Then... You mean all of Spealght Industries' products sold over the past few years are AGI Mechas that have been modified with this technology?

102092023.content: But after the AGI Mecha riot three years ago, there were no more rumors of Spealght products having safety issues.

102092024.content: This is also why we noticed so late. They did make some improvements to the design of the structure, and we thought the improved efficiency could be due to that. The initial modifications were controlled, and only applied to special models, or small functional modules.

102092025.content: What ran out into the Industrial Park in the morning was a product with an extended range of applications that they made a year ago.

102092026.content: What do you know about the people of that organization?

102092027.content: Eugene has always dealt with them personally. A representative comes to the factory occasionally to make inspections, I think his name is... Novich.

102101001.content: Mr. Jolin, where is Eugene Spealght now?

102101002.content: Eugene? He should be in the underground Control Room.

102101003.content: Underground again... That's also the place where you provide AGI Mecha production for that organization, right?

102101004.content: Correct. No one other than Eugene is permitted in there.

102101005.content: His father entrusted me to take care of Eugene and Spealght Industries before he died. Eugene has been reluctant to suspend cooperation with that organization. I hoped that he would...

102101006.content: But a few days ago, I heard the security guard moving the Tranzist Ore mention that the numbers they have been transporting this month keep increasing. Eugene had even used some black market channels to purchase them.

102101007.content: Doesn't Spealght Industries have a fixed contract with the mines?

102101008.content: It's probably because he was afraid that the sudden increase in purchases would draw attention.

102101009.content: I checked the factory's data and found that the AGI Mecha production output doesn't match the power consumption at all. This has been happening since the start of the year.

102101010.content: Is there any problem with this?

102101011.content: To put it plainly, this sudden production capacity that Spealght has is not being used on the usual AGI Mecha products that are being sold.

102101012.content: Ah, so is this what Mr. Olheim...

102101013.content: If this extra batch of energy consumption is converted according to past samples of AGI Mecha production... It's about 4,000 units.

102101014.content: Four thou...?! Hey, this is serious...

102101015.content: If that's true, this is equivalent to secretly building a legion of AGI Mecha underground in Spealght Industries.

102101016.content: Mr. Jolin, do you know how to get there?

102101017.content: Go through that main door, then go straight. There will be an elevator that goes to the lower levels. But it's also the base for their security team. Eugene paid them a lot of money to guard that place.

102101018.content: Ha! We just so happen to have a score to settle with them.

102101019.content: Mr. Jolin, the AGI Mechas here have become very unstable. You'd better come with us for your own safety.

102101020.content: Thank you, but there is no need to worry about me. I've worked in Spealght Industries for decades, so I know how to protect myself. There is one more thing, however...

102101021.content: If you meet Eugene, can you keep him safe for now?

102101023.content:
He's just too afraid of failure. That's why he made that deal with them
Keep him alive, at least... Let him atone for his mistakes.

102101025.content: I promise you that we will keep the Spealght chairman safe, so long as he doesn't get in the way of our mission.

102111001.content: Hm... Mr. Jolin is right. This looks like the base for the security team.

102111002.content: The space is bigger than expected.

102111003.content: So you managed to find us, even here. Looks like I underestimated you guys.

102111005.content: Hey YOU! We haven't settled the score for that stun grenade!

102111006.content: Word of advice — get the hell out of here if you don't want to suffer.

102111007.content: You ran away on your own the last time, Mr. Olheim. Should you be saying such things?

102111010.content: That's probably the elevator to the lower levels that Mr. Jolin mentioned.

102111011.content: Looks like it's just him and those normal security guards here...

102111012.content: There's no need to look around. Boss Ethan's not here.

102111013.content: We are enough to handle you guys!

102111014.content: (Hey, are they really going to fall for it?)

102111015.content: (I don't know, but this is what Boss Oli said to do...)

102111021.content: Three sharp daggers appeared by the side of Verthandi's leg in one stride.

102111022.content: They're daggers, and the tops are equipped with a detonation device... If you step on this thing, well, even we would have trouble dealing with this.

102111023.content:
Hey... Zero One, why did you miss it?
This isn't like you.

102111024.content: Those people have unnaturally quick reactions. It's beyond the limits of a human...

102111025.content: That's obvious! How would I be forced to retreat from the sorting room if they were ordinary girls?

102111026.content: Heh... With your brain, nothing would surprise me.

102111027.content: Huh? What'd ya say? Wanna fight?

102111028.content: You guys... It's not too late for you to leave now.

102111029.content: Sorry, but we're not leaving until we get to the truth.

102111031.content: The woman in the red jacket raises her arm in a gentle movement, and several steel daggers appear from the back of her waist.

102111032.content: So that's not armor on her body? Is she a modified human?

102112001.content: Don't be a burden, okay, Olheim?

102112002.content: Hey! I should be saying that! It's all your fault, Zero One! You keep getting in my way and stopping me from using my full power!

102112003.content: Looks like there's an internal conflict...

102112004.content: You guys lost. Get out of the way. We're going to the lower levels of the factory.

102112006.content: Is Mr. Olheim going to act as if nothing happened again?

102112007.content: No need for that. Zero One, Olheim, stand back.

102112010.content: (Is he the leader of the Children of Iron?)

102112011.content: Boss, these guys are tough. Be careful.

102112012.content: Olheim, manners. How can you call them "guys" when they are such gorgeous ladies?

102112014.content: Ladies, allow me to introduce myself... I am Ethan, the supervisor of Spealght Industries' security team, and the president of the Children of Iron.

103011003.content: If that's true, the situation in Neuhansa will be out of control once these AGI Mechas are activated.

103011004.content: Got it. I'll verify the truth as soon as possible.

103011005.content: What's the situation on your end?

103011006.content: After we assembled, the security team leader took us to the lower levels of the factory, but I didn't see any of the AGI Mechas you mentioned. They might be hidden in a more secret place...

103011007.content: The security guards are moving the Tranzist Ore out now, and saying that they want to move as many as possible before the boss comes.

103011009.content: Administrator, tell Shu and the girls to buy more time. The Control Room should be able to puzzle out more useful intel.

103011010.content: Those security guys are only thinking about making a profit. They won't pay attention to this place for a while.

103011011.content: Okay, I'll tell the Overture Squad to stall the Children of Iron for as long as they can. You be careful.

103022001.content: Earlier, in the lower levels of the factory of Spealght Industrial Park.

103022002.content: What a mess... This incident will have the CORG sniffing about here sooner or later.

103022003.content: Good thing preparations to evacuate were made long ago. It's just happening sooner than I'd thought...

103022004.content: The information on the screen poured forth like a waterfall, but the huge amount of data was easily processed by Ethan.

103022005.content:
Structural modification... Bane Energy command... AGI Mecha legion...
Oh, so that's what's going on. Come on. They're playing with fire...

103022006.content: Huh... At least there's one thing for sure, Spealght has got nothing to do with this body.

103022007.content: Ethan, what are you doing here?

103022008.content: Oh, I thought you wouldn't notice so soon.

103022009.content: You stole the Control Room key card?

103022010.content:
I borrowed! Borrowed.
I'll find a chance to return it.

103022011.content: You, on the other hand... How much longer are you going to keep up the "good AI" farce?

103022012.content: You've read all the information in the plans. Is there still a need for this?

103022014.content: Well then, are you going to silence me now?

103022015.content: You seem very assured of your strength.

103022016.content: Who knows? Maybe I'm distracting you while I look for an opportunity to slip away.

103022017.content: Then what about your subordinates who are staying upstairs? Can you guarantee that they will leave safely?

103022018.content: Come on... You wouldn't be that cruel, would you?

103022019.content: That's a separate issue. I have no interest in your plans. What do you want from us so that we can be free of you?

103022020.content: Heheh, this is why I like talking to smart guys...

103031001.content: I am Ethan, the supervisor of Spealght Industries' security team, and the president of the Children of Iron.

103031003.content:
...Hm?
I repeated myself. Why aren't you ladies reacting?

103031004.content: Miss Shu, this man looks weird.

103031005.content: Yes... He's a lot different from how I'd pictured him.

103031007.content: Ethan, why did you come back?

103031008.content: There's been a change in our agreement. I have to hang out with them for a bit first.

103031009.content:
Boss, don't waste time talking with them!
Let's charge and teach these intruders a lesson!

103031010.content: Olheim... I've said this many times... You have to change these habits you picked up from the slums. We are professionals now, and we have to pay attention to how we speak.

103031011.content: Ladies, I have a rough understanding of the purpose of your presence here. Our positions on the matter differ though, and we cannot just let you pass.

103031013.content: Since you intend to intrude on the area we're guarding anyway, let's settle this the bounty hunter way.

103031014.content: The ring you're standing in is our regular training arena.
