103031015.content: In the city we used to live in, Rostach, every bounty hunter guild has a place like this. If a guild comes to pick a fight on another guild's turf, both parties face off to settle the problem in the ring.

103031016.content: You mean... a match in the ring?

103031017.content: Great deduction. Rostach is a slum where nobody bothers to interfere, so disputes are handled in this fashion.

103031018.content: Everyone will bet all of his or her alcohol and money, and keep fighting until one party can no longer get up. This is what we call the Copper Duel.

103031019.content: How about it? Will you accept, or are you scared and want to leave?

103031020.content: Shu, agree to it. Baldr has already infiltrated the lower levels and she's deciphering the information. We have to buy time for her.

103031021.content: Hm, I was thinking that too... Looks like he won't just let us pass if we don't go along with this.

103031022.content: Sure, let's do it your way.

103031024.content: Oh and by the way, the Children of Iron have never lost a single Copper Duel!

103031025.content: We can start any time you're ready.

103031026.content: Oh no, no, no, I didn't say that I was going first.

103031028.content: Boss Ethan, you don't have to deal with these guys personally.

103031029.content: If you want to challenge our Boss Ethan, you have to get through us first!

103031030.content: Aw... As you can see, I can't help being so very popular...

103031031.content: Is the reason why you haven't lost in Copper Duel because you take turns fighting the same opponent?

103041004.content: The momentum of the attack was great, but the difference between normal humans and Modifiers became apparent after exchanging a few blows.

103041005.content: Oooh... What breathtaking strength. No wonder he's so afraid...

103041008.content: No, no, according to Copper Duel rules, you’ve already lost one round.

103041009.content: And now they are sticking to the rules...

103041010.content: I'll learn personally about your strengths. Well then ladies, do you need a break?

103041012.content: Well, looks like you're full of fighting spirit.

103041013.content: Defeat me, and the Children of Iron will let you pass. My rule is to put my money where my mouth is, and everyone, including Olheim, has been taught this rule. You could say that it's been ingrained in them.

103041014.content: Why does this sound entirely false...

103042001.content: He's good. I can't find a weakness in his movements...

103042002.content: Huh? Why are the movements slowing down? This is not good!

103042003.content: Oh no, every attack is short just that one bit!

103042004.content: Hahaha! It's not too late to surrender now! You ladies are cute, so I will still consider... Consider... Ah! Ouch!

103042006.content: Damn it! Did you use some sort of dirty trick?

103042008.content: Just now... Did someone's attack hit him?

103042009.content: It hurts... Ah... My back! My back is sprained!

103042010.content: Nope! Can't move anymore! Olheim, come here and help me!

103042011.content:
Huh? Oh... Okay!
Okay boss, but... What do we do next?

103042012.content: Notify everyone. Evacuate from Spealght Industries immediately.

103042013.content: Huh? Evacuate? But there are still some of our guys underground...

103042014.content:
I'll go meet them later.
The most important thing now is to — GET OUT RIGHT NOW.

103042016.content: Ethan, is it really okay to just leave like this?

103042017.content: It's time, and I'll handle the rest of the matter.

103042018.content: Miss Shu, don't we go after them?

103042019.content: The CORG people are already on their way. It's more important to deal with that batch of AGI Mechas.

103042021.content: Yes... You've bought enough time. Let's get down and meet with Baldr.

103051001.content: Can't do it, I need the password...

103051002.content: Password Error — Warning, one more error will enable freeze protection.

103051005.content: Do you have a way to crack it, Lord Mimir?

103051006.content: It's not very difficult, but according to Baldr's intel, it will take at least 10 minutes to do it.

103051007.content: We don't have that much time.

103051009.content: Beep— Authentication complete. Opening the gate.

103051011.content: Lord Mimir, didn't you say ten minutes?

103051013.content: Okay, hurry up and come down.

103051015.content: I've cracked enough of the Control Room to take command of the elevators, but I'm still short of gaining core intel.

103051017.content: Oh, the nearby security team seemed to have just received some message. They've moved the cargo boxes to the other side.

103051018.content: Speaking of which, the security team nearby seemed to have just received some message, and all of them ran away.

103051019.content: Look like they are indeed planning to evacuate.

103051020.content: Hacking into the elevator system is pretty obvious, someone will probably notice it soon though. You should hurry up and regroup.

103071002.content: Flipping and spinning in that air, Zenkibo destroyed the AGI Mechas, slashing at them and indulging in her own amusement.

103071003.content: Hey, the Administrator hasn't contacted us in a while.

103071004.content: It must be because there's no need to worry with Zenki here.

103071005.content: Or maybe they've just given up on us?

103071006.content: Hey, there's a really weird unit here.

103071009.content: Hm... Impressive. It actually took my attack head on! Looks like this batch of AGI Mechas is more sturdy.

103071010.content: Huh? What did you say, Goki? That's not an AGI Mecha but a person? Are you kidding...

103071011.content: Damn it! Which bastard made that sneak shot—!

103071012.content: Whoa! It really is a person!

103071013.content: Sobek, who'd been shot in the head, fights back his dizziness and takes wobbly steps to the two of them.

103071015.content: Who the hell fired that shot?!

103071016.content: That headgear could actually block Surefire's attack... Well, I just have to aim better next time.

103071017.content: Hey! It's a basic courtesy to answer when someone asks you a question! You! Kid with the gun! Were you the one who— HEY! WHY ARE YOU SHOOTING AGAIN?!

103071018.content: Strange... He's close but the shots are not accurate.

103071019.content: Zenki, he's not like normal people.

103071020.content: Yeah... But he doesn't look like an AGI Mecha either. Anyway, let's just knock him down before we ask questions.

103071021.content: Wait... I think I've seen you guys somewhere before.

103071022.content: Ah! I remember! You're the people who stole the AGI Mecha this morning!

103071023.content: Damn it! You're the ones who made me get scolded by Pops all day! Die—!

103071026.content: Apollo shoots an arrow at the figure moving at high speed.

103071027.content: While Apollo is concerned that shooting a full-powered arrow at a human would be bad, in the next second, Sobek's blade is cutting through the light arrow as easily as a hot knife through butter.

103071030.content: The light arrow didn't hit Sobek, but the time it bought let Zenkibo avoid the attack. However, she swung back too quickly and plopped to the floor in a mess.

103071032.content: Did you sense that, Zenki? Those double blades of his are Access Keys, and they have Divine Power.

103071033.content: But if he's a Modifier, why doesn't he fight the Visbanes? Why is he with these security guys?

103071034.content: There are cases where Modifiers are unaware of their mission and powers when they awaken, and it looks like he falls into that category.

103071035.content: Heheh, you know how awesome I am now! Watch me cut you all into strips!

103071036.content: Uh... It looks like there are problems with his personality too.

103091001.content: Spealght Industrial Park, Underground Control Room.

103091002.content: The central system has been cracked. Baldr stares in stunned silence at the information on the screen.

103091003.content: Proposal to build a stronghold inside Spealght Industries... 10,000... AGI Mecha legion... within two years?!

103091004.content: That's exactly what the Administrator said.

103091006.content: Boss Ethan, why are you back? Didn't you say to evacuate?

103091007.content: Baldr notices the noise outside and immediately hides in a corner of the Control Room.

103091008.content: I still have some things to take care of. What are you guys still doing here though?

103091009.content: We'll leave after we move the last box.

103091010.content: What? You don't want to live anymore? Evacuate right now!

103091011.content: Ah... But... This box of Tranzist Ore is of the highest purity. If we sell this on the black market, it can fetch a price of at least 50,000 Ain Soph Coin...

103091012.content: Are you guys really putting money above your lives... Wait, how much?

103091014.content:
Ahem.
Carry this last box away and I'll cover your evacuation in a bit.

103091015.content:
Yes, Boss Ethan!
Hey, give me a hand!

103091017.content: Ethan yawns and enters the Control Room after watching his subordinates leave.

103091020.content: Where's my comb... Oh, got it. Phew, I thought I lost it up there.

103091022.content: Ethan. I didn't think you'd dare to come back.

103091024.content: Why can't I come back? I've worked here for so long after all. I have some attachment.

103091025.content: I told you to block the intruders, but you ran away in the middle...

103091026.content: Don't talk nonsense. I only agreed to help you hold them back for a while, not fight them to the death.

103091027.content:
But I do feel a little bit sorry about this.
So I came through the secret passage and hurried here.

103091028.content: You were just afraid that I would do something to your subordinates.

103091029.content: Those girls are on their way here. I've tested their strength. There is no chance to stop them if we don't cooperate.

103091030.content: Are you trying to threaten me?

103091031.content: Threatening is such a harsh word. I'm sharing your burden...

103091032.content:
Heh. I can let your subordinates go.
But, as a show of your sincerity, get rid of the rat problem in the room first.

103091035.content: Before Baldr can react, a pair of scissors grazes her hair as it shears past her, thumping solidly into the steel column beside her.

103091036.content:
Oh... An unfamiliar face.
You were not in that group from earlier, right?

103091038.content: I was going to turn a blind eye, but it can't be helped when the Foreman noticed you too.

103091039.content: You are the one helping the girls above, right?

103091040.content: Heh, can you give me a break since I'm not the fighting type?

103091042.content: Ethan, just take your time if you don't want your subordinates to go safely.

103091043.content: Well, you heard him, Miss. We're working for someone and it's not easy to make a living.

103091044.content: (Shu and the others are almost here. I am bad at head-on combat, so what I have to do now is buy time...)

103091045.content:
Sorry, I have no intention of fighting you!
Bye!

103091046.content: Ethan! Grab her! Don't let her get away!

103101001.content: Hodur, there's a delivery for you.

103101003.content:
Message: Olympia Express, delivering love and hope!
If any goods are lost or damaged, please contact the courier Hermes.

103101005.content: The cardboard box is opened to reveal the latest model of noise-canceling headphones.

103101006.content: The gift was delivered in time. I wonder where Baldr is...

103101008.content: Your abilities... they're way above average. Is it because of your body?

103101009.content: Oh? Could you tell me more about my body?

103101010.content: Ethan strokes the fully mechanical body under his coat, and smiles bitterly.

103101011.content: I don't even remember who modified me. The price to pay for this power is huge.

103101012.content: Aether Gazer has the best researchers in the world. We can help you find what you're looking for.

103101015.content: Too bad Olheim told me that you're working with the CORG.

103101016.content: We'd never get involved with the CORG, and the same goes for them. Once they find out about us, they'll take us out immediately.

103101017.content: Is there no room for negotiation?

103101018.content: Baldr continues to step back, and she soon reaches the wall.

103101019.content: I can give you some intel on the CORG. It'll help you avoid getting caught.

103101020.content: Trying to make a deal? Haha... Sounds intriguing, but that Foreman doesn't seem so patient.

103101022.content: Is there anything else you'd like to add?

103101023.content: I can't say anything to convince you to let me go, right?

103101025.content: Well then, I guess I'd like to say...

103101027.content: I'd like to say... Shu, you are an idiot! Why aren't you here yet? Being idle on the job? If you're not coming, I swear I'll really die in the line of duty—!

103101029.content: Baldr shouts at the top of her lungs, attracting Ethan's attention. A gust of wind and a flash of silver... followed by a lance plunging into his back.

103101031.content:
There were tons of AGI Mechas chasing us on the way.
Good thing we made it in time...

103101032.content: What do you mean by 'made it'? I almost lost my life!

103101033.content: Heh. Well, with all that energy, looks like you're just fine.

103101035.content: He can actually still stand after being stabbed with an Access Key...

103101036.content: Ethan, who has been impaled by the lance, staggers for a few steps. He leans against the wall and pulls the lance from his body.

103101037.content: What seeps from the wound is not blood, but black cables and pulsing red electrical sparks.

103101038.content: Now that's not a nice way to greet someone.

103101039.content: Ethan, deal with them here and I won't bar your subordinates from leaving.

103101041.content: He is the one behind it all...

103101042.content: I'll fill you in later. I have the intel, so let's deal with this guy first.

103102001.content: Is dodging the only thing they teach you at Aether Gazer?

103102003.content: Why does it seem like his attacks are getting more and more disorganized?

103102005.content: Ver avoids the slash of Ethan's blade once more. Unable to stop the blade's move, it crashes into the control panel. Even though it's made of sturdy alloy, his blade slices through it like butter.

103102006.content: Don't go easy on them, Ethan!

103102007.content: I'm not! They are just so slippery!

103102008.content: Ethan pulls out his blade and swings at Verthandi again.

103102012.content: Oops. Relax... I'll finish them off with this next hit!

103102013.content: If you fail, I'll make your subor-... (Bzzt—)

103102014.content: The mainframe in the Control Room also stops functioning with the destruction of the last control panel.

103102016.content: From about the halfway point, he was definitely missing us on purpose, and then pretended like it was an accident destroying that mainframe…

103102018.content: Without answering, Ethan shouts at the blacked-out main screen—

103102019.content: Hey Halphas, you stupid bastard! Hear me? Hello—

103102020.content: Looking at the befuddled group, Ethan smirks and points at the camera in the upper part of the room.

103102022.content: That thing probably thinks we're still fighting now.

103102024.content: Ethan put his weapon down. Shu and the others don't rush forward as well.

103102025.content: It's pretty fun to trade blows with you ladies, but we all have more important things to do, so let's end things here, yeah?

103102026.content: So, this was your plan all along?

103102027.content: Ethan, all the people from Factory No. 3 have been evacuated.

103102028.content: But they've taken too much Tranzist Ore. They need time to load them onto the trucks.

103102029.content: As long as we get the hell out of this goddamn factory. I've tried before, and Halphas can only control things here.

103102031.content: It's the CORG's job to arrest us, right? And you might want to hear what your friend's got to say. I'm sure you'd love to learn about all the secrets here.

103102032.content:
Let them go.
He's not wrong. There are more pressing matters to deal with now.

103102034.content: Heh. See you later… Aether Gazer.

104011001.content: After Ethan leaves, Baldr and the Overture Squad are left in the ruined Central Control, all alone.

104011002.content: Let me notify Zenkibo and Apollo to meet us here.

104011003.content: Wait, Administrator. Listen to me first... We might not have time to wait for them.

104011004.content: There's the matter of the batches of modified AGI Mechas you spoke of, and... Now all of Spealght's energy is being transferred to the storage room—they plan to awaken all of those AGI Mechas...

104011006.content: Spealght made a plan called AGI Mecha Legion. They wanted to produce a legion of AGI Mecha that can completely take over Neuhansa within two years.

104011007.content: But because of what happened this morning, their plans got exposed. The wake-up process has already started.

104011008.content: Occupy all of Neuhansa? That's insane...

104011009.content: No wonder that voice kept telling Ethan to stop us...

104011010.content: Halphas... That's what Ethan called it. He's the one who's behind all this stuff going on at Spealght.

104011011.content: Baldr, how much longer until those AGI Mechas wake up?

104011013.content: Based on the current situation, the security team has been evacuated, but Spealght's strongest forces are probably still here, guarding the AGI Mecha. We don't have much time...

104011014.content: After hearing what Baldr said, Shu falls silent. It seems pretty obvious what she's worried about…

104011015.content: This is way more than we expected. This mission is too dangerous to risk the safety of our new members.

104011018.content: That's right. We brought the rookies along because we worried Apollo and Zenkibo wouldn't be able to perform an efficient search. Also, it was a good chance to give Ver and Osiris some practice.

104011019.content: But since things have progressed to this point, we should hear what everyone has to say.

104011021.content: I realize how serious the situation is and I... I still want to continue, of course!

104011022.content: Miss Shu, will I be holding you back?

104011023.content: Osiris, I didn't mean it like that... But it's hard to predict how dangerous this will get…

104011027.content: I will use the Mimir System to help everyone in battle. We must not let those AGI Mechas be activated.

104011030.content: That's right. After all, it's thanks to Ver and Osiris that we were able to find all that intel so quick.

104011034.content:
Overture Squad, continue the mission. Your primary aim is to stop the activation of the AGI Mecha legion.
The mission will be even more dangerous. Be sure to follow commands.

104011036.content: Admin, please keep watching our backs.

104012001.content: Ethan! What are you doing? Answer me!

104012002.content: After the Control Room was destroyed, the video images cut out as well.

104012003.content: Heehee... You got played by him, Halphas.

104012004.content: That bastard. Isn't he afraid that I'll wipe out all of his men?

104012005.content: No one knows what's happening in there. He knew you wouldn't risk turning against him unless you were sure.

104012006.content: By the time you are sure they've betrayed you, those security goons will have all retreated.

104012007.content: I'll send a vanguard force to stop him immediately!

104012008.content: Don't waste your time. We'd better make sure this plan goes through. If we let Modifiers screw this up, you are not to be spared.

104012009.content: Heheh... Tricked… by those humans. Oh... It's so amusing to see you like this, Halphas!

104012010.content: Shut your face, Novich! This is nothing to me! I never expected the duplicitous Ethan to actually stop the Modifiers.

104012011.content: Since the plan's been exposed, there's no point in covering up the legion. Let them come in. I'll make sure they won't be able to return!

104012012.content: You know how important the plan is…

104012013.content: And I know we don't really get along... but since things have come to this, I'll help you out.

104021001.content: Meanwhile… In the Spealght Preparation Room, after the security team evacuation.

104021002.content: Hello? Is anyone there? Can you hear me? I'm so hungry... Anybody?

104021003.content: What the hell? I just take a nap and wake up and everyone's gone?

104021006.content:
Asura hangs her head in despair.
But then... she catches a whiff of buttered toast.

104021007.content: Eat it. That's all the food left here.

104021009.content: Asura takes a bite of the toast without even looking at her visitor.

104021010.content: As Asura chews, Jolin comes in behind her, and unlocks her shackles.

104021011.content: I don't know why they captured you, but this place is about to get really dangerous. You should get out of here immediately.

104021013.content: I still have some things to take care of.

104021015.content: Well… how about I be your bodyguard?

104021016.content:
You gave me the toast. I would have starved.
Shouldn't I repay the favor?

104021018.content: Thanks, but this is not the time to joke around. This is much too dangerous for a common citizen.

104021019.content: C-Common?! I am the champion fighter in Core City's 79th Underground Boxing Ring!

104021021.content: As Jolin is stunned by the girl's response, he hears a familiar sound coming from the other side of the door.

104031001.content: Aether Gazer, Winter Squad Communications Room, Early Morning.

104031002.content: Winter Squad's Vidar reporting. Awaiting mission instructions.

104031005.content: Uh yeah. Total buzzkill… I was dreaming of catching the penguins in the Polar Region with Master.

104031006.content: In all that snow, my feet were freezing, and snow keep falling on Leviathan's face. But Master's hand was warm, gently and carefully holding Leviathan… making Leviathan's heart melt.

104031007.content: And then you screwed it all up!

104031008.content: I am not your Master, and I won't go with you to the Polar Region to catch penguins.

104031009.content: The Master has all but forgotten, but one day, Leviathan will make Master remember!

104031012.content: The Overture Squad's operation in Neuhansa is in danger. We need your help.

104031013.content: Overture Squad? From what I remember, they've got Shu and Baldr, and the mission was just investigating a suspicious factory…

104031014.content: We have made a mistake in our Spealght predictions. This operation is much more dangerous than we'd thought, and we're afraid it'll get even worse.

104031015.content: That was so bad...We should go now.

104031017.content: Rookie, I need to remind you—

104031018.content: According to Aether Gazer rules, there must be at least one team at headquarters. If we send the Winter Squad out, there will be no battle squad Modifiers stationed at HQ.

104031019.content: I understand... But if we wait any longer and something happens… it'll be too late. I'll take full responsibility…

104031021.content: The Command Room door opens and Hodur steps in with a stack of documents, likely having listened to the entire conversation.

104031023.content: I am practicing every day... I know I'm not up to the standards required for field missions, but if it's HQ duties, I'm sure I can do it!

104031025.content: Please, Lord Mimir. Let the Winter Squad help them out!

104031027.content: Aaah! Vidar, the mission coordinates have been sent to your comms device. You can leave after confirmation.

104031030.content: Hmph, I won't be responsible if anything goes wrong.

104031031.content: Huh? We're leaving like this? I haven't even washed up yet!

104031034.content: Looking at the two walking out of the Communications Room—

104031035.content: I don't know why, but I have a bad feeling about this.

104031037.content: Sorry, Admin. I shouldn't have made everyone so nervous. I'll go check around.

104031038.content: (Sigh)... It's just to prevent the worst-case scenario. After all, this building has never had a problem.

104031039.content: Glad to hear that. This must be an exception. It'd be way too much of a coincidence if something else happened, wouldn't it?

104031040.content: So chill out, Rookie! Plus… I'm here! Glug, glug, glug!

104041001.content: Why are so many Visbanes here?

104041002.content:
There are two possibilities. One, the AGI Mechas are leaking Bane Energy, which is attracting them, and the other—
is that someone opened up a Source Layer rift to make them gather here on purpose.

104041003.content: No... I didn't do anything. Why...

104041006.content: Encroachers will repeat things the corroded person said while they were alive. The more powerful the specimen, the clearer they'll speak. No need to pay attention.

104041007.content: After the visbane core is removed from the Encroacher, it continues to squirm on the ground. A large number of gray spots soon spread over its body before it dissipates into black smoke.

104041009.content: I'm fine... Just a little uncomfortable.

104041010.content: Don't worry about me. I'll handle it on my own. If you really want to get out of the observation room, you have to overcome these things sooner or later.

104042004.content: I remember now! Aren't you the chairman of Spealght Industries?

104042005.content: You couldn't be found anywhere. So you were here all along.

104042007.content: Eugene calls for help hoarsely while pulling a chain behind him.

104042010.content: Verthandi swings her blade and easily splits the chains around Eugene's hands.

104042012.content: Finally... I shouted till my throat's sore. I thought I was done for.

104042016.content: It was Halphas... I was betrayed by Halphas!

104042018.content: He was disguised as AI from the beginning, and backstabbed me at the last minute.

104042019.content: Was Halphas the one who provided you with the AGI Mecha technology?

104042021.content: Eugene tells everything about his interactions with the mysterious organization, and how they requested the production site. What he describes is not much different from Jolin's account.

104042022.content:
Are you hiding something?
After three years of working together, how could you not meet a single contact?

104042023.content:
They are extremely cautious, and all affairs go through Halphas...
You don't believe me?

104042024.content: Then who was your initial contact?

104042025.content: It was... a person called Novich. He first sent me an email, then there were several meetings. He always covers his face under mask and hood.

104042026.content: I've told you all I know. Can I go now?

104042027.content: The AGI Mechas up there are all out of control. They probably don't recognize you as chairman anymore.

104042029.content: We promised Jolin we'd keep you safe.

104042030.content: Great, so you will escort me out, right?

104042031.content: Not now, we still have some things to take care of.

104042032.content: Eugene, Halphas is awakening the legion of AGI Mecha you produced… you don't want to see Neuhansa go up in flames, do you?

104042033.content: Tell us how to stop them from awakening.

104042034.content: Halphas has full authority… but I know a place. Perhaps you can get access to the control authority from there.

104042036.content: If you stay here, those monsters can appear again anytime.

104042037.content: I-I see. I'll take you there...

104042038.content: Why do I feel Mr. Eugene's acting all weird?

104042039.content: Maybe he's scared by all the Visbanes around after being shut up in here for a day.

104042040.content: It's not that... Hm… I might be overthinking it.

104061002.content: Bah... You're just hiding far off and firing in my back! Come out and hit me in the face! Coward!

104061003.content: No thank you! Your two broken blades can't get past my super duper firepower, huh?

104061004.content: Damn it, damn it, damn it all!

104061005.content: Ugh... He keeps blocking our attacks with his blades… I don't know how long this will drag on.

104061006.content: Hey, Sobek. We've got news from Boss Ethan...

104061007.content:
What? Evacuation? Right now?
But I'm not done with these two idiots!

104061008.content: Everyone's loading up the trucks now. Nobody will wait for you if you don't get moving.

104061011.content: We've got important things to do! You won't be so lucky next time!

104061012.content: Zenki, don't let him leave! Take him to HQ!

104061015.content:
Cree—Scree—!
Vanguard forces! Target intruders detected!

104061017.content: While Zenkibo focuses on shooting, the floor next to her is suddenly pierced by something, and a mechanical arm sticks out of the floor.

104061021.content: Change in mission agenda. The Overture Squad and Baldr are at Factory No. 3, stopping the AGI Mecha legion from being activated—

104061025.content: Aahh! Why are these things chasing me and only me?!

104061026.content: Zenkibo manages to dodge the attack from the humanoid AGI Mecha with her roller skates. However, her bullets, which were working on the AGI Mecha just a bit ago, are now seemingly ineffective.

104061027.content: Did you just say… there's a legion of these things?

104061028.content: As the words are spoken, another AGI Mecha arm shoots out of the ground.

104061029.content: Judging from the number detected by the Mimir System scan, the ones active are just the vanguard forces.

104061030.content: Anyway, you and Zenkibo can try to move to the exit of the Industrial Park first. Prioritize the safety of the masses, and make sure not to let these AGI Mechas out.

104061031.content: Heh, got it. It's a really important task so, naturally, I'm the only one fit to do it.

104061034.content: Huh? Another one? How many are there?

104061035.content: C'mon, Zenki! Didn't you hear the Administrator? This isn't our fight.

104062001.content: Aether Gazer Commercial Department, late at night.

104062002.content: Ah... It got late before I knew it.

104062003.content:
I've been working so hard on this report, I didn't even notice how much time had passed.
I wonder how pissed my wife'll be?

104062004.content: After packing up his briefcase, the man walks slowly to the window.

104062005.content: This isn't the top floor but the view is still pretty awesome! I wonder what the view will be like once I'm up there.

104062006.content: The man stretches, and lets out a long breath as he looks over the Core City night lights.

104062007.content: Good work! Would you like some water?

104062008.content: The Service AGI Mecha moves closer and it is holding out an empty glass.

104062009.content: Orange juice, coffee, or warm water?

104062012.content: Nice. AGI Mechas in these big companies sure are smarter than those in town.

104062013.content: Hello. Orange juice, coffee, or warm water?

104062015.content: Based on the man's previous experiences, the Service AGI Mecha should wait until he finishes drinking, and then takes the empty cup.

104062016.content: Malfunctions? After I just finished praising it?

104062017.content: He reaches out and pats the head of the Service AGI Mecha, but all he gets in return is, "Orange juice, coffee, or warm water?"

104062018.content: Looks like the big cities have their share of problems too...

104062020.content: Hey, are you okay? You malfunctioning?

104062021.content: Orange j-j-juice—Orange juice—Glory to Spealght Industries—!

104071001.content: Eugene, do you really know how to stop the AGI Mecha legion?

104071002.content: To speed up production, Halphas purchased a large number of Tranzist Ore from both regular and black markets. We prepared three large reactors for this batch and installed them deep in the manufacturing room...

104071003.content: Halphas is well aware of this… So I'm sure he's set up a bunch of traps down there, and is lying in wait.

104071004.content: No worries on that… more traps and enemies means it must be important!

104071005.content: Admin, what's going on with Zenkibo and Apollo?

104071006.content: I just contacted them. The activation of the AGI Mecha legion has already begun, and some of the vanguard forces woke up and moved to the surface. Zenkibo and Apollo will have to try blocking them first.

104071007.content: ...Looks like we don't have much time.

104071008.content: Baldr, are you okay over there?

104071010.content: Sorry, I know I shouldn't interfere with the mission, but...

104071011.content: No. Sorry for making you worry, Hodur.

104071012.content: Don't worry. We will be back soon.

104071013.content:
Yeah! And I'll work with the Admin to guard the HQ...
And also, today's—(Bzzzzt)

104071016.content:
Attempting to connect... Connection failed.
The main server's safety system has rejected us and blocked all signals from entering.

104071018.content: Is Lord Mimir absent without leave?

104071019.content: Help us maintain the connect request to the main server, and alert us as soon as there is news.

104071021.content: Is there something wrong with the Administrator?

104071022.content: With the level of security at HQ, there shouldn't be any problems…

104071023.content: But we don't have much time, so let's focus on the task at hand. They'll contact us right away as soon as communication is restored.

104071025.content: Lord Mimir, why did you suddenly turn on the Safe Mode?

104071026.content: You're so slow, rookie. If I had waited any longer, the system would have been all gobbled up by those… crazy rats.

104071028.content: Mimir switches the main screen to the external camera of the Division Nine office. It shows a thronging horde of AGI Mechas repeatedly hitting the protective barrier constructed by the Mimir system.

104071029.content: The AGI Mechas come crashing and bounce off the protective barrier each time, leaving marks of data misalignment each time.

104071030.content: All of the computing power has been diverted to support the protective barrier, but it won't last long if this keeps up.

104071031.content: Aren't the AGI Mechas at the HQ all made by ourselves? Why would...

104071032.content: Last year, the Commercial Department purchased AGI Mecha core parts from Neuhansa to reduce expenditure. I'm afraid that also includes Spealght's...

104071033.content: I really shouldn't have said that when you send the Winter Squad. I didn't expect everything would go wrong like this!

104071036.content: Lord Mimir, permission to use combat firearms.

104082001.content: Orange j-j-juice—Orange juice—Glory to Spealght Industries—!

104082006.content: The male employee rubs at his chest in shock. He was almost torn to pieces by his company's own AGI Mecha just a few seconds ago.

104082008.content: The man he is talking to pulls out the sword that was stuck in the body of the AGI Mecha. The huge black sword that can easily cleave stone in two is as light as paper in his hands.

104082010.content: After moving away the huge sword from the body, the male employee finally sees the man's face.

104082011.content: No matter how important the work is, you should go home now.

104082013.content: I've cleared up the lower levels. Follow the main path as you exit… you should be fine.

104082014.content: There is no need to report what transpired today to the police, and no leaking it.

104082016.content:
The man watches the employees leave, then turns his gaze to the upper floors of the building.
He looks out into the darkness, at the strange red lights hidden in the night, and the look in his eyes turns grave.

104091003.content: There's something written on the console...

104091004.content: AGI Mecha Legion... Single Soldier Program... V-03... Kusherfang?

104091005.content: These things were definitely made for war.

104091006.content: What the… You even allowed them to pull this off!

104091007.content:
Y-You can't blame me!
They had already pretty much developed it when I discovered this thing!

104091008.content: Eugene, is this the place you mentioned where we can stop the AGI Mecha from activating?

104091009.content:
Yes. You hear that? That's the sound of those reactors Halphas installed to sustain the power supply.
As soon as those are stopped, the energy supply to the factory will stop, and without the signal tower to send out Wake-up signals the legion won't be able to move.

104091010.content: Eugene pulls out a black card with gold patterns from his pocket as he speaks.

104091011.content: It's a good thing you ran into me. This is the only card that holds full access to all of Spealght Industries. I haven't told anyone about this, not even Halphas.

104091012.content:
As long as the reactors are stopped, the crisis will be averted?
Seems too good to be true.

104091013.content:
Too good to be true!?
How many fricking AGI Mechas did we have to fight to get here!?

104091014.content: Hey, just hurry up and do what you've got to do.

104091015.content: Even if the AGI Mecha legion is stopped, we have to find Halphas. He is way too suspicious...

104091016.content: The Administrator hasn't contacted us so far either. I'm getting worried…

104091017.content: Mm... Yeah... Right, this should do.

104092001.content: Eugene uses the access card. The roaring not far off dies down.

104092002.content: It got real quiet real quickly… Makes me uncomfortable…

104092003.content:
Relax, the reactors are stopped.
Can you guys get me out of here now?

104092004.content: Yes, as long as the issue of the AGI Mecha legion is—Wait!

104092005.content: What's going on? The ground... is shaking?

104092006.content: I-It is! The floor is shaking!

104092010.content: Activation command received. Code V-03, AGI Mecha KUSHERFANG, activated!

104092011.content: The huge AGI Mecha, which had lain like a carcass, suddenly emitted an electronic roar like that of a giant beast. The reactors that had just stopped also resumed operations, and the fire and roaring burst from the other side of the darkness.

104092012.content: The reactors are restarted! And this energy... Are they in overload mode?!

104092013.content: Eugene! What the heck have you done?!

104092015.content: Heheh... You came to my most powerful creation all by yourselves. You're digging your own graves!

104092017.content: It's not fully developed yet, but dealing with your little group will be like crushing ants under a shoe for the Kusherfang!

104101001.content: Admin! Watch out on your left!

104101003.content: Bullets tear through the core of an AGI Mecha and it falls to the ground immediately.

104101004.content: (That was close... I took this one down, but this is the third time our protective barrier's been breached.)

104101005.content: Welcome to... Aether Gazer. How may... I help you?

104101007.content: The pinned AGI Mecha suddenly spit out an unexpected voice, causing the Admin's finger to pause before pulling the trigger.

104101008.content: It's probably the AI returning to normal. After all, it doesn't have that many Spealght parts.

104101009.content: Please be careful with AGI Mecha... Beware of safety... Do not... play...

104101015.content: Administrator...you are more decisive than I expected.

104101016.content: Lord Mimir said that it only temporarily recovered. Which means that keeping it around will be troublesome, right?

104101018.content: The protective barrier durability is weakening... Administrator, this place will be breached soon. Please return to the Command Room!

104101019.content: I'll make that call. And... I can't leave Hodur here alone.

104101020.content: Careful, the next wave is coming!

104102001.content:
I didn't expect you to be at HQ today, Tyr.
If I'd known I wouldn't have panicked!

104102002.content: (Tyr... I don't think I've seen that name on the member list.)

104102003.content: While sizing up the man, I notice that his eyes are on me too.

104102004.content: Mimir, this is the new Administrator?

104102005.content: Yes, but this one's still a rookie.

104102007.content: How about it? Leave Division Nine and come be my assistant.

104102009.content: No! No! The Admin is our very important… Um… important…

104102010.content: Anyway, the Administrator won't leave Division Nine!

104102011.content: Don't you try to steal our Admin in front of me, Tyr.

104102012.content: Sorry… I just like to speak my mind.

104102014.content: Hahaha, so you're a straight-talker too?

104102016.content: I can offer you a wage you cannot refuse, but I won't expect it to be a bargaining chip to persuade you.

104102017.content:
Besides... from that look in your eyes, you're just kidding, right?
I want to hear your real answer.

104102018.content: I will not leave Division Nine at this stage.

104102020.content: No matter. My offer stands. If you have a change of heart one day, come over to Division Three and talk to me at any time.

104102021.content: Tyr is a director of Division Three in Aether Gazer. He is also a Modifier, but he is not under our management.

104102022.content: (Other departments in Aether Gazer have Modifiers too?)

104102025.content: Argh, the remaining AGI Mechas are coming over again!

104102026.content: Tyr, you said you wouldn't interfere with Division Nine… Does that mean that you won't help us today?

104102027.content: I don't intend to break my promise. According to the agreement, matters inside this door—Division Nine—have nothing to do with me or the Valleyrand Family. If it crosses this doorway, I will not bother with it.

104102028.content: Outside this door, the Valleyrand Family has shares and stocks of everything in the Aether Gazer building.

104102029.content: Anyone who threatens the Valleyrand Family is my enemy.

104102030.content: Heh. Looks like we can go back now, Rookie, Hodur.

104102032.content: Don't worry. He just has to get serious, and he won't be stopped no matter how many AGI Mechas you throw at him...

104102033.content: I will end the Safe Mode. Communications cut out abruptly so… the Command Room needs you, right?

104102034.content: Administrator. I also think we should go back to the Command Room first.

104111002.content: The loud sound reverberates in the Industrial Park, as if it were not part of reality. The huge factory collapses like cards folding, turning into a smoking ruin in an instant.

104111003.content: It is a chilling scene, filled with the sounds of clamoring humans.

104111004.content: How did this... such collapse...so horrible.

104111005.content: Lord Mimir, how's the communication re-link?

104111006.content: It was done three minutes ago, but there's no response from the Overture Squad.

104111008.content: Administrator, this is Vidar and Leviathan from the Winter Squad. We've arrived at Spealght Industrial Park.

104111010.content: A factory just collapsed. The concentration of Bane Energy is thick there and we can't get close.

104111011.content: Everyone seems to have been awakened by the loud noise. They are all standing in the street in their pajamas.

104111012.content: Hodur, tell the Neuhansa government through the CORG to put up a cordon around Spealght Industrial Park and do not let anyone in.

104111015.content: Ah... S-Sorry... I'm getting in touch now.

104112001.content: Aaaah... What the heck! Even more AGI Mechas turned up after the factory collapsed!

104112002.content: Ah... Though there may be dirt all around, it still shines as bright as a ray of sunlight. I'm talking about myself, of course.

104112003.content:
So my precious and shining spirit has been answered by the god of fate?
Oh, if it isn't my dear colleagues Vidar and little Leviathan?

104112004.content: Um... Master, how about we go check somewhere else?

104112005.content: Are you okay? The Administrator's new order is to stop the AGI Mecha from getting out.

104112006.content: Oh, so you have the same mission as us!

104112007.content: Careful though. This batch of AGI Mechas is not like the previous ones.

104112009.content: Hum! In the face of Leviathan, these pieces of iron are nothing to write home about!

104112011.content: Leviathan swings the giant anchor, and runs towards the AGI Mecha, then swiftly runs back—

104112012.content: Whaa—! Master! What's going on with those things?! Why aren't my attacks working?!

104112014.content: Meanwhile, at the Children of Iron.

104112015.content:
Ah, my ear... my ear...
Hey, say something to me.

104112016.content:
Do you hear me, Pops?
Hey, Pops—! POPS—!

104112017.content: Why are you yelling so loud, you imbecile! You think I'm deaf or something?!

104112019.content: Sobek covers his head after a punch, aggrieved.

104112020.content:
Oh, that was insane.
If we came out a little later we would be buried, huh?

104112021.content: Ethan, there are three people who suffered minor injuries from falling rocks. The rest are unharmed.

104112022.content: What about the Tranzist Ore crates?

104112023.content: Only one more truck left. If we're gonna evacuate, we can have the remaining personnel on board.

104112024.content: Hm, it's faster than I thought...

104112025.content: After thinking for a bit, Ethan walks to the subordinates and claps his hands to tell them to gather.

104112026.content: Gentlemen, we've been here for half a year. You may be wondering, why is an organization with ambitions like ours, we Children of Iron, here in this place working as security guards?

104112027.content: It's to escape from the CORG for a while!

104112028.content: Shouts one of the security guards.

104112029.content: It's to raise funds for the next plan!

104112031.content: Good. You are all right, but not exactly.

104112032.content: Ethan waves his hand to quiet the subordinates.

104112033.content: I'm glad that you have not forgotten the ultimate goal of the Children of Iron. That's right, we are the heroes who will one day put an end to the CORG's oppression of Rostach! We will go down in history!

104112034.content: Safety, money, technology... These things you mentioned, are all necessary to fight a long war against the CORG!

104112035.content: But these are not enough. We lack the most vital thing still... POWER! And now, power is right in front of us!

104112040.content: Ethan chuckles and points at the humanoid AGI Mecha breaking out ofstruggling from the stone.

104112041.content: Bingo! We've been lurking in Spealght for this long to get ahold of these things!

104112042.content: Brothers! Knock these AGI Mechas out and carry them to the trucks. They will be our secret weapon against the CORG!

104112044.content: This got us money, weapons, and allowed us to avoid the CORG for six months. Woo-hoo!

104112045.content: What are you waiting for? Let's carry these AGI Mechas back!

104112047.content: Ethan, you just made all that up, didn't you?

104112048.content: Doesn't matter if I did or didn't… Good idea, wasn't it?

104112049.content: Can you guarantee that you will be able to control these insane AGI Mechas?

104112050.content: Well... I haven't thought about that. We'll deal with it when the time comes.

104121004.content: The operations room... Did it completely collapse?

104121005.content: And the comms device seems to be broken too. Not a good thing...

104121006.content: I'm still alive! Yes! I'm alive!

104121007.content: Stop shouting! Eugene, what the heck is going on?

104121008.content:
What... Don't look at me like that! The access card should have stopped the reactors!
Unless...

104121010.content: Unless Halphas already knew about the card, and modified it in advance... If that's the case, without him telling us, there's no way we'll know how to stop the AGI Mecha legion...

104121011.content: Miss Shu, let's just destroy the reactors!

104121012.content: Hey! Are you girls crazy?! A lot of money was spent on these reactors and... I mean, destroying these reactors will cause a large series of explosions that'll probably affect nearby residential areas.

104121013.content: Crap, I walked right into that one.

104121014.content: Instead of worrying about that, why don't you worry about yourself first?

104121016.content: What are you... a ghost?! You do nothing but hide and speak from the shadows!

104121017.content: Hmph... You ants are not worth my time. Besides, you've flipped the switch on one of my most powerful weapons. Your deaths are near.

104121018.content: The voice from the void ceases, and fine gravel begins falling from the top of the ruins.

105011002.content: Master, did you see that? Pretty cool, right?

105011004.content: Aw, I almost got hit. Thanks, Master!

105011005.content: Stay close to me. Don't go too far.

105011007.content:
Huh? Looks like there are people fighting over there too...
Is that the Spealght security team?

105011008.content: Nope, those people are all wanted by the CORG.

105011010.content: They're the ones who've been pestering us.

105011011.content: But they're also fighting against the AGI Mecha.

105011014.content: With the Children of Iron fighting with those AGI Mechas, now is our best chance at getting them, but...

105011015.content: Hey, rookie. There's an urgent transmission from the CORG.

105011017.content: This is the Supreme Directorate of Gaea. Is this Miss Shu, the one in charge of Aether Gazer?

105011018.content: Shu is not around right now. I am the Administrator in command of this operation. My name is #{nickname}#.

105011019.content: #{nickname}#? I haven't heard of you before...

105011020.content: Never mind. Point is, you can command the Modifiers over at Spealght Industrial Park, right?

105011022.content: We have a reliable source that tells us the Children of Iron, a gang wanted for attacking the Photon Rail, is also at Spealght Industrial Park. Please have your team members subdue any suspicious persons first and wait for us to come collect them.

105011024.content: Please respond if you hear this, Administrator of Aether Gazer.

105011025.content: But there are a large number of out-of-control AGI Mechas that could break out of the Industrial Park, and we can't spare the manpower.

105011026.content:
According to our analysis, the AGI Mecha breakout is inevitable.
We have contacted the Neuhansa government to cordon off the area and evacuate civilians. Please make the arrest of the Children of Iron your highest priority.

105011027.content: It's the middle of the night. There may be breaches in the emergency evacuation.

105011028.content: That's out of our control. This is real life, Administrator. Much like natural disasters, this cannot be handled without some losses.

105011029.content: But not being able to achieve perfection and whether you gave it your all are two separate matters...

105011030.content: I am obliged to remind you, according to the terms of our cooperation, the final judgement on the actions taken outside of direct relation to Visbanes rests with the Supreme Directorate.

105011031.content: This clause is the basis of our support for Aether Gazer in every sector. Please understand that we are not asking for your assistance as a consultant.

105011033.content: A newcomer who doesn't even know the terms of our cooperation? Even if Shu is not there, don't you have other people in command?

105011034.content: Ah... Although I also think the rookie is unremarkable, the Administrator is the only person who can make a decision on behalf of HQ at the moment.

105011035.content: Lord Mimir, mute communications for a short while.

105011036.content: Huh? ...Rookie, what are you trying to say?

105011037.content: I read it in the exam manual but I would like to reconfirm it. We should not be affiliated with the CORG in any way, correct?

105011038.content: No. We did receive some financial and political assistance in the early days, but they always rely on us to deal with the Visbanes and other complicated social issues.

105011039.content: So far, we've cooperated and complemented each other in many ways, given our respective abilities.

105011040.content: Hm... I see. Well, then it can be logical to assume that with such a good cooperative relationship, even if one of the parties were to occasionally be a little capricious, it wouldn't be a great obstacle to the cooperation so long as an apology is issued, yes?

105011041.content:
Glug Glug GlugI... That's correct.
Hm. What are you trying to do here, rookie?

105011042.content: Hello? Aether Gazer? Can you hear us?

105011043.content: Cut the comms please, Lord Mimir.

105011045.content: Uh-oh, rookie... There's no room for regret when you pull something like this.

105011046.content: Look, they're sending in another comms request now.

105011047.content: Don't answer. Pretend we activated the Safe Mode.

105011048.content: They won't believe you. A complaint letter is going to come in from them, for sure.

105011049.content: I'll admit my mistake then. Not now.

105021004.content: Jolin finds himself in a crevice at the bottom of the rubble. The white-haired girl pushes the stone slab above their heads away, and they see a faint light.

105021006.content: You forgot? We were walking when the ceiling suddenly fell. Luckily I was able to react quick enough!

105021008.content: He barely manages to stand up, supporting himself on the rubble. Smoke and dust lie before him, and his path is blocked by collapsed wall pillars.

105021009.content: Do you have a way to get through?

105021010.content:
Huh? You mean to go inside!?
What could be that important?

105021012.content: Jolin does not answer. He reaches into his coat pocket and takes out a worn-out black and gold card.

105021014.content: Spealght Industries' control card with the highest authority.

105021015.content: What? W-Wow. Why do you have this?

105021016.content: An old friend gave it to me...

105021017.content: Your friend must be someone, huh?

105021018.content: He's no longer with us, but... I made a promise to him. I must keep my word.

105021019.content: We poured our hearts and souls into building this business... It must not be reduced to a weapon that brings disaster and destruction.

105031004.content: Amid the booming shakes, a huge white AGI Mecha raises its spear, but freezes just as it is about to plunge it into the Modifiers.

105031005.content: Impossible... Kusherfang! What are you waiting for? Finish them!

105031006.content: The voice coming from the dome grows increasingly hysterical, but its calls do nothing to make the AGI Mecha move.

105031007.content: It looks like it ran out of energy.

105031008.content: Halphas mentioned that this AGI Mecha has not been fully developed. Looks like it can't control its energy consumption.

105031009.content: ...If this gets fully developed, I can't imagine anyone will be able to stop it.

105031010.content: Madness... This is madness. You are all mad! You know who I am, how dare you put me in danger like this!?

105031011.content: Well, I will not go mad with you! I'm leaving!

105031013.content: Eugene ignores Shu's warning, and runs out like he's... gone mad.

105031014.content: A legion? Dominate Neuhansa? What becomes of Neuhansa has nothing to do with me!

105031015.content: I just want to get the hell out of here and continue my role as chairman... Aaahh! What is this?!

105031019.content: Eugene takes a few steps and a dark red liquid suddenly gushes up under his feet.

105031020.content: The ground seems to turn into a gloomy swamp wherever the liquid passes. The dark red wraps around his legs and instantly changes into tentacles, dragging the man down into the floor.

105031023.content:
Verthandi is the quickest to react. She dashes out to Eugene.
But the liquid is quicker, and Eugene is dragged into dark red in the blink of an eye.

105031025.content:
Why did a Source Layer Rift appear here?
Could it be—

105031026.content: You wanted to see me? Well, your wish is my command.

105031029.content: That's right, he is a Cognizant Visbane.

105031030.content: The Cryptics' report mentioned that according to the evolution of species and the record of Visbane activities over the past few years, it is likely that a Visbane with full intelligence has appeared. However, that was just speculation...

105031031.content: Did you think that you could just defeat the Kusherfang and that's the end? Foolish Modifiers. You are merely welcoming an even more gruesome death.

105031032.content: The mad voice sounds like it's welling up from within, making it all the more disturbing. The eerie liquid that had dragged Eugene down begins to expand rapidly and surrounds the Modifiers in a flash.

105031033.content: It wants to pull us in!

105031035.content:
We won't be able to break free at this rate!
Ver, save your strength to stave off the Bane Energy!

105031037.content: The liquid under their feet suddenly becomes active and swallows them up like a giant whale jumping out of the water with its mouth open.

105031039.content: Get ready! We're going to the Source Layer!

105031041.content: Don't be afraid. Use your Access Keys to counter the corrosion! Slow down your fall speed and don't let the Visbane drag you down!

105031045.content:
As if your mind had just burst out of the deep sea. Besides your hand is a glass of water that had been knocked over who knows when.
Your wrist is a scalding red, and it appears that the hot water is what woke you up.

105031046.content: You look like you're in a lot of pain.

105031049.content: My chest tightens... like the first time a Visbane dragged me into the Source Layer.

105031050.content: That was months ago. Why are you suddenly thinking about this now?

105031051.content: No clue, but I have a bad feeling about this.

105041003.content: Although the Access Keys slowed the fall, it is still quite bad.

105041005.content: Looks like the corrosion here is more severe than in other Sephirah Zones due to the overuse of Tranzist Ore.

105041014.content: Why are you saying sorry, Lil' Osi?

105041015.content: Miss Shu, Sis Baldr... Please come over and take a look! Lil' Osi looks like she's in pain!

105041017.content: Osiris has collapsed to the floor, and is in so much pain she can hardly make a sound. Shu takes a step back and silently tightens her grip on her lance.

105041019.content:
She was quite stable before the mission.
However, all those battles, and then this sudden fall to the Source Layer...

105041020.content: Miss Shu, Sis Baldr... What are you two talking about?

105041024.content: Despite her confusion, Verthandi gets up hesitantly and backs away from Osiris.

105041025.content: The young girl's body trembles with pain, and the black Bane Energy that has gathered around her acts like it has found some rare prey and surrounds her tightly, spreading rapidly through her turquoise hair to her whole body.

105041026.content: The giant scythe in the young girl's hand disappears, and six faintly glowing sword wings suddenly unfold behind her.

105041027.content: Initially, it seemed like the Bane Energy would engulf her completely, but is now driven away by the wave of air generated by the vibrating sword wings, and the expression of pain on Osiris' face disappears.

105041032.content: The young girl is standing lightly on her toes, and is soon suspended in the air without any hindrance.

105041033.content: She ruffles the hair around her ears and stretches lazily, then slowly opens her eyes.

105041034.content: Ah, old friends upon awaking. How pleasant. I was able to get a good night's sleep thanks to you.

105041035.content: Osiris... what are you talking about?

105041037.content: She is Osiris' split personality... Ausar.

105041039.content: Do you remember when Osiris was urgently transferred to the Medical Department for treatment during rookie training?

105041040.content: I do, but wasn't that because her body... You mean Osiris was sent to the Medical Department because...

105041041.content: Ausar surveys the three Modifiers with her crimson eyes, and a smile curls up on her face.

105041042.content: What a shame. You couldn't get me surgically removed, huh? Shu.

105041044.content:
All those drugs and electricity... what torture. I suffered a lot, you know.
Given this rare opportunity, don't you have something to say?

105041045.content:
Oh! Well, well.
I did notice that I'm not shackled to all hell. And since your AGI Mechas aren't here to protect you, you don't know how to speak up, huh?

105041046.content: Then let me help you remember.

105052002.content: Ausar suddenly holds her head in pain. The sword wings that were about to pierce through Shu disappear immediately as Osiris issues the command.

105052004.content: Please let Miss Shu and the others go... I can give you my body... Ausar...

105052005.content: Ugh... You will regret trusting these weaklings!

105052006.content:
The two voices battle fiercely within the body of the young girl.
The six sword wings return to her side as she shouts in fury.

105052007.content: Hissing in pain, the glow of Ausar's sword wings grows increasingly apparent, and it covers the young girl's body.

105052009.content: Shu reaches out her hand to touch the light, but is immediately pushed back by the energy.

105052012.content:
After the strong light fades, all that is left is Osiris. Her body is covered in scars, and she kneels quietly in the pit on the floor.
Now, her eyes are no longer a harsh, callous red, but they reveal an obvious fragility.

105052015.content: The young girl falls over backwards right after speaking, like she had used up every last bit of her strength—

105052017.content: Whether or not a student is letting me down, that is for the teacher to decide...

105052018.content: But... I insisted on joining the mission and ended up becoming a burden to everyone.

105052019.content: You've been carrying such a heavy load, and you work harder than anyone else. Do you think I haven't noticed...

105052020.content: The loss of control and emergence of Ausar was an accident. No one could have predicted it.

105052021.content: Yeah! You're not a burden at all!

105052022.content: You see... There is no need for you to worry. Just rest and recover.

105052025.content: What a touching relationship. I was almost moved.

105061002.content: Wow. Who would have thought that you'd have enough time to kill each other. But thanks to your quarrels, the 'feast' I prepared for you is about to begin.

105061003.content: Halphas, stop the activation of the AGI Mecha legion!

105061004.content: There is no longer any way to stop the legion from activating. We will take over Neuhansa tonight and make it the base for taking over all Sephirah Zones.

105061005.content: You should be honored to be the stepping stones to my dominance. Unlike the rest of your friends, who will watch me destroy this old world bit by bit...

105061009.content: I'm... I'm not afraid of you!

105061010.content: There are too many of them... Don't move too far away. Form a defensive formation around Osiris!

105071003.content: No, I think I can try.

105071004.content: Asura stares at the metal wall in front of her and seems to have made up her mind. She raises her right fist to prepare for the attack.

105071007.content: With a roar, Asura stalks forward and swings. The blow does not hit the wall directly, but immediately after her fist flies, four steel arms spew out from behind her, hitting the metal wall.

105071011.content: Asura pulls back her arm sharply. Even though her right fist hadn't struck the wall, it is swollen and smoking, just like the four steel arms.

105071012.content: Moments later, several cracks appear on the metal wall, followed by a blast that blows a hole into it.

105071014.content: Of... Of course... I told you I'm the champion fighter... But it still hurts! Ow!

105071015.content:
Jolin walks cautiously through the wall.
The Control Room, in contrast with the mess outside, was surprisingly intact. The clutter inside seemed to have been caused by internal factors...

105071016.content: Looks like this place was preserved pretty well after the main door was blocked.

105071019.content:
I tripped over something...
Wait, is this?

105071021.content: How terrible... Looks like he didn't get out in time.

105071022.content: Hey... something wrong? You look pale. Do you know him?

105071023.content: Asura moves away the stone slab that is crushing the body, and they see at least ten bullet holes in the corpse's back.

105071024.content: Looks like it wasn't the collapse that caused this.

105071025.content: These bullet holes... These were made by AGI Mecha.

105071026.content: Unidentified organism detected! Preparing to eliminate—!

105071027.content: Preparing to eliminate, preparing to eliminate—!

105071028.content: Tsk... it's coming after us again! Mister, hide! ...Huh? M-Mister?

105071029.content: Jolin ignores Asura and is already standing before the central console.

105071030.content: I'm going to try to shut down the underground reactors from here. This is the only chance to stop them.

105071031.content: Using this... this access card that my old friend entrusted to me.

105071032.content:
Gotcha. Then leave these iron fellas to me.
I won't let them get in your way!

105082001.content: Meanwhile, in the Spealght Industrial Park.

105082002.content: Damn it! Is this ever gonna stop? Stupid lumps of metal!

105082003.content:
Boss! It's almost dawn!
The number of CORG here is growing fast.

105082005.content: Ethan, we've filled the trucks with the stolen AGI Mechas. Are you still wasting time here?

105082007.content: Ethan looks around and sees the Modifiers locked in combat. Not far off in the distance, a helicopter with the CORG logo is approaching. Ethan finally makes a decision—

105082009.content: A resounding flare draws the attention of the surrounding crew.

105082010.content: Brothers! We have enough weapons. Retreat immediately and don't let those CORG fools find us!

105082013.content: Amidst the cheers, a large number of security guards start to get into trucks, and a huge gap appears in the north gate, which had been guarded by the Children of Iron.

105082016.content:
Three golden arrow-shaped beams coalesce at Apollo's fingertips.
An arrow shoots from the bowstring and zooms at three AGI Mechas like a golden lion.

105082017.content: Their heads are pierced with light arrows at the same time, stopping them just as they are about to escape, and instantly removing their ability to move.

105082020.content: Thanks to Apollo's help, Zenkibo and Leviathan filled the gap in defense with lightning speed.

105082021.content: However, the number of AGI Mechas that are escaping into the Industrial Park is increasing, and without the help of the Children of Iron, they'll soon flood the streets.

105082022.content:
Give up, rookie.
With the way things are looking, the legion is going to extend to the whole of Neuhansa unless a miracle occurs.

105082024.content: Code Z-01, Legion Type AGI Mecha - Battlefield, eliminate target—!

105082028.content:
Thunder Squad, Winter Squad!
Abandon the AGI Mecha mission. Prioritize your own safety—

105082029.content: Before the command is fully issued, something unexpected happens.

105082030.content: The AGI Mechas that had been circling the crowd aggressively suddenly stop moving. Starting with the front row, their red eyes go out, one by one.

105082031.content: The back row rammed into the front, and the legion fell like dominoes, causing a booming crash in the Industrial Park.

105082034.content: Wait. I'll go check it out.

105082035.content: Apollo cautiously puts his bow away and goes to investigate.

105082036.content: Yup. They all stopped. Those red lights... It looks like someone cut off their power supply.

105082038.content: Who cares... Point is, we can take a breather, right?

105082039.content: Just in case, we'd better check if any of them are still active.

105082042.content: Lord Mimir, can you arrange for me to take the nearest Photon ship to Neuhansa?

105082043.content: Hm? Do you want to go there right now?

105082044.content: The AGI Mecha legion is under control for now, but we still can't get in contact with Ver and the others. I want to go over and look for them.

105082045.content: But... You can't travel if you don't have a Mod with you.

105082046.content: I can go with the Administrator.

105082048.content: It's fine. And I'm worried about my sister too.

105082049.content: I see. I'll arrange for transport to take you to the Photon Rail.

105091002.content:
H-How could this be... Why?!
Why did the reactors stop?

105091004.content: Which means the legion has stopped?!

105091005.content: I don't know who did it, but that's great.

105091006.content: Now we have to worry about how to get out of here...

105091007.content:
I've planned this for so long, I... I can't fail now!
Did you do this, you damn Modifiers!?

105091008.content: Halphas channels his anger towards Ver and the others.

105091009.content: No... but boy do I like seeing you mad. Eh? Eeeeek—!

105091011.content: A white mist rises from the ground where they are standing and the furnace core under the metal net begins cranking at high speed, sharply increasing the temperature of the surroundings.

105091014.content: Watch out! All that commotion seemed to cause some serious changes in the Visbanes!

105092004.content: Yeah. They stopped moving after you finished up at the control panel.

105092005.content: Asura points at the AGI Mechas that have collapsed in the doorway. She confirmed that they would not attack before walking over.

105092007.content: Sorry... It's my fault for missing one. That's why you got hurt.

105092008.content:
It's nothing.
Can you help me up?

105092009.content: With Asura's support, Jolin slowly walks towards the crushed corpse.

105092010.content: Spealght Industries, it's about to become history...

105092011.content: I promised Popper that I would guard this business. We put everything into this... yet I destroyed it with my own hands...

105092012.content: Jolin leans down and stuffs the access card into the man's pocket.

105092013.content: You have made an irreparable mistake, but you have paid for it.

105101001.content:
Recover the AGI Mechas on the ground and watch out for any that are still moving!
Stay on your toes!

105101002.content: And don't lift the cordon outside! Citizens are not allowed in!

105101004.content: After assigning tasks to his men, the man turns his attention to the four young people in the center of the ruins.

105101005.content: (So they're the Aether Gazer operatives? Why do they all look younger and younger... Is that a child!?)

105101006.content:
Greetings, we're the special team sent by the Supreme Directorate.
Management of this site has been transferred to us, so please rest assured.

105101007.content: Okay... We'll leave it up to you.

105101008.content: In addition, we have something we would like to clarify. About your encounter with the Children of Iron in Spealght Industrial Park...

105101010.content: Sorry, the details will be written in a report later and submitted to the CORG.

105101011.content: Ah, you're here, Administrator! And Hodur too!

105101012.content:
We can also send a member to the CORG to give more details if needed.
But right now there are still some of our team members trapped inside, and they need to be rescued immediately.

105101015.content: In that case, we'll pull manpower from our side to cooperate with your search and rescue efforts.

105101016.content: Thank you, but the situation is pretty complicated. It's better for us to deal with it ourselves.

105101019.content: Hodur nods and takes out a bracelet-like device and puts it on her wrist.

105101020.content: It projects a value that's fluctuating from 0 to 5. As Hodur moves slowly towards the Quake zone, the number shoots up to above 70.

105101021.content: The Bane Energy is weaker than before, but it's still in the high range.

105101022.content: Get Vidar and the others to activate their Access Keys. That should counteract the effects of this level of Bane Energy.

105101023.content: But you're just a human, Admin...

105101024.content: It's okay, I can take it. I want to go in with the team to look for Ver and the others.

105101027.content: When you activate the Access Keys, surround the rookie. That will help #{nickname}# withstand the first wave of the strongest Bane Energy attack.

105101028.content: Vidar and the other teammates raise their Access Keys and surround the Administrator.

105101029.content: When the glittering silver light appears, we rush towards the ruins of the factory that is overflowing with Bane Energy.

105101034.content: Yes. We're in the factory now.

105101035.content: The Bane Energy here is much less concentrated than earlier. It seems the effects of Quakes are concentrated on the external barrier.

105101036.content: We got in, but the factory is very big. Where should we start?

105101037.content: When I lost communication with Baldr, they were in the underground manufacturing room at Spealght. But the elevator leading down there was destroyed by the collapse.

105101038.content: Humph! It doesn't matter. Surefire can blast out a path for us!

105101040.content: Huh? Why not? You don't trust Zenki?

105101041.content: That's not what I mean... But if you just blast holes in there, a second collapse will occur...

105101042.content: Master's right! Don't blast the place!

105101043.content: So how are we getting down?

105101044.content: Vidar looks around speechless and stands on a tall pile of rocks.

105101048.content: Got it! Well then, Zenki BOMB!

105101050.content: Zenkibo dashes off before the Admin even finishes speaking.

105101051.content: That's the right direction, but nobody told her how much power to use, right?

105101052.content: Seemingly in response to Apollo's words, a loud boom sounds off nearby.

105101053.content:
(Cough)... (Cough)—!
Hey—! Didn't you say it wouldn't explode?!

105101055.content: We arrive at Zenkibo's location and the debris is falling directly into the manufacturing room where Ver and the others had been.

105111004.content: Comms are kinda back up. It seems someone is trying to establish a connection with us.

105111005.content: It must be the Admin and the others!

105111007.content: No, the device is too badly damaged. The Source Layer is interfering too, so it's only picking up a weak signal.

105111008.content: Don't even think about reuniting with your friends. You'll all be buried here today!

105111010.content: A dark shadow suddenly falls from midair. As the screams come closer, hot steam bursts from under the metal net, catching the falling figure.

105121001.content:
Weapon switch! Weapon switch! Switch!!!
Damn it! Activate—!

105121003.content: Steam is coming out from the massive armor from overheating. Baldr takes fires off rounds into the gaps in armor.

105121004.content: Divine Grace slams about inside the armor like a lit cannon barrel, and the defensive wall built by Bane Energy is breached from the inside. Halphas lets out a cry of pain and disbelief.

105121005.content: Impossible! Impossible impossible! IMPOSSIBLE!!! Master Turing gave me this body! You fools will never—!

105121008.content: As the armor collapses, a black shadow races out from the fire.

105121009.content: It drags a broken membranous wing covered in black spots, and its body is covered with corroded Tranzist Ore. Six legs grow from its back, and two cover its ugly face while four are on the ground, running madly.

105121010.content: No! No—! Don't look at me! Don't look at me when I'm like this—!

105121011.content: The black shadow's mad dash stops when a lance penetrates its wing membrane. It screams and touches the wound, trying to pull out the lance in its broken wing. However, the Divine Power emanating from the lance causes the body to dissipate as soon as it touches it.

105121013.content: Realizing that its remaining strength is not enough to pull the lance out of itself, it tears off its broken wing. However, just as it starts moving again, a blade emitting a strong red light slices its body.

105121015.content: The body, cut up by the blade, disperses into a black mist, and a heart-like crystal can be seen, glowing red and pulsing with Bane Energy.

105121016.content: That's the core! Ver, don't let it escape!

105121017.content: And this... is for Neuhansa, and all the innocent people of Spealght—!

105121018.content: The blade filled with Divine Power slashes straight at the crystal—

105121019.content: The exposed core tries to gather the surrounding Bane Energy to resist, but the power of the blade overwhelms it. The crystal and the black mist gathered around it are swallowed up by the light.

105121021.content: Exhausted, Verthandi takes several steps backward and leans on her blade to stop herself from collapsing.

105121025.content: With Halphas defeated, the red mist shrouding the top of the Source Layer gradually disperses. A ray of light shines from above, like the light after the dawn.

105121026.content: Someone's using the Access Key to open up an exit from the Source Layer...

105121030.content: Cognizant Visbanes? I didn't expect Spealght Industrial Park to be hiding something like that.

105121032.content: I didn't expect Hodur and the Administrator to come.

105121034.content: By the way, how is Osiris...

105121035.content: Not great. She still hasn't woken up yet.

105121036.content: Speaking of which... You... You look familiar!

105121037.content: Huh? Uh—! D-Don't point that gun at me! I'm an injured man!

105121038.content: He's the chairman of Spealght Industries, Eugene.

105121039.content: Oh, I remember. The guy bragging to the reporters this morning.

105121040.content: He's not the mastermind behind this... but that doesn't mean he's not partially responsible. We'll have to bring him to the CORG.

105121042.content:
But... why did the AGI Mecha legion stop all of a sudden?
I thought you did it when I was in the Source Layer.

105121043.content: No, that iron fella was also fighting with Leviathan when it stopped and was like "Ding, crack, thud"!

105121044.content: Hey dummy, ain't no one gets what you're saying!

105121045.content: Leviathan is not a dummy!!!! Humph! You explain it then!!!

105121046.content: Yeah! We were fighting with those metal things and they were all like "Dingy, crack, thud!!!" They just stopped!

105121048.content: In other words, you have no idea who stopped the AGI Mecha legion, right?

105121050.content:
The group looks toward the sound and see two people walking forward.
The older one seems to be injured, relying on the support of the young girl to walk forward.

105121051.content: He risked his life to stop those berserk machines.

105121053.content: Hello there, Aether Gazer. Looks like your friends are here too, and... Oh?

105121060.content: Baldr, get out of the way!

105121062.content: Baldr's back lights up with an eerie, purple glow. She moved instinctively out of the way, but it was too close, and struck her back.

105121067.content: Tsk... I could have just killed her... If you haven't warned her...

105121069.content: I remember your laugh... You're the one who came to talk to Eugene three years ago.

105121071.content: Vidar is the first to react. She swings her axe in Novich's direction, and the edge of the axe seems like it's cutting directly through Eugene as if it had slashed into the air.

105121073.content: You win this time, but don't think this is over.
