105121074.content: This is just the beginning... prepared by the Great One and myself. We will meet again.

105121077.content: This doesn't look good. These aren't normal injuries. There's Bane Energy close to the wound...

105121078.content: Think of it... as a parting gift.

105121081.content: Vidar raises her axe again, but this time, Novich just disappears in the air.

105121083.content: Admin, come quick and check on Sis Baldr!

105131001.content: One hour after the Spealght operation, Aether Gazer HQ.

105131004.content: All the surgical lights in the Emergency Room are dark. The people coming out of the room to say nothing. The air is so still you could hear a leaf fall.

105131006.content: It's okay, Administrator. Baldr's life is not in any danger. But...

105131007.content: The Medical Department did their best. No one has seen symptoms like these before... The Bane Energy went directly into Baldr's body, and it can't be removed, whether by medical tools or Divine Power.

105131008.content: If it can't be removed, what happens?

105131009.content: It will not get to the extent that it would be life-threatening, but... There's no telling when Baldr will wake up.

105131011.content: She is still in the ward and refuses to leave...

105131012.content:
Leave her alone with Baldr for a while.
But also pay attention to her physical condition. She's had a long day.

105131016.content: She is in the recuperation room. She's awake, but she just... isn't willing to talk to anyone.

105131017.content: How did things turn out like this?

105131018.content: We've asked The Cryptics to analyze the data on the Cognizant Visbane. The CORG will also track the Spealght incident to find out where all this came from...

105131019.content: The enemy caught us off guard this time... and I'm afraid there is more to come.

105131020.content:
Halphas, Novich, and that Great One that they mentioned...
Things are far from over.

105131021.content: Rookie, Shu, there is an emergency comm from another Sephirah Zone.

105131023.content: Yes, it's from Kuninotokotachi, a member of the Pheasant Squad in Sasanami.

106021001.content: Still no news from the Izuru Family?

106021002.content: Nope... And Lord Masayoshi left two hours ago. I mean... if he doesn't make it, I'm sure the Miyahebi Family will send someone to check it out.

106021004.content: This is all my fault. Lord Masayoshi had to go to the banquet alone, all because I wanted to see the lanterns.

106021005.content: Lord Masayoshi has to attend the banquet of the Water Lantern Festival every year, and he doesn't want to bring guards with him. Don't blame yourself.

106021006.content: As requested, I've contacted Tsukuyomi. She'll be here soon.

106021007.content: It was my fault... I... I have to find Lord Masayoshi before Master arrives...

106021008.content: Well, the Water Lantern Festival is really important to the Miyahebi Family. Usually, the Lord of the family leads the people in prayer, and they worship their Protector God into the depths of the night. So... why is it this quiet now?

106021009.content: Whatever the reason, Lord Masayoshi disappeared after he arrived here. The only thing we can do now is to search all over the Miyahebi Family.

106021010.content: You and Mininja check the inner courtyard. I'll head to the front courtyard to get the attention of the guards and try to figure out what happened.

106031002.content: Buzenbo, there are too many guards here.

106031003.content: Why is the security so tight? It's just a banquet...

106031007.content: Buzenbo rubs her leg and, from the grass, grabs a snake as black as the night.

106031008.content: Its fangs are dripping with Buzenbo's blood, but it continues to hiss fearlessly, unfazed by the fact that it's been caught.

106031010.content: As Buzenbo is distracted by the black snake, several massive shadows surround her, and it's unclear how long they've been there.

106031011.content: So... you are the guards of the Miyahebi Family?

106031012.content: They don't respond. With sharpened blades in hand, they rush forth towards her right shoulder without a hint of hesitation. Buzenbo relies completely on intuition to avoid the strike.

106031013.content: She stares at the white blade sinking right in front of her. If she were just a normal person, that blade would've sliced her arm clean off.

106031016.content: Wait, I'm a retainer from the Izuru Family!

106031018.content: Buzenbo, I am detecting a massive amount of Bane Energy. They're Visbanes!

106041001.content: In the main house of Miyahebi Family, two men, one elder and one younger, sit across from each other, playing a round of Go.

106041002.content: It is time for the elder to make his move. He holds a white stone in his hand, but his movements are slow, and he does not place it on the board.

106041003.content: You used to attack with such ferocity. I've never seen you hesitate this long, my dear uncle-in-law.

106041004.content: I have always maintained the principles of focus and stability. Don't forget, back then you were just a child. I was trying to teach you the basics.

106041005.content: Interesting. So, your teaching method was to mercilessly crush your student? Hahaha! Such a spinner of words, no wonder you're the Prime Lord. I ought to take heed.

106041006.content: You are my nephew, and also a Lord of the Sasanami Five. If you are interested in the art of ruling, you may study as long as you like.

106041007.content: As long as I like? Well, how long do you think I should study?

106041008.content: Governance is no simple matter, especially with something as complicated as Sasanami.

106041009.content: I must deal with a few... tricky matters. Then, I will allow the people of Sasanami to choose a Prime Lord that they trust. I do not wish to see power circulating endlessly throughout the Sasanami Five.

106041011.content: And before that happens, I hope you can help me, Syuu.

106041012.content: The younger man's hand stops, stone in hand. It's unclear if he is thinking about his next move, or if he is surprised by the unexpected request.

106041013.content: Given everything you could accomplish by my side, with my support, I'm sure that the people of Sasanami will agree that you will be the best choice for the Prime Lord.

106041014.content: Uncle Masayoshi... this move is incorrect.

106041016.content: If I put the black stone here, won't I take this whole circle?

106041017.content:
Ha... You have made much progress.
After all, it's been a long time since we've played.

106041018.content: When Auntie was still around, my father used to say that the Izuru Family and the Miyahebi Family were bonded.

106041019.content: The reason the Izuru Family took over the Miyahebi Family's fishing zone was to help us pacify the restless fishermen. Sooner or later it was supposed to be returned to us.

106041020.content: After Auntie passed away, you didn't marry again. My father said that even though his sister was gone, our relationship with you would not change.

106041021.content: And then... My father joined Auntie. I remember you wearing mourning garments and coming to grieve him in even the worst of weather.

106041022.content: You told me that the Izuru Family should temporarily take on the duty of the Miyahebi Family's Prime Lord until we had finished Mourning, despite it being Miyahebi's turn.

106041023.content: Even though I was the only one left, I didn't feel like I was without a family, because I knew that you were there. From that point on, I respected you as I would respect my own father.

106041024.content:
I never had children with your Auntie.
Syuu, I see you as a son.

106041025.content: And yet... A family loses the industry it relies on to survive, and then, overnight, the Lord dies in a fire which burns down the family manor. What's more, the Miyahebi Family's last shred of hope, their rightful place as Prime Lord, is stolen by the person they trust the most...

106041026.content: The Sasanami Five are ruthless. A family like ours, we have nothing... If we wish to survive, have you ever thought about what type of power we would need to do so?

106041029.content: Let Orochi take care of them. You... take note.

106041031.content: Lord Masayoshi, I mean... the Prime Lord. It's been too long.

106041032.content: What happened to you? Why do you look like this?

106041033.content: Let's just say I was lucky enough to survive that fire. Now, I am the Strategist of the Miyahebi Family.

106041035.content: Uncle Masayoshi, have you read the ancient histories of the Sasanami?

106041036.content: They say that during the early years of Sasanami's power, there was a great Shogun who unified the land.

106041037.content: He heeded the commands of the God of Heaven, fighting off the southern barbarians, gathering his disciples, and with the help of his ministers, ruled Sasanami for more than two hundred years.

106041038.content: Back then, I don't even think the term Prime Lord existed.

106041039.content: So... you'd like to rule like the great Shogun, with force?

106041040.content: In Sasanami, people who don't have their own power should've been torn apart by those jackals long ago, don't you agree?

106041041.content: Four years ago, that fire took everything away from me... Ever since then I've wondered what I did wrong to be cursed to suffer these disasters.

106041042.content: But now I realize that the only thing I have done wrong, is that as the successor to the Miyahebi Family...

106051001.content: I've had someone take Izuru Masayoshi to the secret room.

106051003.content: Why didn't you tell him about the letter from the Karasugo Family?

106051004.content: The one saying that the Izuru Family was the one who caused the fire?

106051007.content: Izuru Masayoshi has done something wrong indeed. But four years ago the relationship between our families was strong. And his wife was a Miyahebi... he wouldn't do something like that.

106051008.content: Indeed. He may be a fool, holding on dearly to a naive idealism... but he is not a raving lunatic who loses control. He wouldn't have burned down the Miyahebi Family four years ago.

106051009.content: The Karasugo Family wants to use this little trick to make me deal with Izuru Masayoshi. They hope that we destroy each other. After all, that would leave the Karasugo Family as the most powerful house in Sasanami.

106051010.content: For them to spread such lies... That is simply too much.

106051011.content: Maybe. But the greater the lie, the more they can benefit from those who believe it.

106051012.content: And it is not only the Karasugo Family. Everyone thinks I am nothing more than a pawn, who can be used at will however they please.

106051013.content: Sooner or later... I will make them pay for their stupidity.

106051014.content: Since you know the letter is a lie, then why detain Izuru Masayoshi?

106051015.content: The validity of the letter is not important to me. All I want is the power over Sasanami.

106051016.content: Orochi has told me she is almost fully recovered.

106051017.content: It is time... to put the plan into action.

106061001.content: The corridor in the front courtyard.

106061002.content: Lord Masayoshi was going to attend the banquet of the Water Lantern Festival, so if he came here, the guards at the main gate must have seen him.

106061003.content: And yet the guards outside the gate said that no guests had arrived tonight and that I couldn't check out the inside. They must've been tipped off.

106061004.content: If please and thank you doesn't work, just let the blade do the talking.

106061006.content: Shhhh... If anyone comes over, your throat is gonna suffer.

106061007.content: Kuninotokotachi picked out a guard that was out on her own and swiftly swept up behind her, sticking a dagger to her throat.

106061009.content: Tell me. Did the Prime Lord come here tonight?

106061016.content: Kuninotokotachi swiftly backs off her victim, but the wound on her abdomen reveals that she was just a moment late.

106061017.content: Though the blade had only slightly penetrated her body, the fact that she is a Modifier doesn't prevent the pain from jolting through her.

106061018.content: She had run through all the possible defensive maneuvers her victim could pull off, but she never could have imagined this.

106061019.content: The guard had plunged the blade through her own stomach in order to attack the attacker.

106061021.content: To protect the Miyahebi Family... trespassers must be eliminated...

106061022.content: The guard pulls the blade out of her body, the tip of which is dipped in Kuninotokotachi's blood, yet no wound can be seen where it penetrated the guard's abdomen.

106061023.content: Tsk. So they're not even human...

106061024.content: Well then, I won't make the same mistake twice.

106071001.content: Aether Gazer HQ, Command Room, a few moments earlier.

106071004.content: Just finished adjusting this Access Key. When you get the time, check it out and make sure everything's smooth.

106071007.content: Oh? You can read these inscriptions?

106071008.content: I believe I've seen these in some ancient books from Sasanami. I think the language is from the Xu Heng District. But... I'm not sure what it means.

106071009.content: Tsukuyomi carefully examines the three katanas that lay on the table, eventually taking one and slowly... ever so slowly pulling it from its sheath.

106071010.content: Only a few inches of the katana are revealed, and a subtle change in the air can be felt. Several jolts of violet electricity bounce around the sheath, as if some mighty power is lurking inside, dying to pounce out.

106071011.content: Tsukuyomi furrows her brows, placing the katana back in its sheath.

106071012.content: Cantankerous fellow, huh? You should've seen it when it was just discovered. Insane. Took alotta work just to bring it down to this level.

106071014.content: This Access Key is even stronger than Sakubo. Before you get used to it, for your own safety, don't use its full power.

106071015.content: I'm a legit engineer, okay? So, take my advice if you know what's good for you...

106071016.content: Did you get any sleep last night?

106071017.content: Um... Well, I mean, I went to bed too early the night before. Same thing, right?

106071018.content: Even as a Modifier, resting is important.

106071019.content: Haha... no way. With all these amazing designs, how could you expect me to be able to sleep without bringing them to life?

106071020.content: (Sigh)... I guess I was just born a workaholic.

106071021.content: Oh yeah, I saw some of the squad looking a bit down in the Medical Department. Something happened?

106071022.content: I just returned to headquarters. I heard that someone was injured during a mission.

106071025.content:
Baldr... I remember her.
She's got plenty of experience. Looks like you guys are facing some pretty tough cookies.

106071026.content: It is quite serious. Her back was penetrated by a Visbane's unknown power. She's still unconscious.

106071027.content: Aren't you going to go see her?

106071028.content: There are plenty of people taking care of her. I don't know her that well. Plus... I'm not the one she needs.

106071029.content: I see... But given how much you know after just arriving, surely that means you're concerned about her, right?

106071031.content: The more people there, the harder for the medical team to perform the surgery. And the other departments must be attended to.

106071033.content: Yo! Yo! Yo! Me-Yow to Tsukuyomi! Tsukuyomi-san Yo!

106071034.content: Emergency message from Sasanami's Pheasant Squad! Tsukuyomi, please head to the Command Room immediately! I repeat: Tsukuyomi, please head to the Command Room immediately!

106071035.content: Looks like that's it for our little catch up.

106071037.content: No worries. I delivered what I needed to. See you later, Tsukuyomi.

106071039.content: This is what Mininja has gathered so far...

106071040.content: So, Lord Masayoshi has gone missing...

106071041.content: Buzenbo and Kuninotokotachi have infiltrated the Miyahebi Manor. They are planning on rescuing Izuru Masayoshi themselves.

106071042.content: Can you make contact with them?

106071043.content: Not at the moment. A few minutes ago, our communication cut out. I still haven't determined the cause.

106071044.content: I'm going to go find them then.

106071045.content: Shouldn't you wait for Shu and the rookies? They're still in the Medical Department.

106071046.content: I'm afraid that may be too late... When Baldr's surgery is finished, please be sure to tell Shu and the Administrator about this.

106071047.content: Something must have happened in Sasanami...

106081001.content: Take care of him, and do not let anyone get close.

106081003.content: So... this is Sasanami's precious Prime Lord?

106081005.content: Disobedient mortals... This is the king they have chosen?

106081006.content: I am not a king. I merely represent the will of the Sasanami people.

106081007.content: Ha... same thing. But that smell... that disgusting smell.

106081008.content: I thought you disliked the smell of all humans.

106081009.content: True. But there's something different about him. A very distant feeling... Familiar, but nauseous.

106081010.content: (Sigh)... What a pity, I can't seem to remember what it is.

106081012.content: I am aware. Do not worry. I will not ruin your plan.

106081013.content: Nevertheless, you really won't consider accepting my... modification?

106081014.content: Look at your vassals. Look at their power. You will no longer have to walk around as base, weak humans.

106081015.content: I am not averse to power, but is the technology even stable yet?

106081016.content: Last week, there were ten successful modification subjects out of fifty. Though only two are still conscious... barely.

106081017.content: I have no qualms with using this... strange power to reach my goals.

106081018.content: But once I succeed, I will be the ruler of this land. So I can not risk becoming a brainless freak.

106081019.content: Hehe... You just believe your servants will serve you loyally until they perish. You will never have to do so much as move a finger.

106081021.content: What exactly are you two planning...

106081022.content: Uncle Masayoshi, after tonight, I really do hope you return to the Prime Lord's Palace and announce that you are sick, and that you are handing over the position to the Lord of the Miyahebi Family—me.

106081023.content: That way, I can spare your life. For Auntie, and for the relationship between our families.

106081024.content: Even if I were to do that, the Karasugo, the Sanzaru, and the Akishika, those families will not agree.

106081025.content: It is time for the Miyahebi Family to take this position. They have no right to oppose this!

106081026.content: Perhaps realizing that he'd lost control, Miyahebi Syuu closes the folding fan in his hand and slowly took a step back.

106081027.content: Well... Uncle Masayoshi, no need to worry. Orochi and I have everything ready. No one will dare oppose us.

106081030.content: Oh? So our names haven't completely been forgotten. In any case, my existence is absolute. There's no need to quarrel about names.

106081031.content: Still... you humans have made me out to be a god, weaving up all sorts of stories. I suppose it can't hurt to use this name.

106081033.content: Seeing how far the Miyahebi Family has fallen, if we're to fight with the others, we've no choice but to rely on... a "god".

106081034.content: I know what I'm doing. I will take full responsibility, and do what must be done. I will not flee like a coward...

106081035.content: But before that, I will take back all that belongs to the Miyahebi Family.

106091003.content: A man trapped in a giant petri dish is slamming wildly against the glass. But the reinforced structure isn't something that a human can break.

106091004.content: Meanwhile, a black creature in the neighboring petri dish is in a shower of liquid that rots away its body until nothing is left but black cables in the form of a body.

106091006.content: Orochi orders the servant to open the seal between the two petri dishes. Immediately, the cables pounce towards the man, like demon hands coming from the abyss.

106091007.content: They penetrate his body and rip out his bones, completely replacing his physiological structure.

106091008.content: These domesticated humans sure know how to listen... but they are just too weak.

106091009.content: And though the Visbanes are useful, before they develop adequate intelligence, their inability to control their desires makes them no different from beasts.

106091010.content: Only by fusing the two will we have the soldiers that we need.

106091011.content: When we signed the contract, I said that I would create a force that would dominate Sasanami. See, have I not upheld my end of the bargain?

106091013.content: The fusion is complete, and a strange creature walks slowly out from the petri dish. Not quite human and not quite Visbane, it seems yet to have adapted to its new form.

106091014.content: A black fog is emanating from its body, causing all the surrounding servants to instinctively back off. Only one, who was most likely given orders, stepped up and whispered something in the monster's ear.

106091015.content: Remember, you are a servant of the Miyahebi Family.

106091016.content: I am... a servant... of the Miyahebi Family.

106091017.content: Right, and your mission is to protect the Miyahebi Family, and fight for Lord Syuu.

106091019.content: After repeating the servant's words, the creature looks at Orochi and Miyahebi Syuu, bowing its head.

106091021.content: But it will fight for us. As an absolutely loyal warrior.

106091022.content: The superior subjects have all been used up. Ever since we started using ordinary servants, the subjects that retain any semblance of intelligence are growing fewer by the day.

106091023.content: Indeed... A headache. And contrary to expectations, even though our technology was not up to par, almost all of the initial subjects retained their intelligence.

106091024.content: They all had burns of varying degrees that should have weakened their physiques. Could it be... that those on the brink of death have a more determined will?

106091025.content: We do not have the time to allow you to improve the technology.

106091026.content: Hehe... I know. Well, you've seen how destructive they are. There is nothing in Sasanami that will be able to stop them.

106091029.content: Having wrestled free from the servants, a young girl who might be six or seven years old sprints towards the Fused Visbane.

106091030.content: Hey! Keep your eyes open! How could you let a child run in here!?

106091031.content: Daddy, didn't you say you were gonna take me to the Water Lantern Festival? I waited all day and you didn't come.

106091033.content: The young girl forcefully shakes her father's hand, but the man who had been fused with the Visbane does nothing but kneels on the floor, silently lowering its head before its master.

106091034.content: These human cubs are so noisy... What a shame. She's too young to be fused.

106091037.content: This child... she looks like Aya.

106091038.content: Strategist, take her out of here.

106091040.content: Aw... how touching. If she speaks of what she saw in here and the plan is exposed, it will cause serious problems.

106091042.content: So... she'll be taken care of somewhere I cannot see.

106101001.content: Hey mister, where are we going?

106101004.content: Cee-cee, trust me. Don't make a sound.

106101005.content: The servant takes the young girl to a corner of the courtyard, and after confirming that no one was around, he takes off her shackles.

106101006.content: Daddy... I want to see my dad...

106101007.content: Your daddy is outside. Listen to me. Walk down this tunnel and you'll be able to see your dad.

106101008.content: The servant sweeps a pile of leaves away, then brushes off a thin layer of dirt, exposing a hatch made of bamboo.

106101009.content: After you go down there, don't think about anything. Just look at the ground and walk forward until you see the light. Then start running towards it. You got that?

106101011.content: Perhaps she sees the serious look in the servant eyes, Cee-cee holds back the tears welling up in her eyes, and repeatedly nods her head.

106101012.content: If you walk down there, it won't be long before both of you are dead.

106101013.content: A voice calls out just as half of the young girl's body has drilled into the tunnel.

106101015.content: A white-haired youth walks out from the shadows and removes his bamboo hat. His red, almost ruby eyes are half open and he carries an empty kettle with its cap open.

106101016.content: No need to panic. I'm on your side.

106101017.content: The youth flashes a sign on his waist to the servant, which makes the servant put down his guard.

106101018.content: Kagutsuchi, Kyū Squad. Shadow Crow, your undercover mission is over. Our Lord told me to come and get you.

106101019.content: (Sigh)... Finally. The Karasugo Family hasn't forgotten me.

106101020.content: Uh... What was in that kettle?

106101021.content: Don't worry about that. Just some carbonated beverage. For refreshment, that's all.

106101023.content: She's a survivor of the fusion experiments. Her parents took good care of me while I was here, but they've both been turned into Fused Visbanes. She has no family to take care of her.

106101024.content: A tragedy, for sure... But our Lord made it clear that I was to minimize the risks. Nothing was said of taking anyone else out.

106101025.content: So we're just going to leave her here?

106101026.content: Hmm... Well, it's not like I always obey orders. Alrighty, she can come.

106101027.content: Hey little girl, stay real, real, real close, okay? No matter what happens, do not leave my side.

106111002.content: Protect the Miyahebi Family? Okay, okay, enough already. Just get on the ground, will you?

106111003.content: Kuninotokotachi kicks the guard away, pulling her dagger from the body.

106111004.content: (Sigh)... Was hoping to get some intel, but it looks like these idiots couldn't tell me even if they wanted to.

106111005.content: (Hope Buzenbo is okay. It's going to be an issue if she runs into these Visbanes. Better go meet up with her...)

106111006.content: You cause a mess in someone else's manor, and you dare walk away?

106111008.content: Kuninotokotachi throws three Shurikens in the direction of the sound, and they stick into a pillar. She turns around, but sees not a shadow.

106111009.content: Impossible... the voice came from over there.

106111010.content: Seeing a silhouette moving about in the water, Kuninotokotachi instinctively steps back, and an ominous feeling wells up from within her.

106111011.content: Hehe...What a quick reaction. No wonder even the Fused Visbanes couldn't deal with you.

106111012.content: As the voice rings out again, a black fog congealed on the surface of the water. A figure steps slowly out from the fog, waving a fan.

106111013.content: (Is this a Visbane? I'm not picking up on anything...)

106111014.content: Do you know how long it took me to make all these Fused Visbanes?

106111016.content: A tragic look appears on the woman's face, and she slowly places her hand on the chest of the guard lying on the ground.

106111017.content: Apparently, infusing organisms with the power of Visbanes is not enough.

106111018.content: They cannot recover... Corrode the body, and show yourselves.

106111019.content: An eerie, black light forms on the woman's hand. Soon after, black cables sprout out from the corpses, and turn what looked like humans into freaks of a bigger size...

106121002.content: Tsk. All your underlings are gone. I think you should start worrying about yourself.

106121003.content: Forcing out frivolous words now, are you?

106121004.content: What an interesting eye. So that left eye allows you to pinpoint your opponent's weak point impressively quickly?

106121005.content: After being wounded by the Monkey... you used his eye to fight off the corrosion. I'm so curious how you got it.

106121006.content: You know whose eye this is!?

106121007.content: Oh? You don't even know who almost killed you?

106121009.content: Ha... It's been over a hundred years since anyone dared speak to me like that.

106121010.content: And it seems that this eye has given you more than mere power...

106121011.content: Our little chat is over. A corpse has no need to know any names.

106122001.content: Kuninotokotachi could indeed use her red eye to find her enemies' weak point, but it came at a cost. The beastly consciousness was constantly eating at her brain.

106122002.content: I'm quite surprised. You've managed to control that Monkey's power to such a degree.

106122003.content: However, are you aware of the price of this power? I can see that you're unable to keep the corrosion at bay.

106122004.content: Shut your mouth. I'll take you out before I go.

106122006.content: Orochi avoids Kuninotokotachi's attack, then spins around and traps Kuninotokotachi in place from behind.

106122007.content: You'll need the skills to do it, of course.

106122008.content: What are you going to do...

106122009.content: I'm taking back what isn't yours.

106122010.content: Two squirming snake-like shapes emerge, opening their giant, bloodthirsty mouths, and pouncing ferociously on Kuninotokotachi's face.

106122012.content: Be careful. Make sure not to damage the eye. And don't you dare swallow it.

106122014.content: Missing her left eye, Kuninotokotachi falls to the ground as her voice quivers and she gasps for breath.

106122015.content: Miyahebi Syuu summoned me to take care of a few troublesome vassals of the Izuru Family. Who would have thought I'd find myself such a nice prize.

106122016.content: Although I'm not sure how you managed to get this eye... it'll surely make things go much smoother for me.

106122017.content: So... you were the one who kidnapped Lord Masayoshi...

106122018.content: From what I remember... there should be three of you, Modifiers serving the Izuru Family?

106122019.content: What a shame. You're the first to get caught, and even if I were to spare your life, the corrosion would take you soon, wouldn't it?

106122020.content: Unfortunately, I don't think you'll have enough time to say good-bye to your friends.

106122021.content: Where... Wh-Where did you put Lord Masayoshi...

106122022.content: Such a stubborn Modifier. What good would it do you to know? After all, very soon you'll be—WHAT!?

106122024.content: Right after the snakish woman turns around, a series of explosions blind her eyes with smoke.

106122025.content: And right when she comes to her senses, a flash of silver bursts through the smoke and penetrates her throat.

106122026.content: Divine Power pours fiercely into Orochi's body, but she quickly turns into black mist, leaving nothing but a black snake the size of a wrist.

106122028.content: Sad... but pretty amazing... What a turn of events.

106122029.content: Kuninotokotachi turns her head vigilantly. From a stone path leading to the courtyard, she saw a tall man with silver hair walk out.

106122030.content: Nice to meet you, my lady. You must be Kuninotokotachi from the Izuru Family. I'm the Strategist, humble servant to the Miyahebi Family.

106131001.content: The silver-haired man gently bows to Kuninotokotachi.

106131002.content: Although there's nothing strange about the man's behavior, Kuninotokotachi can see black cables, like those on the unconscious guards, in his exposed skin.

106131004.content: Visbane... So that's what this power is called.

106131005.content: The one who granted me the power told me that those who go by the name "Modifiers" are its greatest enemy.

106131006.content: After our modification, we instinctively seek out humans to corrode. And yet, to protect them, the Modifiers wish to eliminate us.

106131007.content: Why would you agree to that, if you didn't know what you would become?

106131008.content: Indeed. I agreed to some... changes. But I was burned so bad I wouldn't have lasted five years.

106131009.content: And so, inside me is half of what you call a Visbane.

106131010.content: Yet, I see myself not as some nonhuman freak. And though the desire to murder comes up from time to time, that doesn't mean there's no way to stop it.

106131011.content: I can speak with you just fine, can't I?

106131012.content: Our only wish is to realize the dream of the Miyahebi Family.

106131013.content: We do not wish to see civilization turn to dust. On the contrary, we aim to bring this world to greater heights.

106131014.content: So, what you wanna say is... leave you alone?

106131015.content: Amusing. You've not even the strength to lift a finger. But jokes aside, I wish that you and your friends would try to understand us.

106131016.content: Even if you do not wish to see civilization fall, what about the others? They do not speak as charmingly as you.

106131017.content: We will keep those under control.

106131019.content: Our fusion technology is constantly improving, and more and more of our subjects are remaining as cognizant as I.

106131020.content: To say that these things can be controlled... Shows me that you do not understand Visbanes.

106131021.content: Perhaps. But I have faith in the Miyahebi Family and my Lord.

106131022.content: Point is, to turn the living into Visbanes, and create an uncontrollable power... For that, you cannot be forgiven.

106131024.content: The Strategist gently shakes his head. He lets out a sigh, and two arms quietly appear from behind him, holding two long blades.

106131025.content: What a shame... I suppose the desire for mutual understanding lies only with me.

106131026.content: To attack such a great warrior while they are down is truly a disgraceful act, but to honor the Miyahebi Family is more important than such trivial matters. The Miyahebi Family is owed such loyalty by their subjects.

106131027.content: Oh, enough with the hypocritical ramblings... Pfft, what a poser...

106131028.content: Though we differ in our positions, you are a worthy opponent, and I shall remember your name.

106131030.content: Beneath the light of the bright moon, a violet blade cuts through the black clouds, and like purple lightning dashing between them, casts the Strategist back before he can strike.

106131032.content: The violet bolt fades, and the silhouette of a tall girl slowly reveals herself.

106131033.content: Her long black hair pinned in a bun, she holds in her hand a long blade that's pulsing with violet flashes. Her eyes are as still as water, but the look on her face reveals a warrior that is no stranger to the battlefield.

106131034.content: Sorry to keep you waiting. I shall take over from here.

106131036.content: Do not hesitate... This bastard is nothing more than a Visbane.

106131037.content: With Kuninotokotachi's words, Tsukuyomi slowly turns her blade to make sure no blood has stained it had it sliced a human body.

106131038.content: Aether Gazer's Tsukuyomi, ready to take your sword.

106132001.content: The Divine Power from Tsukuyomi's massive blade continually pummels a deep crater in the area she strikes.

106132002.content: The Strategist has no choice but to keep stepping back. Though he manages to avoid her blade, violet slices mysteriously appear on his right arm.

106132003.content: Though they don't look like much, as soon as he wishes to heal himself, the depths of the wound vibrate with excruciating pain.

106132005.content: It's as if countless blades are slicing through his arm with the force of Divine Power. They not only suppress his ability to heal himself, they're also moving steadily towards his heart.

106132006.content: The Strategist realizes this, and grasps his arm, chopping the whole thing off.

106132007.content: The amputated limb is immediately incinerated, as if it were sitting in some blazing inferno. If he had hesitated just a few more moments, his entire body may have befallen the same fate.

106132008.content: Wait... C-Can't we talk this over...

106132009.content: The Strategist was hoping to distract Tsukuyomi with talking, and he immediately realizes that his opponent has disappeared.

106132010.content: A flash of violet lightning dashes into his field of vision, sweeping past his side. Though he feels no vibration, the feeling in his other arm suddenly disappears.

106132012.content: The Strategist cries out in pain, and Tsukuyomi appears calmly behind him, silently placing her blade in its sheath.

106132014.content: Just as Tsukuyomi wishes to deal the final blow, a black snake rushes up the Strategist's body, baring its fangs.

106132015.content: Meddling Modifiers... The next time we meet... you won't be so lucky.

106132016.content: The snake wraps around the Strategist's neck, and after filling him with copious amounts of Bane Energy, black fog emits from its body, shrouding him in the eerie mist.

106132018.content: Seeing Kuninotokotachi lying on the ground, Tsukuyomi decides not to pursue them.

106132019.content: Are you alright? Your... Your eye...

106132020.content: I'm... I'm fine. I just need to figure out a way to get the eye back... After all... you risked your life to giving it to me in the first place.

106132021.content: Do not speak. You must rest. I will contact the Medical Department.

106132022.content: Don't worry, I will not end here. Buzenbo is still inside. She's more important...

106132024.content: The Miyahebi Family kidnapped the Prime Lord. This manor is full of Fused Visbanes...

106132025.content: Buzenbo is blaming herself for what happened to Lord Masayoshi. I am afraid she will put herself in danger.

106132026.content: Tend to your wounds. I will take care of Buzenbo and Lord Masayoshi.

106132027.content: Ha... (Sigh)... Once again, I have to rely on you, Captain...

106132033.content: Not sure. My memory has not yet returned...

106132034.content: Orochi focuses on the direction that her snake disappeared in as she considers all the possibilities...

106132035.content: Tell your servants to stay on guard. I don't think things will ease up tonight.

107011003.content: Entering the Command Room with Ver, Shu just finishes up a communication.

107011004.content: She looks tired. It appears the Spealght Incident has brought more troubles than mere combat.

107011005.content: I'm sure everyone is aware of what's going on.

107011006.content: Yes... The Prime Lord of Sasanami has been kidnapped, and both Buzenbo and Kuninotokotachi have gone missing.

107011007.content: Both Aether Gazer and the CORG support Izuru Masayoshi's governance and his revolutionary policies.

107011008.content: With the situation in Sasanami, Izuru Masayoshi is the only one who is capable of maintaining balance and harmony. If something were to happen to him, a war might break out...

107011010.content: Yes. But the way things have turned out, I'm not even sure the Pheasant Squad can take care of it.

107011011.content: Don't forget about me. I can go help them!

107011012.content: We wouldn't let you go to Sasanami alone.

107011014.content: Instead of answering, Shu takes us into the reception room.

107011016.content: A blonde-haired girl sits next to the window, playing with a goblet, clearly bored. Only when she notices that someone has arrived does she turn her head and flash a smile that reveals a tad bit of arrogance.

107011017.content: Hmph... It's been so long since I've been to Aether Gazer, and your manners have clearly not improved. To make such an esteemed guest wait so long... Tsk, tsk.

107011019.content: I've never seen anyone in Aether Gazer speak to Shu like that.

107011020.content: Hera, from the Society of Muses. Luckily, she had reasons for being here today anyway.

107011022.content: Her pomegranate eyes slowly sweep over us, before she stops on me.

107011025.content: Indeed, I've heard some whisperings. Division Nine, letting a human serve as Admin?

107011026.content: Seems a bit frail, if you ask me. A bit careless, don't you think?

107011027.content: #{nickname}# is very reliable on our missions, I'll have you know!

107011028.content: You can decide then whether or not you trust #{nickname}#.

107011029.content: Well, well... We'll just have to wait and see.

107011030.content: Based on the cooperation between Aether Gazer and the Society of Muses, Hera will provide support for Sasanami.

107011031.content:
Hera, Verthandi, and Administrator.
We are counting on you.

107031001.content: I've been walking in the same corridor for so long. Why does it feel like I keep going in circles?

107031002.content: If I'm remembering correctly, this is the sixth time we've been here...

107031003.content: Hmm... This path seems to be changing according to our movements. It appears that we are totally lost.

107031004.content: Buzenbo realizes that forcing herself through isn't working, and notices the paintings above the byobu beside her.

107031005.content: Wait... Where have I seen these paintings before?

107031006.content: There were five mountain deities sent down by the God of Heaven. Irritated by the foolishness of humans, the deities punished them with calamity and disaster.

107031007.content: The only deity to stand up to these violent acts, the Crane God, was slain by the Crow God. These punishments then turned Sasanami into a living hell.

107031008.content: Hundreds of years later, the Child of Heaven led the five clerics to quell the fires of fury, bringing peace back to the land.

107031009.content: The Child of Heaven became the titular ruler of Sasanami's imperial city, and the five clerics established the five families of Sasanami, who continued to worship the mountain deities. The five families they established were later called the Sasanami Five.

107031010.content: These paintings record the history of Sasanami...

107031011.content: Wait... what am I doing thinking about this stuff?

107031012.content: Master left for two days and I let Lord Masayoshi get kidnapped. I have to rescue him, so she doesn't get worried...

107031013.content: Hahaha! All this rambling about your Master. Do you think she cares about you?

107031015.content: I merely saw a poor soul pitying herself... and couldn't help but step in to bring you to your senses.

107031017.content: Do I look exactly like you?

107031019.content: You know very well that your Master doesn't care about you. She realizes you're useless, so she wishes to rid herself of this burden.

107031021.content: Don't blame yourself for what happened to Izuru Masayoshi. Your Master knew from the start that you wouldn't be able to protect him.

107031022.content: Buzenbo dashes forward, swinging her blade, but all that stands before her is a byobu.

107031023.content: Buzenbo, what's wrong with you? Who are you talking to!?

107031024.content: You're just unwilling to face the truth.

107031025.content: No matter how hard you try, there's no way you'll be able to earn the affection of your Master. You'll forever be chasing her shadow...

107031026.content: After all, you've been nothing but a burden to her, and you know that's exactly how she sees you.

107031028.content: Hahaha! Infuriated and ashamed, are you?

107031029.content: How long can you lie to yourself? Remember what you heard while you were outside the door? You'll never forget that, will you?

107031033.content: Yes... I have. This is what I have decided.

107031034.content: Remove Buzenbo from the Pheasant Squad... That is certainly a possibility. But don't you wish to hear what she has to say?

107031036.content: There is no need. I think it is the best way to handle this.

107031037.content: I am sure that she would not agree.

107031038.content: And yet, it is clear to me that she is not suited to stay by my side...

107031040.content: Understood. We will wait until the Pheasant Squad's missions in Sasanami have settled, and then I will arrange for her to join another squad.

107031041.content: Master... Why... Why are you doing this...

107031043.content: You think by pretending that it never happened, you can remain her disciple? You are lying to yourself...

107031045.content: Tsukuyomi... despises the fact that you're her disciple.

107041004.content: Tsukuyomi! Finally, you've arrived. Buzenbo is acting very strange!

107051002.content: Buzenbo, snap out of it. I'm here.

107051004.content: You were the only one here when I entered. There was no shadow.

107051007.content: These paintings seem to disturb the psyche of all who enter. Buzenbo started acting strange after she arrived here.

107051009.content: Yes... She was also ambushed by Visbanes, and was hurt pretty bad. But do not worry. She is safe now.

107051010.content: Poor soul, trapped by your own inner demons. If you do not face them, how can you ever expect to move forward?

107051011.content: You again... So you painted these? Who are you?

107051012.content: I am nothing but a poor, wandering monk with a knack for painting. As for my name, that I have long forgotten.

107051013.content: And ye who so boldly entered my gallery were not beguiled by my paintings. Your inner demons were merely awakened, that's all.

107051015.content: Tsukuyomi, look at his right arm. He's just like the guards, a Visbane.

107051016.content: Surely, to have entered my majestic gallery means you must've defeated them?

107051018.content: How long has it been since I've seen living beings like yourselves?

107051019.content: Fates shall rise, and fates shall fall, but in the end there will be nothing at all. So... the time has finally come?

107051020.content: The Monk shakes his sleeve, and from his robe comes snake-like cables flashing red. In his deformed palm is a clump of data, dazzling and squirming about.

107051022.content: Visbanes... are coming from his hand!?

107051024.content: Your mind hasn't stabilized yet. Step back and rest.

107051025.content: I am the one you want.

107052002.content: Focusing all her Divine Power, Tsukuyomi slashes her massive blade forth, and just like before, once it touches her target's body, it seems to be hitting nothing but air.

107052003.content: It is as if the eerie Monk has no form, and appears once again not far off.

107052004.content: Master... do not be tricked by his illusions.

107052005.content: Focus, Tsukuyomi. He is trying to get you to waste your energy.

107052007.content: Putting everything on yourself. You think that will absolve you of your sins? On the contrary... this is the heart of Pride.

107052008.content: You don't dare face the truth, instead twisting it to trick yourself. How feeble of you.

107052009.content: You are stuck in traps you've laid for yourselves. Stumbling about in confusion, you can't seem to find your way out...

107052010.content: Enough with your riddles! They won't work!

107052011.content: Hehe... That I could encounter such interesting souls... Surely this is the favor of the Buddha.

107052014.content: It has something to do with those paintings on the wall. Don't look at them!

107052015.content: Too late. I... I have no energy...

107052016.content: All conditioned phenomena, are like a dream, an illusion, a bubble, a shadow.

107071001.content: Shadow Crow looks at the young man who once again shoulders the massive katana. At his feet are Cycrobes who have been brutally slain. Even after such a fierce battle, it seems that he is just getting warmed up.

107071002.content: He takes the kettle from his belt, and only when it hits his mouth does he realize that it's empty. He has no choice but to sigh.

107071003.content: (Sigh)... If I knew all this would happen, I would've brought more...

107071004.content: Shadow Crow had heard the leader of the Kyū Squad was extremely capable, but this far surpassed his wildest expectations.

107071005.content: With every step that Kagutsuchi takes, he swings his katana and takes an enemy's life. Shadow Crow had thought that the Fused Visbanes were more fierce than the wildest of beasts, but when faced with Kagutsuchi's katana they seem nothing more helpless runts.

107071007.content: No, no... Just lucky, that's all.

107071008.content: Hey, Shadow Crow. Do you know how the Miyahebi Family summoned the Snake God?

107071009.content: I came here about a year ago. Every day they would perform some kind of ceremony.

107071011.content: The Miyahebi Family has a long tradition of worshipping the Snake God, but the ceremonies were so frequent that it was strange. Every night, Miyahebi Syuu would take several vassals to the rear courtyard and wouldn't return until the early hours of the morning.

107071012.content: Were they really just offering sacrifices to their god?

107071013.content: I believe so. I could hear the sacred hymns, and the clerics' prayers.

107071014.content: I snuck over there a couple times, but the guards were tightly protecting the entrance, so I never got a chance to check it out.

107071017.content: Uh-huh... The big sister in the attic would always go there to sing.

107071018.content: The court where sakura bathes in wails, upon the trees grow thine black scales... Protector God of the Miyahebi, show thy tongue to those who see thee...

107071019.content: If you wish to please her so, bring her fan that she may glow... And if you wish to bring her pain, call upon the great white crane...

107071020.content: Call upon... the great white crane...

107071026.content: Wolves... Shadow Crow, does the Miyahebi Family own wolves?

107071027.content: Um... No. I'm afraid that's something much more dangerous than wolves.

107071028.content: Black shadows writhe about in the nearby thicket. After a few breaths, several guard dogs wrapped in black cables surround them.

107071029.content: Ha... Dogs that howl like wolves. Scared me for a second.

107071032.content: As soon as the words leave Kagutsuchi's mouth, a few of the closest creatures stand up on their hind legs, revealing the crimson claws on each of their limbs.

107071034.content: Watch out! These are Fused Visbanes!

107081001.content: No way. There's no way we can take these. We must think of a way to throw them off.

107081003.content: Call upon... the great white crane... Call upon...

107081004.content: Her mind... seems to be disturbed. Is it because of that song?

107081005.content: Forget that, Shadow Crow. Put her on your back and run.

107081007.content: Just as Kagutsuchi is preparing for an attack, the wolves suddenly quiet down, as if they notice something approaching. The Fused Visbanes lower their heads and step back into the thicket.

107081011.content: A rhythmic pounding is approaching, and each step shakes the surrounding trees, as if some giant is heading in their direction.

107081013.content: Is he commanding the Fused Visbanes?

107081014.content: The massive figure covers the moonlight, leaving Kagutsuchi and Shadow Crow in darkness.

107081015.content: The giant's bloody eyes scan the two below, and the oppressive feeling is palpable, but it doesn't seem intent on attacking.

107081016.content: Now I remember. That's the guard who was protecting the ceremonial courtyard. I never thought they'd turn him into a Visbane too.

107081017.content: So, he knows what happened in there?

107081018.content: Hmm... Though I'd love to force him to talk, I'm not so sure it would be easy.

107081021.content: The giant ignores the two men and walks up to Cee-cee, kneeling down and stretching out his hand. As if drawn in by something, she climbs up his hand and crawls onto his palm.

107081023.content: Shadow Crow, relax. That is not Cee-cee. I think she's being affected by all the Bane Energy around. Some "thing" has taken over her body.

107081024.content: You do love the dogs, don't you my Lady?

107081025.content: That was a long time ago, Nagazane.

107081028.content: I will take you... to the Young Lord...

107081029.content: The giant let the little girl sit on his shoulder, turning its head and walking in the other direction.

107091001.content: Let's get things straight. Although the Society of Muses and Aether Gazer have a formal agreement, that does not mean I am required to assist you.

107091002.content: I was merely here to deliver an invitation to the Ardisis Ceremony. But Shu knew what to do, she bowed her head and begged... so I agreed to help.

107091004.content: On the road, Hera reminded me of this fact countless times. Although her personality was quite clear at headquarters, actually having to deal with it was much worse.

107091005.content: Ver... is everyone at the Society of Muses like this?

107091006.content: Hm...This is also my first time meeting Lady Hera, but Miss Shu did tell me that everyone at the Society of Muses has a... unique personality.

107091009.content: By the way, Administrator, why are you coming along this time?

107091010.content: Shu thinks our broken comms with Pheasant Squad has something to do with Bane Energy. Ordinary comms devices won't work for long in a Bane Energy-ridden area.

107091011.content: To maintain tactical support, although the portable Mimir terminal is still in testing, we've got no choice but to forge onward.

107091012.content: Oh... Hey! I can hear Lord Mimir coming from the bracelet!

107091013.content: Heehee!... Ah, Rookie! Coolant is limited! So if the mission takes longer than expected, it'll be a serious problem.

107091014.content: Got it. I'll pay extra attention to the time.

107091018.content: Heh. Are you really this nervous, for so few Visbanes?

107091020.content: Bumbling buffoons, that is all. I can take care of them with a mere pinky.

107091022.content: Kneel before my flames, worthless weasels. No one blocks the path of the great Hera.

107101001.content: As he moves towards the front courtyard, the giant feels a soft hand rubbing his neck. He stops, as if not understanding the meaning of the young girl's action.

107101002.content: Nagazane, your skin has grown so coarse.

107101003.content: That... is not skin, my Lady...

107101004.content: Really?... I still remember the fireworks at the temple fair. Every year, you would take me there. No one was taller than you, so I sat on your shoulders, and I could see further than them all.

107101005.content: The General turns his head to look at the young girl on his shoulder. Though she doesn't look like the person from his memories, he has no doubt that it is her.

107101007.content: Suddenly, the girl's face is illuminated by a warm light. The giant is slightly fazed, and he instinctively looks in the direction from which it comes.

107101012.content: Woah. She just baked them to a crisp.

107101013.content: Hmph. Obviously, my dear. After all, it's me.

107101014.content: So... I guess we're not trying to stay on the down low.

107101015.content: But... these Visbanes don't seem pure. I don't think these are the mere Encroachers.

107101016.content: Somebody forcibly combined the Visbanes with biological organisms.

107101018.content: Right. Such a process would reduce the Visbanes' destructive power, but if the two subjects were highly compatible, it might produce an exceptionally strong result, which may retain some of the organism's unique characteristics.

107101019.content: For example, the sense of smell of a dog, the sight of an eagle, the speed of a leopard... and the intelligence of a human. These are all possibilities.

107101020.content: The Miyahebi Family made all of these?

107101023.content: Admin, get out of the way!

107101024.content: Before I have the chance to react, Vert pushes me out of the way.

107101025.content: The last thing I see is a massive shadow coming out of the void like a meteor, smashing a crater into the place I was just standing.

107101026.content: Amid the enormous amount of dust and rubble, a giant silhouette stands, brandishing an equally large sword.

107101028.content: I found you! I FINALLY FOUND YOU!!! Ye who have injured the mighty Miyahebi Family!

107101030.content: So, they actually fused Visbanes with humans. Don't worry, this guy's all strength. His intelligence is clearly lacking.

107112001.content: Sacred Flame... incinerate this mannerless chap.

107112005.content: Nagazane, snap out of it. They did not start the fire.

107112007.content: And... that was a long time ago. Those who have left will never return.

107112008.content: Now, we must make sure that my big brother does not make any more mistakes.

107112011.content: Wow, she calmed down the Visbane.

107112012.content: It is partly human, so it is entirely possible that the human side currently has control.

107112013.content: Well, are you really just going to let it go?

107112016.content: The mind inside this girl's body doesn't belong to her.

107112017.content: They've been doing Visbane experiments here for so long. I'm afraid these soul data were deeply corrupted, so they couldn't be collected by Gaea. That means, they have nowhere to go...

107112018.content: Ha...little girl, you should worry about yourself.

107112019.content: If you hang around this Visbane too long, your soul data will be corrupted. After that, don't even think about being born again.

107112022.content: Hey! W-Wait!!! I have NOT finish speaking!

107112023.content: Tsk. What an annoying little face on that child. Makes me think of... the other one... Hum.

107112024.content: Lady Hera, let's go find Pheasant Squad...

107112025.content: The two fellows who were chasing the giant had arrived, and saw the entire battle from the roof.

107112027.content: Not right now. That giant's surely a lot stronger than we are. And Cee-cee should be fine under his protection.

107112028.content: After we complete our mission, we'll go find her.

107112029.content: Got it. Ah, yes... What exactly is our mission again?

108011001.content: Brother, do you really need this long to place a stone?

108011003.content: Aya, you've never studied Go. This move is crucial.

108011004.content: But my dear brother has lost to Mr. Takenaka 176 times. What's another loss?

108011005.content: Sh... Shut up, Aya. Today... the tides shall turn!

108011007.content: Hahaha... Aya, don't make fun of your brother. How about I take you out to fly a kite?

108011008.content: Nope. I wanna see my brother lose. Just look, he's sweating so bad. Surely he's gonna lose again, hehe.

108011011.content: Right h-here... W-Wait... Ah... Hold on...

108011012.content: C'mon! Quit dillydallying! This is fine, dummy!

108011014.content: The girl takes the white stone from the youth's hand, does a quick thinking, and places it wherever she pleases.

108011018.content: The youth analyzes the possibilities from the position, and his eyes widen.

108011019.content: This move not only opens up the right side of the board, but also prepares your defense to turn on the offensive.

108011020.content: What a move. Perhaps——Aya is a genius?

108011022.content: Okay, okay. Just a bit lucky, don't you think? Quit messing up their game, it's time for music class.

108011023.content: The girl donning a kimono slowly rises, walking out of the courtyard as she holds the little girl's hand.

108011024.content: Sis Aoi, what song are we going to learn today?

108011025.content: How about you go over the song we practiced in class first, then we'll talk about it.

108011026.content: As they listen to the dialogue between the two, the others around look at each other and burst out into laughter.

108021001.content:
Once arriving in the attic, Aya props her chin up with her hand and looks out the window, a bit bored.

Kurimoto Aoi: "Okay now, no slacking off. Let's see how well you learned what we studied yesterday."

Miyahebi Aya: "Ah— But I don't even like that song."

Kurimoto Aoi: "Ballad of the Snake God is the song for the mountain deities. As the second daughter of the Miyahebi Family, you must learn this song."

Kurimoto Aoi: "Hundreds of years ago, it was your ancestors who followed the Child of Heaven and quelled the mountain deities. Only then were the people protected by the Miyahebi Family able to live peaceful lives."

Miyahebi Aya: "I know, I know. Daddy told me, and so did mom. I've known this like forever."

Miyahebi Aya: "I wanna learn lovely songs. All that Miyahebi Family stuff, you can give it to my brother."

108021009.content:
Miyahebi Aya: "I wanna be like you, a super famous singer! Fans would enjoy your singing every day!"

Kurimoto Aoi: "Oh, come off it... I was brought here for the ceremony. But someone like you, an honored member of the Miyahebi Family, how could you be a mere singer..."

Miyahebi Aya: "What's wrong with being a singer? There's no difference between me or you or my brother... Plus... Don't you like my brother?"

Kurimoto Aoi: "Aya! What are you talking about!?"

Miyahebi Aya: "Oooooo... You're blushing. So, I guess I'm right. Sis Aoi wants to marry my brother!"

Kurimoto Aoi: "Aya, you stop it, right now!"

108021016.content: As the lingering sounds fade, the visuals before them warp prior to crumbling—

108041001.content:
Miyahebi Syuu: "Mr. Takenaka, I've recently been reading the ancient history of Sasanami."

Takenaka Hiromoto: "Is that so? Well, which part exactly?"

Miyahebi Syuu: "I've been reading about something earlier... even earlier than the time of the mountain deities and the Sasanami Five."

Miyahebi Syuu: "Back then, there were no Prime Lords in Sasanami. A man called the great Shogun served the God of Heaven and brought peace to this land"

Takenaka Hiromoto: "So, Young Lord, do you respect this... great Shogun?"

Miyahebi Syuu: "Yes. Though the gods' anger was quelled, the suffering still remained—The five families were still unable to unify their ideals, and the people feared that disaster would strike again. It is the duty of each of the families to lead Sasanami to greater heights."

108041009.content:
Takenaka Hiromoto: "It is quite extraordinary that the future lord thinks of these things at such a young age. Most children of the rich and powerful do nothing but immerse themselves in pleasure and merrymaking. One could not expect them to know the suffering of the people."

Takenaka Hiromoto: "The will to resist the gods, and to see death as a path to new life, that has not been passed on."

Miyahebi Syuu: "You're right. But the Miyahebi Family will take the place of Prime Lord next year. Father has promised that I can assist him and learn how to govern."

Takenaka Hiromoto: "It appears that our lord has intentions of passing on the position to you."

Miyahebi Syuu: "I want to be like the Shogun in the ancient book. Mr. Takenaka, Nagazane, you will help me with it, right?"

Takenaka Hiromoto: "Whatever it is that you desire, we will stay by your side."

108041017.content:
Miyahebi Syuu: "The Shogun gave titles to his most loyal vassals. He who was skilled in the literary arts was known as the Strategist, and the master of military was the General. Mr. Takenaka, Nagazane... let us change Sasanami."

The Monk: "Hold on, stay like this and do not move—"

Miyahebi Syuu: "Great Master?"

The Monk: "What a sight... Please, let me paint this so that we may commemorate the moment."

The three looked at each other, stared for a moment, then burst out into uncontrollable laughter.

Takenaka Hiromoto: "Please, Great Master, implore your talents... and thank you."

Naoe Nagazane: "Ha... Please make us look handsome."

108041018.content: As the Monk lifts the brush, both teacher and student, master and guard, they all forget their roles. Captured on the scroll is an image of them circled around the Go board, exuding with ambition.

108041026.content: Buzenbo moves slowly towards the scroll as it floats in mid-air. The petals of a sakura drifts up from behind, as if possessing some power that is pushing her to touch it.

108041027.content: But right before she does, a petal lands on the scroll.

108041028.content: A fire flashes across the scroll, and it is scorched to ashes.

108041029.content: The people and images begin warping, just like the scroll itself.

108041030.content: The flames crawl from the floor to their feet, and the smoke stretches towards the heavens, like some giant, snarling snake...

108043003.content: Buzenbo feels something clutching tightly onto her foot. She looks down and sees that it is the one they were calling 'Young Lord' in the illusion.

108043004.content: Aya is still inside... Please... s-save her...

108043005.content: I am the Young Lord of the Miyahebi... I... I can give you anything t-to repay you...

108043006.content: Mother and father have... have already... I can't lose Aya...

108043007.content: Can he see us? That would be impossible. This is an illusion...

108043008.content: My foot... I can't shake him off.

108043009.content: Aya is still inside. Please... I'm begging you...

108043010.content: Master... I want to go inside and take a look.

108043011.content: This illusion is different from the ones before. It may be very dangerous.

108053001.content: There are even more Visbanes inside.

108053002.content: But they seem more intent on destroying this illusion than attacking us.

108053003.content: Lord Masayoshi said that there was a massive fire at the Miyahebi manor four years ago.

108053004.content: All the servants and subjects were seriously injured. The Lord and his daughter never came out...

108053005.content: So... this is the Miyahebi Family four years ago.

108053006.content: The fire is so intense. How are we ever going to find them...

108053007.content: Let's follow the Visbanes. It looks like they're trying to find something...

108061001.content: Hey, you okay? Can you hear me?

108061003.content: The man seems to hear someone calling out for him. It is difficult enough for him to open his mouth, and no matter how hard he tries, all he can muster up are some incoherent mumbles.

108061004.content: It's the man who was playing Go with Miyahebi Syuu in the illusion.

108061005.content: Yes. I exchanged blows with him in the courtyard.

108061006.content: With burns as severe as this, becoming part Visbane was the only way he could have survived. No wonder he came out like that...

108061007.content: But this is an illusion, he had no idea what would happen in the future.

108061009.content: Forgive me... I... I failed to save Lady Aya...

108061010.content: Young... Lord... I'm sorry... I'm... so sorry...

108061011.content: Shiny, translucent tears fall from the man's eyes.

108061012.content: He's still breathing. He just lost consciousness.

108061015.content: The surface is completed tattered, but it's clear that this is a crow.

108061016.content: Who dropped this? From what I remember, no one from the Karasugo Family was here when this happened.

108061017.content: The Karasugo was the most fierce opponent of the Izuru Family. Most people believed the fire was an accident, caused by some servant, when they were collecting the water lanterns. But... looks like it wasn't that simple.

108061018.content: When we find Lord Masayoshi, we'll tell him what's going on.

108061019.content: Yes. And where is the girl... Miyahebi Aya?

108061020.content: Buzenbo stands up and surveys the courtyard. The flames sway, and the image in the distance seems to be covered in a veil of ash, as if it is in some other realm.

108061021.content: Lady Aya will not be found here.

108061023.content: This scene that you see is composed of my own and other vassals' memories. The places we failed to reach, and the fact that we did not find Lady Aya, such failure cannot be corrected in an illusion.

108061024.content: So why are you showing us this?

108061025.content: When mortals do something wrong, they all try to find a reason to absolve themselves. I am no different...

108061026.content: A massive number of Visbanes circle around, and just as the Pheasant Squad prepares to attack, they realize that the Visbanes are sprinting towards the same target—

108061027.content: But I realize that words can do nothing to atone us for our sins...

108061028.content: The Visbanes climb onto the Monk and bite onto the part of him that is still human. The scent of fresh blood makes their eyes tremble, like hungry wolves.

108061029.content: As if he had known this would occur, the Monk doesn't even react, staring calmly at the two visitors.

108061030.content: It appears that my modifications were not as successful as the other vassals. My own thoughts, and the desires that were implanted in me, are at constant war.

108061031.content: And when my own consciousness is in control, these desires will rush me like the Visbanes...

108061032.content: Without a change in expression, the Monk rips off his human arm and throws it like bait to get the surrounding Visbanes off of him.

108061034.content: It's nothing... With this Visbane arm, I can make another one in no time.

108061035.content: Flowers, fabrics, gold... organic limbs. I can make them with a mere thought.

108061036.content: I never thought that my right hand, which I used to paint the myriad things, would one day be able to materialize whatever I wished... in this way.

108061037.content: If you wish to know what befell the Miyahebi Family, then come with me...

108071001.content: In a secret, underground room the size of half the yard, the end of which heads towards an eerie shrine.

108071002.content: A white snake statue with inlaid red jewels for eyes stares at the new arrivals, as if protecting the fan that lies on the altar.

108071003.content: Astonishing, right? The secret room like this could exist in this building.

108071004.content: Yes, but... it is normal for the Miyahebi Family to make offerings to the Snake God each year. There's no need for a hidden area like this.

108071005.content: The Tempest Sensu... Is that the fan of the Snake God Orochi?

108071006.content: Indeed. After it was passed down, they were able to reincarnate her. The poet was to read the sacred prayers and the singer would sing the ritual songs. Then, a scroll of a black snake was to be burned, and the prayer would offer up the bones of their blood relative...

108071007.content: Everyone in Sasanami has heard this tale, but no one imagined that someone would actually do that...

108071008.content: After the Young Lord's loved ones left, he suddenly became ill. Once he was cured, it was like he was a totally different person.

108071009.content: Some vassals gave up on living, others wished to leave. He called everyone together, promising that he would do something to restore the Miyahebi Family to its rightful place.

108071010.content: At the time, we did not know what he wanted to do. But if the Young Lord or the Miyahebi Family needed us, this was enough to give our lives meaning.

108071011.content: So, you helped Miyahebi Syuu summon the Snake God...

108071012.content: There is no god. You've seen the Bane Energy and the modified creatures. You still don't understand?

108071013.content: That which was said to protect Sasanami, that which the family has worshipped for generations, is nothing more than an ancient Visbane with unimaginable power.

108071014.content: No one knows why it's been hibernating this long, but this scam they are calling a ritual is nothing more than a way to break its shackles.

108071015.content: Someone misled the Miyahebi Family with lies...

108071016.content: The ceremony was performed for seventy days. Each day I would paint for it with my left hand. Aoi sang night and day with her burnt throat. Nagazane made sure that no one interrupted us.

108071018.content: She took her fan, and her eyes swept past us, scornfully...

108071019.content: I still remember those eyes, looking at us with no mercy at all... like we were specks of dust.

108071020.content: Perhaps it was then that I realized I had done wrong. And yet, I still lied to myself, clinging to the idea that this was to remedy the injustice of the world, to practice what Buddha taught me.

108071021.content: The Miyahebi Family suffered so much, all those injustices and unfairness... So they sought such power to get back what was theirs...

108071022.content: After that, the Young Lord and the Snake reached an agreement. She was generous enough to restore my right arm... as well as heal Aoi's throat and the bodies of both Nagazane and Takenaka.

108071024.content: But I knew... these were not divine gifts, they... they were...

108071026.content: Apologies... I'm nothing more than a meager monk, unable to control my evil urges... but at least... I was able to let the truth be known.

108071027.content: Could... could you help me with one last thing?

108072001.content: The Monk sat down quietly, and placed his yet-to-be human arm before him.

108072002.content: The black cables which are wrapped around him rapidly wither, as if losing their vitality, and fall from his body.

108072003.content: Memories project down from a crack in the dome as the illusion verges on collapse.

108072004.content:
Old Master: "Kuujaku, you really wish to leave?"

The Monk: "Yes, I have made my decision."

The Monk: "My brothers spend their days wiping dust from the Buddha's statue and clearing leaves from the steps. They do not understand the suffering of the world."

The Monk: "Their path may reside in this golden statue, but that is not where my path exists."

Old Master: "Where is your path then?"

The Monk: "I am not sure... so I wish to go find it. I will record what I see with this brush. This way, I will locate the path."

108072011.content:
Old Master: "Kuujaku, I know that nothing I can say will dissuade you, but nevertheless... let me give you some final words of advice."

Old Master: "As you search the world for the path, you must keep in mind what you are looking for. The world of mortals is complicated... you must never forget your true mind."

The Monk: "I shall remember Master's words in my journey."

Old Master: "Kuujaku, your path may not be here, but will it exist in the mortal world..."

108072018.content: I planted seeds of bad karma... and now I shall taste its bitter fruit...

108072019.content: The light... is coming in... Is he unable to maintain the illusion?

108072020.content: No. He lifted it on purpose.

108072021.content: Though I know not your names. It is certainly dharma that I have encountered thee.

108072022.content: Your inner demons may be huge, but liberation is already by your side. I... I do not have time to help you on your way.

108072023.content: A pity that I die here and now, with no moon nor flowers.

108072024.content: Not only have I not found the path, I have not paid for my sins...

108072027.content: In an instant, the scene before them returns to the gallery they had previously stood in.

108072028.content: The Monk is now in the lotus position, with no feeling of the outside world.

108072029.content: Though the mistakes you made are unforgivable, we will make sure that worse things do not occur.

108072030.content: This way, the burden of your sins and your repentance will be lightened.

108083002.content: By the looks of their injuries, they were defeated by the Pheasant Squad, but it has been a while.

108083003.content: This manor is enormous. We're looking for a needle in a haystack.

108083005.content: The court where sakura bathes in wails, upon the trees grow thine black scales...

108083006.content: Protector God of the Miyahebi, show thy tongue to those who see thee...

108083008.content: Let's go check it out. We've got no other leads.

108091002.content: Looks like where they fuse the Visbanes with other organisms.

108091003.content: As they turn the corner to go upstairs, the thick smell of blood bombards their noses.

108091004.content: A massive apparatus is located in the center of the attic. A series of lightless lanterns hang down high from the black cables that stretched out, as if counting the number of poor souls who had been slain.

108091005.content: Nothing can describe such a horrid sight... Any normal person would simply be unable to accept a slaughterhouse such as this.

108091006.content: Hey, Administrator of Aether Gazer, I can just destroy this place, right?

108091008.content: Without even waiting for a response, Hera lifts her Scarlet Scepter. Dazzling flames congeal on the tip of it—

108091011.content: Before the dazzling flames out, several black figures pounce out from the byobu.

108091012.content: I'm already in a bad mood. You did this to yourself!

108101001.content: Sacred flame, scorch these sordid souls to ash!

108101002.content: The golden flames take on the form of phoenix, and at Hera's command, fly towards the massive apparatus.

108101003.content: Like the fallen Visbanes, the evil machine is swallowed by the sacred flame.

108101004.content: The searing fire emits wails that sound like souls wafting in the wind.

108101005.content: Humans have many deficiencies, but this species has created so many beautiful civilizations. I will not allow life to be trampled on like this.

108101006.content: Rest in peace, all you innocent souls who have suffered here.

108101007.content: The shadows shrouded by the flames slowly shrink. Hera controls the pyre so that it doesn't catch the entire building on fire, until nothing is left but a black charred area filled with ashes.

108101008.content: Hmm... We didn't find the person who was singing.

108101009.content: Indeed... This is obviously the highest floor.

108101010.content: Let's make sure we checked everywhere. Perhaps... eh? My feet are all cold... Is this water?

108101011.content: When did it get so wet? Is it raining?

108101012.content: No... This isn't rain... It's water... flooding in!

108101013.content: How could this be? We're more than ten stories up!?

108101015.content: As the group stares flabbergasted, a massive black whale soars up from the liquified floor, bringing with it a red wave the size of a tsunami.

108101017.content: This is the last thing he said to me... It was all I could do to help him...

108101018.content: You have stolen from me... the last thing that has given my life meaning!

108111001.content: You sure about this? This medicine will heal your voice for now, but it will also do irreversible damage to your throat.

108111002.content: You'll need to keep using this medicine until the ritual fully succeeds. After that, you may not be able to talk...

108111003.content: That is fine. It is my mission to sing the sacred hymns for the Miyahebi Family.

108111004.content: And we need to keep it secret from outsiders, right?

108111006.content: I will leave the medicine here. Someone will come and take you to the site of the ceremony tonight.

108111008.content: The day of the fire, I... I only thought of myself. I didn't take Aya with me. You... You have always hated me since then, haven't you...

108111011.content: This is the first time you've spoken to me in years. I... I am so happy.

108111012.content: Whatever it is that you are trying to do, I will do whatever I can to help...

108111013.content: The ceremony will be exhausting. Rest while you can.

108111014.content: The curtain door closes as he leaves.

108111015.content: It was clear that it was her throat that was injured, not her appearance, but he did not look at her once after entering.
