108111016.content: He looked at the empty wood table, at the painting that had been hanging on the walls for years, at the gradually setting sun, but he never once glanced at her.

108111017.content: He's just as before. Unable to tell lies to others while looking at them.

108111018.content: Young Lord... You do not need to be like this. Even if you are merely using me, for me, this is the greatest absolution.

108111020.content: She looks at his gradually fading silhouette, slowly blurring like a starless sky.

108111021.content: The giant whale lets out a tragic wail mid-air, and like it was merging into a droplet of the sea, with the girl on its back, leaps down from on high.

108111022.content: And yet, like the mermaid out of a fairy tale, it all disappears in an instant.

108111024.content: Perhaps. Or maybe she used too much of her own Bane Energy to activate that whale.

108111025.content: Ver heads in the direction of the girl. Suddenly, a drop of warm tear lands on her face.

108111027.content: It's a half-Visbane, half-human fusion. I can feel that part of her heart which is still human.

108111028.content: The one who cannot be forgiven, is the evil mastermind behind all this.

108111029.content: Admin, Ver... what are you doing here?

109011001.content: In the attic, Buzenbo told Ver and the others about the incident with the Monk.

109011002.content: Wow... hard to believe. So, you were trapped in an illusion, created by a Visbane?

109011003.content: This sounds a bit like Oneiroi's ability to conjure up dreamlands.

109011004.content: It seems that these Fused Visbanes not only retain traits of the organism, they can even create Visbanic abilities that we've never seen before.

109011005.content: Ah, yes. Ver, and this is...

109011006.content: Hmph. The name is Hera, from the Society of Muses.

109011007.content: Miss Shu was worried about you, so she called in Miss Hera for support.

109011008.content: And, the Administrator thought the communication would be cut off by the Bane Energy and came with us.

109011009.content: Well, you really were a great help. And this will ensure our success for what comes next.

109011011.content: That's right. We still haven't found Lord Masayoshi. The only place we haven't looked is that secret room we saw in the illusion. The Monk must have brought us there to show us where he is being kept.

109011012.content: This place is too exposed. Administrator, let us get somewhere safe.

109021001.content: That Orochi, I can't believe she could do such a thing to Kuninotokotachi...

109021002.content: What's worse, from what Kuninotokotachi told us... the thing that fought with her was merely an illusion.

109021003.content: Our enemy must be in hiding because she's protecting something more important. It is time that we meet her face to face.

109021004.content: We got this! With all of us here together, there's nothing to be afraid of!

109021005.content: Ver, you are always so optimistic...

109021007.content: I just think being overly optimistic won't do us any good. We should look at this logically and practically.

109021008.content: Hmm... I did hear of the emergence of two Cognizants in Neuhansa, and I'm assuming they're of the same type as this Orochi character.

109021009.content: So even the Visbanes are able to gain intelligence. Absolutely unheard of...

109021010.content: We had found traces of Cognizants prior to this. And if the ancient tales of Sasanami are true, then Cognizants had already existed, centuries before the time Orochi began her hibernation.

109021012.content: Perhaps. But the sudden emergence of all these Cognizants must mean something...

109021015.content: There's something I want to talk to you about... But we should wait until the mission is over.

109021016.content: Ah, very well... I too have something I want to discuss.

109031004.content: The silver-haired man tears off the guard's arm. The pitch black cables continue to squirm about after they are removed from the torso. They only settle down once they are attached to the man's wound.

109031005.content: The Monk has gone missing. Otherwise, we wouldn't need to do this...

109031006.content: The man tries to move the arm, confirming that his body has adapted to the new limb.

109031008.content: The attic has caught on fire... They're... heading towards the west courtyard...

109031009.content: The west courtyard... They found out Izuru Masayoshi's whereabouts?

109031011.content: Soon, a shadow appears outside the curtain door.

109031012.content: A steel leg tramples into the hallway. The walls of the entrance are split by the bumbling giant, as if some massive steel drum were being crammed into a tiny alley.

109031013.content: Nagazane, what are you doing here?

109031014.content: Where... is the Young Lord... Lady Aya... wants to see... the Young Lord.

109031015.content: Nagazane, your mind is unstable again. Lady Aya left us several years ago.

109031016.content: We can't change that which has occurred. Orochi will perform another adjustment on you.

109031018.content: The girl's voice stops the Strategist in his tracks.

109031019.content: Though the girl who leaps down has an unfamiliar face, the way she calls his name sounds eerily familiar.

109031020.content: It's been a long time, Mr. Takenaka.

109041001.content:
I might have been dead.

The last thing I saw, was the house on fire. Right after Sis Aoi got out, the collapsed columns blocked the doors.

I quickly hid beneath the table, and above me I could hear the room crushing. Every little sound frightened me ever so much.

I wasn't crushed, but the nasty odors I was breathing grew thicker and thicker by the moment.

I called for my brother, for Sis Aoi, for everyone... but no one responded.

I felt so sleepy. My eyes were struggling to stay open, then I felt like I was falling into an incredibly deep valley.

It was so dark. So dark... and I couldn't grab onto anything. And I kept falling... falling… into a deep sleep.

109041010.content:
When I opened my eyes, it felt like I had left my body.

Sometimes it felt like I was a blade of grass. The servants rushed hurriedly past me, going into the high attic and never coming out.

Sometimes it felt like I was a lantern. When brother and the others went into the basement, I would watch the whole ceremony from the rafters.

And other times, I wouldn't see a thing. But, I could still hear Sis Aoi singing with her hoarse voice, the sound of Nagazane training the dogs, and Mr. Takenaka speaking with my brother.

109041017.content: Mr. Takenaka, what you and my brother are doing is not right.

109041018.content: Nagazane's dogs, the loyal guards and servants of the Miyahebi Family, and those who accidentally discovered what was going on. You have hurt too many innocents.

109041019.content: Looks like you are Lady Aya. I'll let Orochi see if she can allow you to live in the body of this girl.

109041020.content: You do not understand, Mr. Takenaka! I am not a child! And I don't even care about myself!

109041021.content: I have seen everything you've done these past four years...

109041022.content: I love you all very much, but I must stop you! Stop! Please... I tried... Yet, no matter how loud I screamed, you never heard me...

109041024.content: Take me to my brother. Me... and Mom, and Dad… We do not want him to seek vengeance on our behalf in such ways.

109041026.content: Okay. Lady Aya, I will take you to the Lord.

109051002.content: The girl jumps anxiously down from the General's shoulder and rushes around, but they were the only three in the massive room.

109051003.content: The Lord is not here at the moment. Once he is finished with his business, I will send him to you.

109051005.content: The girl shouts, stopping the man as he leaves. She stares at the silver-haired man, unconsciously clenching her fists.

109051006.content: I can feel it. I can't stay here for long. You must bring him to me.

109051007.content: Do not worry, Lady Aya. When the Lord hears of this, he will surely be ecstatic.

109051008.content: The Strategist leaves immediately after speaking.

109051009.content: Mr. Takenaka... has changed a lot.

109051010.content: Much has changed, my Lady... but... this will always be your home.

109051012.content: The girl slowly closes her eyes, resting gently on him.

109051013.content: Though the cables on his body are rough and uneven, and the chilly feeling was rather unsettling, for this little girl, there was nowhere else that could be this relaxing.

109051014.content: The world that brother wishes to build... he has the right idea. A world free of war and inequality, where everyone can live in harmony...

109051015.content: But I don't understand... If he wants to build a world of kindness, why doesn't he just change it with kindness?

109051017.content: The General suddenly stops. He looks towards the depths of the gallery and urgently puts the girl behind him to protect her.

109051020.content: General, why are you putting your guard up?

109051022.content: Is that not the child we... "sent away"? Oh, I see... So, there was another soul inhabiting her form.

109051023.content: We have worshipped you for generations. You shouldn't use my brother like this.

109051024.content: Worship? Please, do not mask fear and trepidation with such a beautiful word. Plus, Miyahebi Syuu begged me to take back the power he was rightfully owed.

109051025.content: She was afraid... so she used... the power of the Miyahebi Family... to build an army...

109051026.content: The General's words are cut off by a swiftly attacking serpent shadow. A massive snake smashes the ground on which they stood, nearly swallowing them whole.

109051027.content: Shut it... I'm not afraid of anything, am I?

109051028.content: Tsk. It appears allowing these Fused Visbanes to retain intelligence and memory has its problems...

109051029.content: Though humans understand tactics and orders, they overthink things, growing ever confused. And the more confused they get, the more suspicious they become. Eventually, they're useless.

109051031.content: The General holds the girl in his arms, preparing to flee. But just as he is about to leave, a blade wields itself before them.

109051032.content: Nagazane, we have promised the Lord that we would help him gain control of Sasanami.

109051033.content: Even if that means we must turn to demons, or shed the blood of the innocent.

109051034.content: I... I did say that... but... but now, Lady Aya is still alive...

109051035.content: So, Mr. Takenaka, this is how it is...

109051036.content: I'm sorry, my Lady. My duties to the Miyahebi Family come before my personal relationships.

109051037.content: Lady Aya... is also lord... of the Miyahebi Family...

109051038.content: If this is what you have decided, then so be it. This will not be easy for me.

109051039.content: I must help the Lord achieve his goal. I gave him my word, and this gives meaning to my existence.

109051040.content: They will not listen. Do what you must, Orochi, as we have discussed.

109052002.content: The General's weapon is knocked away by the snake's tail. His tired and tattered body tries to get close to the girl, but as soon as he takes a step, the snake's fangs sink into him like steel nails.

109052003.content: Such an advanced product. What a shame that I must feed it to my children.

109052005.content: Well then. Now all that's left is this pesky child.

109052006.content: Orochi, let me handle her. After all... she was my Lady in the old days.

109052007.content: Well, since you called me here, I suppose you can handle this as you wish.

109052008.content: But I suggest you finish this quickly. There have been enough surprises today.

109052012.content: Even if he sees you, our plan will not stop here.

109052013.content: Perhaps we were initially moved to this out of vengeance and discontent.

109052014.content: But after all these years, the Lord and I realized that if this nation did not change, even if we put aside our personal vendetta, more misfortunes would occur.

109052015.content: The Miyahebi must rule Sasanami. Only then will the evil that's buried itself into our land be weeded out.

109052016.content: I've known the Lord for ten years. In the depths of his soul, a flame burns bright. He is the only one capable of doing this.

109052018.content: Lady Aya, that fire, perhaps for the family it was a one-time disaster. But for me, it meant something different.

109052019.content: It shattered the Lord's illusion of fantasy and fiction, and instilled in him the drive to create a truly great nation.

109052020.content: The Miyahebi Family's sufferings, and your passing away... that was destined by fate.

109052021.content: The past is the past, nothing but memories. You shouldn't be here. It will only burden the Lord.

109052022.content: The man lets out a sigh and looks in another direction, then slowly increases his grip.

109061001.content: Takenaka, I mean... Why hasn't the Strategist returned? Is it so hard to stop those so-called Modifiers?

109061002.content: My Lord, we still can't reach Sir Strategist...

109061003.content: Give it up, Syuu. Neither the four families nor the people will support such methods of usurping power.

109061004.content: Murdering to achieve your lofty ideals. You've obviously gone down the wrong path.

109061005.content: I don't care. All that matters is the result. Whether or not we've done wrong, that is for the future to tell.

109061009.content: But I happened upon a fox on the way...

109061010.content: I am not a fox! It is quite clear that I am a cat!

109061012.content: One of the intruders. The scout is caught, so its team must not be far off.

109061014.content: Ah! Lord Masayoshi, it's a pity we have to meet under such circumstances. Are you hurt?

109061015.content: What are you doing here? Is Tsukuyomi and her crew coming?

109061016.content: Yes, Lord Masayoshi. They are on their way right now. Please rest assured. We will set you free.

109061018.content: The Strategist takes Mininja's tail and whips him into the air.

109061020.content: Mininja is shouting and twirling mid-air, and just before he slams into the ground, a girl snatches him.

109061022.content: V-Ver... Th-Thank you... Just a little dizzy, that's all.

109061023.content: So, all the guests have arrived, have they? Perfect, then let us perform our duties as a host.

109061024.content: Hm... your arms have grown back rather fast.

109061025.content: Last time, I was no match for you, it is true. But I have obviously prepared since then.

109061026.content: Master, Orochi still hasn't shown her face...

109061027.content: Got it. Watch out for a sneak attack. Don't let this fellow distract you.

109061028.content: Servants, come here and take care of these intruders!

109061029.content: You think you can take us with numbers? Well, we've got plenty on our side too!

109081003.content: It's fine, my Lord... Just a flesh wound...

109081004.content: Ver, Hera! Get Lord Masayoshi. Buzenbo, let's take care of the rest of them!

109081006.content: Orochi! Have you forgotten our deal!?

109081007.content: The Modifiers rush towards the enemies.

109081008.content: Though they had clearly lost the ability to resist, just before the Modifiers are about to reach their target, a sudden rumbling stops them in their tracks.

109081009.content: The lanterns hanging high shake violently, and debris falls down like rain, seeping into the growing crack in the ground.

109081013.content: The cries of giant beasts batter their ears, and one after another, a number of mammoth snakes rise up into a standing position, bringing with them a mist that blurs the eyes.

109081014.content: Through the dust-ridden fog, a mocking and awe-inspiring sound can be heard.

109081015.content: I have been called a god, and I strike fear in the hearts of all.

109081016.content: Lowly beings fear me, respect me, and worship me...

109081017.content: In a mere hundred years, have you already forgotten the true ruler of this land?

109081019.content: Is this the Sasanami Snake God that the tales speak of?

109081020.content: The Strategist, take your... weak "Lord" away. Ah yes, and the... Prime Lord? Whatever, take them away. My children are ready for a feast!

109081023.content: You dare speak to me like that!? You'd better watch yourself.

109081024.content: Ver, Hera, don't let them take Izuru Masayoshi away!

109081027.content: Oh? You think splitting up now is the right thing to do? It seems you've underestimated me.

109081028.content: It's fine, Administrator. Rescuing Lord Masayoshi is the first priority. Plus, we won't lose.

109081031.content: Great. Let's use that move and finish her.

109091001.content: You are nothing. Bugs. Insects. And yet your tongues are filled with pride and arrogance.

109091004.content: Even Tsukuyomi can't take her. I've never heard of a Visbane this powerful...

109091005.content: This creature has been hibernating under Sasanami for over a hundred years. We have heard nothing of her existence.

109091007.content: All your babblings, are you providing them intel?

109091008.content: You will not get near the Administrator!

109091009.content: Losers should act accordingly. Step aside and shut up.

109091011.content: A measly human. What are you doing here?

109091012.content: Hm? The Mark... You... You've been corroded?

109091013.content: You suffered such corrosion, yet it didn't leave you a scar. For a human, that's quite unique. You body might give me some inspiration... for that project…

109091014.content: Administrator! I'll buy you some time! You've got to get out of here!

109091017.content: Orochi's finger moves from my cheek to my neck, then slowly towards my heart.

109091018.content: (Why aren't you hiding, rookie? Are you...)

109091019.content: Let me see if you truly possess the power.

109091020.content: Orochi rapidly pulls me in, and effortlessly stabs her hand inside me.

109091023.content: Orochi's words are cut off by a gunshot.

109091024.content: She instinctively pushes me off, but is too late. A bullet hole emitting a faint light appears on Orochi's stomach.

109091026.content: Ookuninushi's new invention. A Bun-Bun Handgun. Not as powerful as most in the Bun-Bun series, but it can be used by most people with a little bit of practice.

109091027.content: Looks like you overslept. Haven't kept up on the technology, have we?

109091028.content: Hey... Even if I knew what you were planning... that was rather risky, rookie.

109091029.content: Sorry, Lord Mimir. If I didn't get that close to her, I couldn't be sure that I would've hit her.

109091030.content: The spot where Orochi had reached inside me left a black mark, but once she had pulled her hand out, it had faded.

109091032.content: The following rounds were stopped by the snakes in front of Orochi. It seems that she was unable to be hit unless she's distracted.

109091033.content: Your struggle is futile. Do not think you can stop me with your tiny little toy! Just one?

109091034.content: Just one? Then what about us!

109091035.content: Tch... So you've recovered, have you?

109091037.content: Orochi acting a bit sluggish. Let's get her while we can!

109101002.content: Saku plunges into Orochi's body, permeating the massive amount of Bane Energy with the Divine Power of the Access Key. Countless squarish gaps appear on her.

109101004.content: Orochi's body has withered away, but...

109101005.content: Why hasn't the scent of Visbanes disappeared...

109101007.content: In the direction of the faint sound.

109101008.content: The girl forces herself up, weary from the bitter battle. And yet the pain seems not to have come from the fight, but from the black fog wrapping around her.

109101009.content: Purple, scaly patterns crawl onto her skin. She tries with all her might to steady her trembling arm, but an immense amount of Bane Energy, enough to swallow the entire room, is pouring out from her body.

109101010.content: Buzenbo? What... is happening to you?

109101011.content: Those patterns mean a Visbane is infecting her. Did you touch Orochi?

109101012.content: I... I don't know... It might be the snake bite...

109101013.content: Orochi's consciousness is using her as a host.

109101015.content: Orochi has put the remaining bits of her data in Buzenbo. She wants to use Buzenbo's body to revive, just like some reptiles who cut off a limb in order to survive.

109101016.content: As the host, Buzenbo will be fine, but... If we don't do something, Orochi will return, in full form.

109101017.content: Mimir, is there any way to stop this?

109101020.content: If I am stabbed with an Access Key... That will stop her.

109101022.content: I can feel it. Her power, squirming about inside me... It will only stop if I die.

109101023.content: She is not incorrect. This is the only way...

109101024.content: Given our current state, there is a very small chance that we will win again.

109101025.content: Master, I'm sorry... Ever since I joined the Pheasant Squad, I've constantly been relying on you...

109101026.content: Training, squad missions... I've never been able to perform up to your standards... I know... you've never been satisfied with me...

109101028.content: You've already applied with Miss Shu... for me to leave the Pheasant Squad, right? This will be our last mission together...

109101029.content: And even if it's our last mission, I messed it up... I've been nothing but a burden to everybody...

109101030.content: I... I don't deserve to be your disciple...

109101031.content: There must be another way. Do not give up, Buzenbo.

109101033.content: Administrator, you are the commander for this mission... It's up to you.

109101035.content: If you don't do it, we'll all die here... Me, or the whole team. The decision is clear...

109101038.content: Hehe... Do not bother yourself. Weak, irresolute, too human. I will allow you to continue this pity party in the stomachs of my children.

109101040.content: The sounds of Orochi reverberate throughout Buzenbo's mind, as if her soul is splitting, and some other form is being born.

109101041.content: I... will not let this happen!

109101042.content: Buzenbo takes one last look at her teammates.

109101043.content: She closes her eyes, now filled with warm tears, plunging her katana towards her heart—the Kogarasu Maru, a gift from her adoptive father, representing discipline, faith, and kindness.

109101044.content: Before the blade strikes, she hears the cries of her teammates, and the sound of her Master rushing towards her... but none of that can stop her now.

109101045.content: Of all these years of practicing kendo, this is by far the most peaceful and fulfilling moment for Buzenbo.

109101046.content: For this... is for those she loves most.

109101051.content: She glances at her katana, which has been knocked away, and the smoking barrel which is pointed at her.

109101052.content: It is difficult to choose between reason and emotion... This is my first time making such a decision. I do not know what the right thing to do is.

109101053.content: But I still remember what Ver and Miss Shu told me the first day I arrived at Aether Gazer.

109101054.content: We fight to protect those that we care about... Aether Gazer, is a family for the Modifiers...

109101055.content: I could not tell them that I was willing to sacrifice Buzenbo for the mission.

109101056.content: And I know that everyone in Aether Gazer feels the same. No one would sacrifice a comrade for victory.

109101058.content: Buzenbo,... it is not because I thought poorly of you, that I applied for your transfer. It is because I felt like I was holding you back.

109101060.content: I lacked the ability to sense others' feelings, and I lost someone because of that... I didn't want you to be like me, putting all your effort into kendo, but lacking that quality which is most important.

109101062.content: I know, Buzenbo, I was wrong.... My mistakes once caused loved ones to leave me. Ever since then, I didn't allow myself to try and understand others. And yet, this did nothing but lead to the same mistake.

109101063.content: I am sorry for not telling you how I truly felt, and for not trying to understand you.

109101064.content: Buzenbo, you have always... been my proudest achievement...

109101067.content: Do not hold back. Let her out.

109101069.content: Trust me. When you wake up, it will all be over.

109101070.content: I've got so much to teach you. And there is much I have yet to tell you... So you must remain my disciple.

109101071.content: Yes... Master... I will believe in you... forever...

109101072.content: Wahaha!!! What fun! You... You actually let me out.

109101073.content: What a pity, for I've got a few more moves up my sleeve. Are you naive, or simply foolish?

109101074.content: A massive, serpent-like shadow rises up on the walls, like it is hatching from an egg. The black mist spurting from Buzenbo congeals into a human form.

109101075.content: Administrator, this is going to get ugly. Would you mind lending a hand?

109101076.content: Of course. Lord Mimir and I will do our best.

109101077.content: There's much I need to thank you for. But let's leave that for later...

109101078.content: Tsukuyomi throws the katana on the floor. A violet thunder flashes on her side as a mighty gale wraps around her.

109101079.content: She raises her arms high into the air, and the katana flashes down like a bolt of lightning, landing in her hand. As she lowers the katana, gusts of wind barrel from both sides.

109101080.content: Now, let's take care of this... pesky snake.

109101082.content: Forget it. I don't care what moves you use, you don't think you're getting away today, do you?

109101083.content: No one is getting away, Orochi.

109101084.content: There is only one end to this. You will die here.

109101086.content: Administrator, Orochi revived. The mission continues, I need your command.

109101088.content: Roger, Administrator. Tsukuyomi unsheathing the 2nd Access Key, Shinri.

109111001.content: A youth in a white jumping among the roofs.

109111002.content: He searches for traces of the person on the ground, but the breathing of the girl on his back grows weaker.

109111003.content: Please... take me to my brother...

109111005.content: Kagutsuchi can feel the girl nodding her head.

109111006.content: He has made a terrible mistake... but... but I know he has tried his best...

109111007.content: I... I just... miss my brother... my... old brother...

109111008.content: Conserve your energy. Your soul is unstable. If you keep this up, your soul will leave this body.

109111010.content: Kagutsuchi, if we take her to see her brother, what about the mission?

109111011.content: I'm getting the feeling that these two things are much more connected than we had imagined.

109111012.content: The person who gave Miyahebi Syuu what he needed to call forth the Snake God, expected all this. I mean, this place has been turned into a hive for the Fused Visbanes, and it's destroyed because they captured the Prime Lord... Someone is behind all this.

109111013.content: Which means... that someone is about to tie up the final loose ends.

109111014.content: Kagutsuchi stops in a wide patch of grass. He stares at the giant sakura that lies before him. On the shrine located behind the tree is a young girl, sitting on the roof and swinging her legs.

109111015.content: Eh? Hmm... According to my plan, there's nothing about someone appearing here.

109111016.content: Well then, what should I do? You've seen that which you ought not to have seen. Ah, could you do me a favor and forget it?

109111017.content: It was so hard to believe that such a little girl was behind all these incidents. Even a mere try of explanation will let him believe her innocence, which she didn't even bother to try.

109111018.content: Snowy white silk threads crisscross through the treetops, wrapped around a frozen body, hanging like a puppet.

109111019.content: The silver-haired man extends his right arm, as if trying to take back something that he had been robbed of.

109111020.content: But just then, the wings of a moth burst forth from his body, taking his life instantly.

109111022.content: Hehe... Haha.. La la la la la la la la...

109111023.content: Instead of answering, the young girl begins humming an unfamiliar tune.

109111024.content: Hey. We've met, remember? Four years ago, right here.

109111025.content: The young girl pokes her chin with her finger, coming a bit closer to Kagutsuchi as she laughs.

109111027.content: Yeah. Come on now, think about it! La la la la la la la la...

109111028.content: Kagutsuchi takes the girl off his back and places her down.

109111029.content: The soul data which had inhabited her body had left, returning Cee-cee to her rightful form. Kagutsuchi had tried his best, but it was not enough to allow her to see her brother one last time.

109111030.content: Where is the Lord of the Miyahebi Family?

109111031.content: He did something he should not have done. When the prey takes the bait, it is only right to bring it in.

109111032.content: Shadow Crow, take Cee-cee back to the Karasugo Family.

109111034.content: The Lord told us that the person we are looking for would reveal themself today. Now that I have found her, I must complete the mission.

109121001.content: Two days after the Miyahebi Incident, Aether Gazer Command Room.

109121002.content: There is no need to debrief in such a hurry. Both the Administrator and Ver have filled me in on most of what occurred.

109121003.content: And, it will take some time to recover from an emergency activation of the 2nd Access Key, especially when you were already seriously injured.

109121004.content: I'm fine. And I haven't returned just to report. I am concerned about how Kuninotokotachi's surgery went.

109121005.content: Don't worry. It went well. The prosthetic eye was implanted in time, but it will be a while for the corrosion to subside.

109121006.content: She completely overlooked her own safety for the sake of her teammates. Not like the lackadaisical Kuninotokotachi we're used to.

109121008.content: Lord Masayoshi seems to be fine. He was merely knocked out, that is all. But Miyahebi Syuu cannot be found.

109121009.content: When Ver and Hera arrived, they found the situation just as you described. And yet they found more than one set of footprints. We are quite baffled at the moment...

109121010.content: We believe the Miyahebi Family will formally resign from the Sasanami Five. For the sake of social stability, Lord Masayoshi has decided not to speak of the Visbane experiments and Orochi to the public.

109121011.content: That is a wise choice. The struggles among the Sasanami Five have been going on for centuries. With so many sudden changes, it would be inappropriate to put more pressure on the people.

109121012.content: And I have a feeling that this is only the beginning. Please, stay attentive to the future situation in Sasanami.

109121014.content: On a lighter note, I heard you have taken a new position on whether Buzenbo should leave the Pheasant Squad?

109121015.content: Yes. Sorry for troubling you again. I...

109121016.content: No need to explain. As long as you have made your decision.

109121017.content: Thank you. Ah, yes... Why haven't I seen the Administrator and Ver?

109121018.content: Something just happened at the Medical Department, so they all rushed over there.

109121020.content: No, no, no. It's not like that. Nothing bad. How about we head there together?

109121021.content: Oh, you've all just made a big fuss about nothing.

109121022.content: But... Mimtastic said they didn't know when you'd wake up. I thought...

109121023.content: Alright, alright. But I'm fine now, aren't I?

109121024.content: Baldr, you've been in a coma for three days. You must be starving. How about I treat you to some... BBQ!?!?

109121026.content: Eh? Um... Isn't this like, the perfect time?

109121027.content: Before that, she's got to lie down and make sure she recovers properly.

109121029.content: Actually, I don't feel much. Kinda like, I've been sleeping for a long, long time and I just woke up.

109121031.content: Stay still. That's where you were hit by a Visbane.

109121032.content: Ha... Shu, there you are. And Tsukuyomi, hey.

109121033.content: It's so wonderful to see you awake.

109121034.content: Hehe... Guess I'm tougher than that ninja bozo next door, huh?

109121035.content: (Sigh)... You nearly passed onto the other side. It seems you are still unaware of the severity of your situation.

109121036.content: Uh, urhaha... Well, I'm back, aren't I?

109121037.content: Heh... I hope your optimistic attitude helps your wounds heal quicker.

109121038.content: Shu sighs deeply, then turns to look at me.

109121039.content: Administrator, please come with me for a moment.

109121040.content: I've got something important to discuss with you in private.

110011001.content:
The harmonious forest was filled with all manner of adorable animals great and small. Yet none were as adorable, nor popular, as the little Sheep.

Her highly-praised fleece was white and soft as fresh snow, and it seemed all the other animals of the forest wished to befriend her.

Yet one day a terrible wildfire ravaged the forest. The Sheep survived, but suffered scary burns.

She looked upon her hideous scars and was afraid she would lose everyone's love.

These anxieties drove the Sheep to apply similar-looking cotton fluff to her wounds. It was painful, but it could recreate the Sheep's formerly beautiful fleece.

110011006.content:
The cotton fleece deceived most of the forest animals with one exception—the wily Fox.

The Sheep sought out the Fox and pleaded with him to not reveal her secret.

But instead, the Fox said to the Sheep, "Why do you try so hard to hide your injury? The forest does not love you for your white fleece, but for your kind heart. Let everyone see your injury and you'll be just as popular as before."

The Sheep trusted the Fox's advice, and revealed her hideous scarring. Indeed, far from abandoning the Sheep, her many forest friends gathered around to console her with kind words and fresh grass.

But it did not last for long. The Sheep soon noticed the other animals sought her company less often, sometimes they even quietly avoided her…

110011011.content:
Aunt Antelope: "Poor child. That scar is so hideous."

Uncle Bear: "I want to remain friends, but how can I ignore that hideous wound?"

Brother Squirrel: "Rather than pretending nothing is wrong, it'd be so much easier not to talk to her anymore."

Such words came to the Sheep's ears increasingly often.

If only the Sheep had not listened to the Fox's advice, then even today she might enjoy her old popularity.

This is what I thought after hearing that story.

110021001.content: Go past the Division Nine Meeting Room and the Aether Gazer Tower stairs up to floor 179 and one will find the Medical Department, and its medical AGI Mechas. Or one would have, anyway, until a few days ago when the area was locked to ordinary personnel without further explanation.

110021002.content: A sign above the door at the end of the hallway reads "Treatment Room 1".

110021003.content: I gingerly enter the door's password as I protectively place the important device behind my back—

110021005.content: An explosive bang rips toward me the instant the door opens, rippling across the ground to an explosive stop ten meters away from my defenseless body thanks to a transparent reinforced barrier.

110021006.content: Hmm. Not afraid—not even one bit? You're a brave one.

110021007.content: The girl recalls the object she had just stuck into the transparent reinforced barrier, which for lack of a better word could be described as a kind of "sword wing", back to her hands with a flick of her fingers.

110021008.content: Without the barrier, that should have flattened the entire floor. I may thank the barrier for saving my life. This "Treatment Room" should have become little more than a holding cell for her tremendous powers...

110021010.content: We lost comms with the Overture Squad once they fell down into the Source Layer, but a review of the footage after the event left no one in doubt as to the terrifying powers at this girl's fingertips.

110021011.content: I remember you. The "Administrator", right? You're a fragile little thing, especially compared to the others.

110021012.content: What game is Shu playing, I wonder, sending you in here while she hides in her office?

110021014.content: Aether Gazer Command Room, 3 days ago

110021016.content: It's about Osiris. We haven't seen Osiris' personality reassert itself since she returned from Neuhansa.

110021017.content: Please let Miss Shu and the others go... I can give you my body... Ausar...

110021018.content: Ugh... You will regret trusting these weaklings!

110021019.content: So that means... If Osiris hasn't asserted herself, then the individual currently in control of her body must be—

110021021.content: Shu avoids meeting my eyes for a moment. She does not often do this.

110021022.content: Administrator, I'd like to talk to you about Osiris and Ausar. About what we know of each one's personality, and how our relationship and her situation have deteriorated...

110021023.content: These are things known by very few. We had thought our problems could be solved by placing the Ausar personality under a tight leash. But it looks like we were wrong...

110021024.content: Things have gotten to the point where I'm afraid we need you...

110021025.content: Heh. So... what do you want for me?

110021026.content: The girl kicks up her legs. A strange expression outwardly of a smile, but without the friendliness or warmth, appears on her face. Ravaged pillars around her feet paint a picture of pure destruction, as do the scars across the reinforced barrier of her masterful fury.

110021027.content: All this serves to remind me that I ought to consider the girl at least as dangerous as any Visbane, and probably more so...

110021028.content: I let out a deep sigh as I prepare to speak the words given to me—

110021031.content: That's so funny! Don't tell me that Shu sent you all the way here to tell me this? Ridiculous.

110021032.content: Now you listen to me... Once I get out of here, I will teach Shu and all the rest of you a painful lesson! Then you'll learn the consequences of angering me!

110021033.content: (The answer I had expected, albeit rather bluntly delivered without the least pretense...)

110021034.content: Ausar, is the reason you don't want to be a part of us because you feel we are too "weak"?

110021035.content: Hmph. What else can one say?

110021036.content: But from what I could see of the battle record from Neuhansa, you were subdued by Shu and Ver.

110021037.content: Oh... Shut up! Couldn't you see Osiris was getting in my way... Wait, what's that look on your face!

110021039.content: What, are you trying to provoke me?! Look at all the trouble you had with one little burned-out factory. And your teammate is still lying on the bed. What else am I to conclude but that you're a bunch of pathetic weaklings?

110021040.content: Then are you saying... you would have succeeded on the Spealght mission where we failed?

110021041.content: Is it not obvious? Those children's toys can't even compare to a flick of my wrist.

110021042.content: Then how about we make a deal: I let you out of here if you, Ausar, can really handle the Spealght mission on your own.

110021043.content: Is there any reason for such pointless promises? We both know the factory's goose is cooked. How am I supposed to prove myself now?

110021044.content: Not quite. There's a way. We may not be able to fully recreate the battle, yes, but we can do almost as good a job.

110021045.content: Ausar looks at me strangely. I've steered the conversation to the right place. Then I take a step back and present the Cryptics' new device.

110021046.content: What exactly is that ugly little thing?

110021047.content: It's a DreamLink Infiltrator. Just by putting it on, you can infiltrate any virtual dreamscape from the system.

110021048.content: So you want me to prove I could've handled the Spealght mission on my own with that?

110021049.content: Well. How will you know if I succeed?

110021050.content: The Cryptics have upgraded the DreamLink with the ability to take me with you.

110021052.content: Ausar breaks out in menacing guffaws accentuated by the release of several sword wings in my direction before I can respond...

110021053.content: The reinforced barrier responds with a loud crackling soon reflected by cracks visible by the naked eye. I have every confidence intellectually her powers are under control here, but my sharp intake of breath says otherwise.

110021054.content: Did you take this little trinket with you in the hopes I might enter your dreamscape?

110021055.content: Whatever, as if I care about your little games... And as far as I can tell, none of Shu's schemes have ever succeeded.

110021056.content: ...If you really do succeed in handling the Spealght mission all on your own, I'll keep my side of the bargain.

110021057.content: You intrigue me. Very well. I'll take you on a little jaunt. Pass me the helmet through the partition. I won't hurt you.

110021058.content: I'm honestly curious to see what kind of dreamscape you've built. I'm ready. We can begin any time...

110021060.content: What? I can't see a thing! What are you waiting for? Stupid design.

110021061.content: Umm, I'm sorry, but I think you've got it on backwards.

110031001.content:
Friend A: "I don't know if I would ever meet anyone else as kind-hearted as Lil' Osi."

Friend B: "Yeah, she's a real darling. Won't bother a fly. By the way, did you get the present she made too?"

Friend C: "Lil' Osi was the only one who noticed I was feeling a bit down last month and, when I got back to my room, I found a little handmade doll and a nice letter she wrote!"

Friend A: "I heard she even took in a stray cat last week, and has been nursing it back to health day and night…"

Friend C: "If there's a candidate for a real living angel among us, I think Lil' Osi must be it."

110031006.content:
The girl's ears pricked up at the mention of her name. She paused en route, her eyes dipping in nervous excitement soon after.

Osiris: "I was just... doing what I should for my friends."

The girl wanted to join her friends on the battlefield, but she was not ready yet. She still needed more practice and training. Thus, she decided to support her friends in some other way…

A smile tugged at the corners of the girl's mouth. There was something wonderful about receiving that kind of praise. She took her good mood back to the break room, and a fresh resolve to be the kind of person all her friends would love.

110041001.content:
Friend C: "Hey Lil' Osi, this is for you!"

Osiris: "Oh, what is it?"

Friend C: "A doll of you! I probably did such a bad job you don't recognize it?"

Osiris: "No, I do, but..."

Friend C: "I thought I should give you a present in return—for your handmade doll last month? It was so cute! I just have to look at it whenever I get stressed."

Osiris: "Oh, right! Th-Thank you!"

110041007.content:
The girl returned to her room, gift in hand, to find her cat by the door. Already well on its way to recovery, it brushed up to the girl's leg.

Osiris: "Hey, little kitty... You can walk now!"

Cat: "Meow!"

The cat lifted its head in an enthusiastic response. The girl rubbed the cat affectionately and placed it back on its bed.

Osiris: "Heh..."

Ausar: "I just can't figure out this dirty furball's appeal?"

110041013.content:
Osiris: "Huh?"

Ausar: "Or that weird little doll thing. What was it meant to look like?"

Osiris: "Am I dreaming? Where's that... voice coming from?"

The girl surveyed her room, looked under her bed and on the balcony, but still couldn't find the source of the mysterious voice.

Osiris: "If it's not coming from anywhere in this room, then does that mean..."

Osiris: "Was that... me?"

110051001.content:
Osiris: "Oh no... I don't understand. Did I do that?"

The girl stared at the handmade doll on the ground. She clearly remembered placing it by her bedside table yesterday.

The doll had been ripped in two, a fitting allegory for the soul of the girl currently looking at it.

Osiris: "K-Kitty?"

Cat: "Meow... meow..."

A terrified little kitten peaked out from under the sofa, its recently healed front paws trembling in fear as if terrified of its master and something she had done.

110051007.content:
The girl thought to herself: Oh no. Is it possible I did something horrendous here?

She turned slowly to the mirror, and was shocked at the figure staring back at her.

Osiris: "Who... are... you?"

110061001.content:
In the training room, the girl wielded her scythe hard. Even though she was sweating profusely and her hands holding the heavy scythe kept shaking, the girl gritted her teeth and raised her arms again and again.

Disassociating herself into two identities? That must be the girl's fault... She's too useless.

It's time to stop mucking around and to become stronger... This girl won't let erveryone down!

Friend A: "Hey, do you feel like Lil' Osi is pushing herself a bit hard these days?"

Friend B: "Yeah. She's always had a great work ethic, but... You know, it might be because she's got her hands on the new Access Key and can't wait to use its full potential?"

Friend A: "Come to think of it, what did you think of Lil' Osi' behavior at the last 'Test of Courage'"?

110061007.content:
The very voice the girl most dreaded was the same she found whispering into her ear.

"Was there something deeply dark and cynical within Osiris? Or had her 'good girl persona' being an act all along?"

It was her greatest fear, and drove the girl into an endless honing of her skills with the new Access Key, so as to hopefully never hear that voice again.

Ausar: "Hmph. Such a little princess. Wouldn't it be easier to just wipe them all out?"

Argh.

Friend A: "Lil' Osi, what's wrong?"

Friend B: "She's fainted! Q-Quick! Call the Medical Department!"

110071001.content:
Verthandi: "Hey, Lil' Osi, guess what?! We're in the same group for the first round tenure test!"

Osiris: "Oh, yeah. I got the message."

Verthandi: "Uh... You don't seem that happy about it, Lil' Osi. Oh, I get it! Are you worried I'll bring the group bad luck?"

Osiris: "No, not at all... I'm very happy to be in the same group with you, Sis Ver. I'm just... afraid I'll be holding you back."

Verthandi: "What? Your efforts in the training room have become legendary."

Osiris: "..."

110071007.content:
Verthandi: "You're worried about fainting again? Don't even think twice about it. It's really common in training. I've even been known to faint from hunger a few times."

Osiris: "Umm... I don't think it's the same, is it?"

Verthandi: "Come on. Let's just do our best! We'll be joining the Special Task Force together this year."

Osiris: "Right! I'll do my best!"

Ausar: "Hmph. You'll never win with such a weak teammate by your side."

Osiris: "Ugh..."

110071013.content:
Verthandi: "What's wrong?"

Osiris: "I'm fine... I-I just need a bit of rest."

Osiris runs to the nearest bathroom. She keeps staring in the mirror. She sees her face one moment, another the next. Finally, she sags exhausted against the bathroom wall as she struggles to contain her mounting sense of disgust.

Osiris: I can't... I... don't think I can hold her off.

110081001.content:
Osiris: "Looks like we... didn't make the cut once again."

Verthandi: "Oh, yeah well... Miss Shu doesn't mince words, does she?"

Verthandi: "'You can't even dodge such an attack.' 'You even tripped your teammate up.' 'Such cooperation will never allow you to pass the test.' and so on."

Osiris: "I'm sorry... I felt very distracted during the test."

Verthandi: "That's alright. We can always redo the test in a few days."

Osiris: "Sis Ver, you joined Aether Gazer to protect humanity, right?"

110081007.content:
Verthandi: "Yes. But if you want to be specific, the source of all my precious memories—my family, friends, the forest around my hometown, you know. I won't allow anyone to harm them."

Osiris: "Wow. T-That's amazing..."

Verthandi: "Oh, is it? I don't think so, heh..."

Osiris: "I basically grew up at Aether Gazer. The Special Task Force was a natural step to repay everyone's kindness. But I never thought about it the way you do."

Verthandi: "I'm not sure I agree with that... I think you're really amazing in your own right."

Verthandi: "Isn't that why you're working so hard? I thought that was your biggest motivator—to try to give something back?"

110081013.content:
Osiris: "..."

Verthandi: "Alright. We'd better feed our hungry bellies first. Come on, we're gonna pass the test tomorrow, okay?!"

Yet Verthandi's words were cold comfort for the girl at that moment. Because the girl realized, deep down, her situation was nowhere near as rosy as it looked.

These sorts of casual encouragements felt more like a weight on the girl's shoulders or a spiderweb trapping her movement.

Osiris: "Can I... trust the words of the Fox?"

110091001.content:
Beep... beep... beep...

The transparent fluid traveled through the cannula into the girl's veins. She regained consciousness without any idea of how or when she had been transported there.

The girl noticed blurry shadows moving and talking from outside the window. Their conversation appeared somewhat heavy-laden.

Shu: "Are you sure it's another personality entirely?"

Ookuninushi: "Yes. In terms of body language, speech patterns, everything, there's no match between our Osiris and the person who destroyed the training room."

Shu: "How could I not have seen this coming..."

110091007.content:
The girl listened to the conversation as her hands unconsciously squeezed the bed sheet.

They already knew?

Was this sweet, good-natured girl's body inhabited by an evil, violent entity incapable of neither empathy or kindness, but only destruction…

What would become of her? Was she destined for a life under a microscope like some kind of lab rat? Could she even hide this new reality from everyone? People would begin to treat her differently.

The girl wanted to leave her bed, but found herself incapable of movement.

Shu: "Do you have any idea of the cause?"

110091013.content:
Ookuninushi: "Most likely overuse of that Access Key, Living Soul, generated a whole new personality."

Osiris: No... She was here before I got the Living Soul...

Shu: "Even so, this is a kind of pathological sickness, correct?"

Osiris: Pathological sickness?

Ookuninushi: "Yeah. I'll come up with a treatment plan over the next few days. Don't let her use that Access Key again before then."

Shu: "Okay. We'll keep a close eye on her..."

110091019.content:
The girl decided not to say the words on the tip of her tongue.

They're right. If this is an illness, then the girl's just a helpless bystander. Sometimes people just get sick. Nothing anyone can do about that.

Yes… All the girl needs to get better is simply to accept this treatment…

Osiris: "All I'm doing is simply not disclosing a few things that I'm not sure about anyway. I'd hardly consider that lying…"

110101001.content:
Osiris: I... I didn't tell them the truth.

Friend B: "I can't believe what's happened to our lovely Lil' Osi. What a terrible, strange illness!"

Friend A: "Imagine having to share control over your own body with another entity! Terrifying!"

Friend C: "But that's alright. Lil' Osi will be fine again after the operation."

Yet Osiris found cold comfort in these encouraging words, which also reminded her of the truth—she had been concealing.

The girl lay on the operating table. A few extremely bright lights banished every shadow from the room like dazzling moons.

She heard the sound of the surgical tweezers being removed from the box, as the echocardiogram kept beeping in rhythmic fashion…

110101008.content:
Shu: "It'll be completely fine, Osiris. All this will be over after a short nap."

Osiris: "Miss Shu, what will happen to the other... personality after the operation?"

Shu: "Don't worry about it, okay? Ookuninushi thinks she'll simply not reappear ever again."

Osiris: "Does that mean she will... vanish forever?"

Shu: "It was simply a side effect of using the Living Soul. We aren't even sure whether it's a real personality or just a partial aspect of one."

Shu: "Don't overthink it, Osiris... All we're doing is helping you recover back to normal."

Osiris: Back to normal... But what if this personality has always been a part of me?

110101015.content:
Medical AGI Mecha: "Preparing to administer special anesthesia, 10 milligrams, 20 milligrams…"

Osiris: I've lied to everyone... They're going to remove her like some sort of parasite, but no one's asked her for her opinion.

Medical AGI Mecha: "30 milligrams..."

Osiris: "Wait, Miss Shu..."

Medical AGI Mecha: "40 milligrams... 50 milligrams... anesthetic administered."

Medical AGI Mecha: "Target has been sedated. Commencing personality separation procedure."

110111001.content:
Friend A: "Why did they call off the operation all of a sudden?"

Friend B: "I don't know. The Medical Department didn't say anything to anyone..."

Friend C: "Poor girl. So that evil personality is still stuck in Osiris' body, right?"

Osiris: "..."

Friend C: "So where is Lil' Osi right now?"

Friend B: "I heard they're keeping her under observation... and Shu is teaching her how to suppress the other personality."

110111007.content:
Friend A: "How did you find that out?"

Friend B: "The observation room is off limits, but I happened to catch sight of Lil' Osi sitting by herself when I walked past. She looked real lonely."

Mimtastic: "It's time to administer the medication, Osiris."

Osiris: "Mimtastic... Did I do that? I mean, destroy the equipment in the observation room and damage all those AGI Mechas?"

Mimtastic: "Oh... No, that wasn't you, Osiris."

Mimtastic: "Well, I suppose it was in some sense... In summary, you are unwell, Osiris, but you'll be fine once we treat this sickness."

110111013.content:
Osiris: "..."

Mimtastic: "I'm sorry... Shu asked us not to let you see any of these, but your body seems to be resisting the anesthetics. We weren't sure when you'd wake."

Osiris: "It's okay. I can sense what happens to my body... And there's no concealing bruises or injections."

Osiris: "So the Sheep chose to ignore the Fox's words and lie to keep her secret. But the outcome was never in doubt—the Sheep could not be popular forever…"

Mimtastic: "I don't get your meaning, Osiris..."

Osiris: "That's alright. I'm sorry, let's administer the medicine."

110122003.content: There's a hole in his armor on the left side, attack there!

110122004.content: I was going to do that anyway! I don't need your orders!

110122005.content: Halphas misses. In the short interval while Halphas rebalances, Auras' three sword wings pierce his armor, leaving a large hole.

110122008.content: Ausar flicks her fingers as another three sword wings viciously and instantly respond to her command, burying themselves inside the armor...

110122009.content: The attack sets off a chain of crackling explosions that soon topples the giant machine in front of me. My companion grins proudly.

110122010.content: Impossible! Impossible impossible! IMPOSSIBLE!!! How could it be! The Great One has given me this power, and with these two brats—

110122011.content: Thinking of running? I've not allowed it.

110122012.content: Ausar gives the word and sends the sword wings just recovered straight toward Halphas' very own body.

110122015.content: I can't help but salute the girl's victory.

110122016.content: No sooner do I allow myself this moment to relax when her floating figure disappears before my eyes—

110122017.content: I see a turquoise shadow flash past and then quite a lot of force on my neck.

110122020.content: I fulfilled my side of the bargain. I demonstrated I could take down the AGI Mecha legion all by myself. Now it's your turn.

110122021.content: Oh, but I don't want to trouble you. Let me do it.

110122022.content: A strange numbness works its way up my arms and legs toward my head like some sort of strange entity is invading my consciousness. I note Ausar's red eyes boring down at me.

110122023.content: The longer you stay here, the deeper your consciousness will be connected with my dream. And your words just proved my guess. So now, it's the best time for me to invade your mind.

110122024.content: This was your plan all along... when you agreed...

110122025.content: Ah! Did you really think I was so naive as to believe you would simply set me free?

110122026.content: Don't worry. I can't be bothered killing you. But I will need your help opening the treatment room door.

110122027.content: Don't try to fight it. Be a darling and go to sleep.

110122028.content: I try to eke out a sound, but it is impossible. Worse still, I feel a foreign entity moving in my body and, as it moves, wresting control.

110122029.content: Even if I tried to resist, I know that there is no way for my severely fatigued consciousness to resist the incredible momentum. My sight fades to black.

110131002.content: I regain consciousness and open my eyes to an unfamiliar world.

110131003.content: I am surrounded by structures and decorations suspended in mid-air, reminiscent of millennia-old architecture. The same vista greets me wherever I look. I begin to think I have awoken in some kind of ancient museum.

110131004.content: I'm still in the dreamscape... But this isn't one of the system's worlds. Does that mean I'm—

110131006.content: I stand up and yell out Osiris' name. The virtual wind carries my voice quite well, but I hear no response.

110131007.content: The Cryptics thought that tethering Ausar's consciousness to the dreamscape very tightly could grant me access to Osiris' consciousness. I just hadn't expected Ausar's bait-and-switch to indirectly prove the point.

110131008.content: This looks like Osiris' Imago Room... So I should be able to find her somewhere.

110131009.content: Osiris! Can you hear me? Osiris!

110131012.content: I'm suddenly greeted by a familiar voice. I call out several times in response, but hear nothing.

110131013.content: Was that a figment of my imagination?

110131014.content: I look at the wooden door of the house behind me. The strange space is filled with endless doors of this type. The faded orange doors are filled with old markings. Something seems to be leading me to open the one I stand before. I can't help myself.

110131016.content: Administrator, what are you doing here?

110131017.content: The confused girl looks up at me as I rush over to clasp her hand without another thought.

110131018.content: I'll fill you in on the details later. You've got to follow me out of here—we can't let Ausar keep control over your body!

110131019.content: I am met with very powerful resistance the moment I try to lift her—

110131021.content: I won't leave, Administrator... I promised Ausar she could have my body in Neuhansa.

110131022.content: And so you've just allowed yourself to be held captive? You don't need to keep that promise!

110131023.content: It's not just that... I really think Ausar is much better suited for the missions.

110131025.content: Yes... I'm sure Ausar will be able to resolve any troubling situations. She's much stronger than me.

110131026.content: Hey look, It's not a question of strength, Osiris. You're our partner! And Ausar won't join us for now.

110131027.content: Ausar hates you all, but it's not entirely her fault...

110131029.content: You didn't see my memories along your route, Administrator? I'm sure you must have an inkling of what I've been feeling and thinking. You can surely guess the truth by now...

110131031.content: Osiris isn't the good little girl you all thought. She has moments of selfishness, deceitfulness, and she's a coward willing to sacrifice another to keep it all under wraps.

110131032.content: They're right. If this is an illness, then the girl's just a helpless bystander. Sometimes people just get sick. Nothing anyone can do about that.

110131033.content: Yes... All the girl need to get better is simply to accept this treatment…

110131034.content: I knew perfectly well Ausar wasn't generated by the Living Soul. And yet I still thought I could use Aether Gazer to get rid of her...

110131035.content: No, the Medical Department made a mistake!

110131036.content: What's the difference?! I allowed the operation to go ahead anyway because... I secretly thought I'd be better off without Ausar.

110131037.content: It'd mean no more strange looks, no more doubts about what a great kid Osiris is. That was my goal all along!

110131038.content: I can make out tears around Osiris' eyes. The gentle-looking girl has always done her very best to look strong, but it seems to have come at a cost of having to process considerable inner turmoil herself.

110131039.content: I realize this might be the very first time I've come face to face with the real Osiris.

110131040.content: The only reason she gifted presents, or treated others so well, was to hide her big secret. And it led her to the biggest lie she'd ever told...

110131041.content: Alright. So what? What about now?

110131043.content: Even if that's all absolutely correct... (Cough!)

110131045.content: (I can feel Ausar's external attack against my consciousness. I won't be able to hold on much longer...)

110131046.content: Listen to me, Osiris... Shu realized all this a long time ago.

110131047.content: That operation was aborted not because it was impossible to kill Ausar, but because everyone found out the truth along the way......

110131048.content: We attempted an operation on Osiris to eliminate the Ausar personality.

110131050.content: Yes. We basically tried to remove the Ausar personality from Osiris like we might do for a virus. We thought she was generated by the Living Soul...

110131051.content: But the Medical Department made a shocking discovery during the operation...

110131052.content: The Ausar personality was not generated after Osiris got the Living Soul, but long before—we traced her all the way back to Osiris' own awakening.

110131053.content: It made it all but impossible to determine which personality ought be in true command of the body.

110131055.content: We also found that Ausar was responsible for safely controlling the tremendous amount of chaotic energy generated by the Living Soul. Ausar was forced to step in on Osiris' behalf many times.

110131057.content: Yes. Not only did Ausar refuse to harm Osiris during the process, but exposed herself to considerable risk from the Living Soul.

110131058.content: Miss Shu knew about this all along? Then why did she...

110131059.content: Why did she never tell me...

110131060.content: Listen to me, Osiris: None of it matters—being a good kid, strong or powerful, whatever...

110131061.content: We're not going to mince words or say "anyone would have done the same". What you did to Ausar was bad. It almost cost her life.

110131062.content: But we'll work with you to find a solution as long as it's possible... And even if we fail, at least we can all take responsibility for it together...

110131063.content: No one is going to abandon you because you're not powerful or avoid you because you've made mistakes...

110131064.content: But how can everyone just accept me again after all I've done?

110131065.content: You are our friend. You've been the one who's stayed by our side all this time, and we want that to continue...

110131069.content: Hey YOU!!! Had fun exploring my head?

110131070.content: (I'm done for! She's really angry now.)

110131071.content: Who is protecting you? Who let you into my consciousness!

110131072.content: Eh... We planned the whole thing out in advance.

110131073.content: Watch your words, rookie. That was very precarious! I nearly had to institute a system-wide shutdown to keep your consciousness safe!

110131074.content: Nifty trick. Then what's your next!

110131075.content: Did I not say it clear enough? I said: "We"!

110131076.content: I lift up my left hand in Ausar's direction. The bloody mark in the center of my palm is clearly visible.

110131078.content: You sent the signal too late! You're in real danger if she succeeds now!

110131079.content: I'm sorry, I just want to buy us more time.

110131080.content: It's too dangerous... You've got to tell me next time before you decide to risk it.

110131081.content: Hah! Thought of everything, have you? Luring me to attack your consciousness as a distraction, and sneaking 'em into the dreamscape too, huh?

110131083.content: I saw her in the Imago Room, but didn't have enough time to bring her out.

110131084.content: Understood. Ver and I will subdue Ausar and see if we can find another opportunity.

110131085.content: Subdue me? Hahhahah! You really thought you beat me last time? I almost feel sorry for you!

110131086.content: You wanna try it? Haha! Then give me your best shot!

110141001.content: But how can everyone just accept me again after all I've done?

110141002.content: You are our friend. You've been the one who's stayed by our side all this time, and we want that to continue...

110141006.content: Is that the sound of... Miss Shu and Sis Ver fighting Ausar?

110141007.content: Oh no! They're in danger! I've got to help!

110141009.content: Osiris must have been there for quite some time. She leaps up from her chair, but her legs crumple to the ground after just a few steps.

110141010.content: Why am I so weak, so useless... Why?

110141011.content: She lifts up her head in great pain and notices that the door has already been opened—

110141012.content: A familiar figure is standing in the doorway, bathed in radiant light from outside.

110141015.content: I can't pin all my problems on her any more. Then nothing will change.

110141016.content: Allowing the operation to go ahead and locking myself in here is the coward's way out...

110141017.content: I... must defeat you to move forward!

110151001.content: Look at you! Just some weaklings!

110151002.content: Ausar yet again flings her sword wings downward against the three people only to have the attack blocked at the last seconds by Ver's shield.

110151003.content: I... I won't let you hurt them.

110151004.content: Pffft. Let's see how many times you can stop my attacks, you irritants!

110151005.content: Don't exhaust yourself, Ver. It's just a dream—we won't really come to harm!

110151006.content: I know... But we've come this far. I can't risk giving up any chance to save Osiris!

110151010.content: Ver blocks the attack once again with her shield, but this time a rather obvious crack results.

110151013.content: Even though I have nothing really to offer, I rush over to shield Ver with my body before stopping to consider that fact.

110151016.content: I-I'm not letting you hurt my friends, Ausar!

110151018.content: A turquoisee scythe flashes past as a girl in midair blocks Ausar's entire attack and even forces her back a few steps.

110151019.content: Osiris... What are you doing here?

110151020.content: I'm here because everyone... needs me!

110151021.content: Osiris is back, wonderful! But how can she...

110151022.content: The dreamscape system identifies each conscious awareness individually, so both Ausar and Osiris can appear here even while sharing one body.

110151023.content: But that is all theoretical. Osiris breaking in with Ausar already here must require astonishing willpower...

110151024.content: Ausar, what happened between us should stay between us. Don't hurt them.

110151025.content: I covered up your existence and almost got you killed. I'm not going to hide behind everyone anymore!

110151026.content: This is the first time you have talked to me confidently, Osiris... Where is your sniveling, piteous self?

110151027.content: So you think a weakling like you can withstand my awesome power?

110151028.content: We're not forced to share the same body in the dreamscape! If I wanted to, I could delete you completely!

110151029.content: We may have grown up together, Ausar, but I'm not going to lose to you today! And I've never been all on my own...

110151030.content: Sis Ver, Miss Shu... I haven't been much of a good girl. I have plenty of negativity, and I brought this whole thing on everyone...

110151031.content: But I would still like to be a part of the family...

110151032.content: Please. Trust me one more time... and back me up!

110151033.content: You've got it, Lil' Osi! I've still got a sword even if my shield breaks. We can fight her together!

110151034.content: Hah. We've been waiting for you to say that for ages.

110152001.content: What's going on? The ground is shaking—

110152002.content: We've spent too much time in the dreamscape, and the battle is making it even worse. The system can't maintain for much longer!

110152003.content: Lord Mimir, what happens to everyone if the dreamscape collapses?

110152004.content: You and the rookie will be okay. You might be out for a little while if we forcibly eject. It's hard to predict what'll happen to Osiris and Ausar if they're both fully conscious at the same time. Obviously, we've never seen anything like this.

110152005.content: Then we've got to knock Ausar out cold as soon as possible!

110152006.content: Hold on, Ver! The dreamscape can't take this kind of punishment.

110152007.content: But we'll be fine as long as one of us is out before the dreamscape collapses, right? That's fine. I can go back to the Imago Room.

110152008.content: No way! It took a lot of doing to wake you up, Osiris! All our effort would be wasted!

110152009.content: It's alright. I can figure out some way to see you all again.

110152010.content: Argh... So much noise. It's driving me mad!

110152011.content: An ear-splitting screech interrupts the conversation.

110152012.content: This is nothing more than a poorly constructed dreamscape. You can't threaten me! Be... quiet!

110152013.content: Ausar lifts her hand to the red sky before closing her palm into a fist as if bending the dreamscape to her will.

110152014.content: The shaking suddenly stops as if Ausar had closed her hands over the heart of the dreamscape and throttled it.

110152016.content: After accomplishing this astonishing feat, Ausar vanishes before anyone can respond.

110152017.content: A raft of energy flashes across the sky toward its target like a pillar of turquoise lightning—

110152021.content: The same right hand that had torn apart countless AGI Mechas reaches my face. I wait for the inevitable, but it never comes.

110152022.content: Oh? Interesting. I was worried the intrusion into your consciousness would leave complications. It seems I was over-worried.

110152023.content: Ausar gently removes her palm from my forehead.

110152025.content: But... you don't seem to be afraid of me? You think the worst thing that can happen to you is you leave the dreamscape?

110152026.content: You acted too quickly. I didn't really have time to think about it...

110152027.content: I just get the feeling deep down that you're not going to hurt me.

110152029.content: And how is someone who gets tired after a bit of exercise going to seize control of that body anyway?

110152030.content: You just wanted to test our love for Osiris with a battle, isn't that right?

110152032.content: Ausar scowls before turning to Ver and the others. She glances at each fiercely and yet without any seeming intention to strike.

110152033.content: Whatever... I don't care anymore. I'm tired. Have it your way.

110152035.content: You aren't taking revenge on us?

110152036.content: Revenge? Please. Never mentioned it. You really think that operation could have hurt me?

110152037.content: I'm just sick to death of you weaklings huddling around each other for warmth, or pretending like your friendships matter. But... if Osiris gets something out of hanging onto you lot, I can't be bothered stopping her.

110152038.content: (Since these guys can withstand me this long, they shouldn't be easily defeated by some minions... That would make that crybaby sad...)

110152039.content: Alright then. I'm going back to sleep... But I won't let you off so easy next time.

110152040.content: Ausar, wait—wait! I have something to say to you!

110152042.content: I... I never really tried to understand you or even talk to you until now...

110152043.content: Because you're a weakling. You didn't even know how to get out of the Imago Room.

110152044.content: It's not just that... But I never truly faced your existence, nor did I believe people could accept me for who I am, or even that I could talk to you...

110152046.content: Thanks for helping me control the Living Soul, and watching over me all this time... Even if I almost hurt you that badly with that operation. All because I was running from the truth.

110152047.content: We've been over this. I don't care.

110152048.content: But... I have something to say too.

110152050.content: Just... that ugly doll. I never tore it up. That stupid cat did it.

110152052.content: Your dumb cat broke the doll and then hid under the sofa! You thought I had done that, didn't you?

110152053.content: Oh... so it was... I'm sorry. So, you are quite bothered by that, right?

110152054.content: Not really... I just wanted you to know I would never do something so pointless.

110152056.content: So saying, Ausar gives the group a final disdainful glance before turning around and disappearing into the virtual void.

110152057.content: I can sense that Ausar has returned to the Imago Room.

110152058.content: Phew... Administrator, Miss Shu, Sis Ver... I'm back. And I'm alright.

110152061.content: And you too, Administrator. Thank you... My... My Fox.

110152063.content: Ah, never mind. Forget I said that.

110161001.content: The Sheep trusted the Fox's advice, and revealed her hideous scarring. Indeed, far from abandoning the Sheep, her many forest friends gathered around to console her with kind words and fresh grass.

110161002.content: But it did not last for long. The Sheep soon noticed the other animals sought her company less often, sometimes they even quietly avoided her…

110161003.content: "Poor child. That scar is so hideous."

110161004.content: "I want to remain friends, but how can I ignore that hideous wound?"

110161005.content: "Rather than pretending nothing is wrong, it'd be so much easier not to talk to her anymore."

110161006.content: Such words came to the Sheep's ears increasingly often.

110161007.content: Hmph. Fair weather friends, that's all. If it was me, I'd bisect them. Use one half for steak and the other for soup—

110161008.content: No, no, you can't do that! They're not bad people. And that poor little Sheep doesn't have any friends.

110161009.content: This is what happened at the end of the story... The Sheep ran into that Fox again and asked why the Fox had tricked her.

110161010.content: The Fox replied, "I never tricked you. The other animals did their best to get used to your scar, but you didn't put in the same effort."

110161011.content: It turned out the Sheep hadn't been willing to eat the fresh grass brought to her, and didn't go too much effort to say hello. The little Sheep had not realized that, the injury hadn't just left a scar on her body, but also deep in her heart.

110161012.content: Without the Sheep's positive response, and as time went by, her forest friends began to avoid her.

110161013.content: Hmph. So he was trying to talk his way out... And what happened in the end?

110161014.content: The Sheep listened again to the Fox and looked again into her heart. The Sheep renewed her efforts with her friends, and together they healed the scar on her body, and in everyone's heart.

110161015.content: Insufferably corny... I would have preferred an ending where she boils them all in soup after that load of nonsense.

110161017.content: The voice from within the door goes quiet for a moment and then emits a long yawn.

110161018.content: Yawn—Alright. Let's end here. I'm tired.

110161019.content: Okay. I'll come back to you tomorrow.

110161021.content: You've been telling stories outside my door since you gained control of the Imago Room... No longer hanging out with your so-called "friends"?

110161022.content: Aether Gazer is a very busy family... And I feel like there's something strangely wonderful, just talking to you like this.

110161023.content: I feel like I can tell you anything—things I can't tell others. It's like I've gained an even closer friend in you.

110161025.content: I-I'm sorry. I'm not used to taking the initiative with people. Is this too forward of me?

110161027.content: I thought you might be very bored locked up in here all day. So I wanted to read a storybook. If it's not interesting, I can find something else—

110161028.content: It's alright. Bored is bored. Not a bad bedtime story.

110161031.content: Eh? Ausar, what did you say?

110161032.content: The girl in the room smiles, but does not repeat her words.

111011001.content:
Human beings are like a collection of memories.

A person only really begins to vanish once forgotten.

As long as one person remembers, they still exist in some form, even if their soul has disappeared.

The great hall pieced together from fragements of memory was to her like a place of rest and repose.

But without her... there is no place I can call home.

111011006.content: From now on... this is no longer your home.

111011007.content: And you are... no longer my sister.

111011011.content: I just want us to be together.

111011012.content: Please, please... I beg you! Don't leave me...

111011014.content: You're awake! Excellent. I was about to call for emergency support.

111011015.content: I'm not sure if you remember tonight's plan. I'm aware good sleep is a rarity for you, but I ought to remind you we have to get going...

111011016.content: A low electronic voice spreads out through the darkness as moonlight mischievously avoids this corner.

111011018.content: The silver-haired girl opens her eyes. The dressing-down returns the black coffin behind her to customary silence.

111011020.content: She glances out at the indecipherable night blanketed by a thick canvass of stars, shimmering in their brilliance.

111011021.content: She looks down from the night sky, stands up, and nimbly descends from the roof.

111011022.content: She is keenly aware for whom she would be paying her respects soon... just as before.

111011023.content: A sense of unreality clings to me upon waking. I try to fight it for some time before finally opening my eyes onto a white ceiling.

111011026.content: The structure of your cerebral cortex appears very stable. No abnormalities discovered.

111011027.content: So what were they? Fantasies of my own imagination?

111011028.content: If you're unsure of my findings, I'm perfectly happy to open up your brain and let you confirm it yourself.

111011029.content: Thank you. That won't be necessary.

111011030.content: Administrator, just in case, we also had a look at the current status of that "mark" in your body.
